anya-e0806n:21_0: Icceva manavasesa mattano bhayādyūpaddavopaghābhakarasāmatthiya yogena sakalajjhattikabāhiyantarāya nivāraṇa
anya-e0806n:21_1: madhippetasiddhi visesa mabhikaṅkhiya ratanattaya visayabhūtaṃ taṃsādhane kantanidāna bhūtassa ālokiyayātisayaguṇavisesayuttassa
anya-e0806n:21_2: mahato pyatimahanīyassa ratanattayassa sappasādānurūpaṃ pūjāvisayaṃ tadanussa(raṇaṃ katvā) gurusanniyogamanuṭṭhātuṃ–
anya-e0806n:24_0: Vacanato attano gurupūjā purassaraṃ pañcikāvivaraṇaṃ pathi’yā pañcikā’tiādinā katapaṭiññattā sampati
anya-e0806n:25_3: Tattha ratanattayappaṇāma karaṇaṃ antarāyakarāpuññavighātakarapuññavisesuppādanena kattu micchitassa ganthassa anantarāyenaṃ parisamāpanatthaṃ.
anya-e0806n:25_4: Vacīpaṇāmo panettha sotūnampi yathāvuttatthanipphādanako ācariyenāpyaya mattho dassitoyeva’tattha ratanattayappaṇāmasandassana’ntiādinā,
anya-e0806n:25_5: vācasikasatthādhikāratopi vacīpaṇāmoti kāyappaṇāmo manopaṇāmo ca. Na kato,
anya-e0806n:25_9: abhidheyyasaṅkhātayayojanasandassanaṃ vīmaṃsāpubbakārīnaṃ payojano pālambhapubbikā satthe pavattatīti
anya-e0806n:26_0: Sabbasseva hi satthassa, kammassāpi ca kassaci;
anya-e0806n:28_0: Nanu satthappayojanānaṃ sambandhopi vattabbo idamassa payojananti yato–
anya-e0806n:33_0: Taṃ vuttantogadhattā na, bhinno vutto payojanāti.
anya-e0806n:34_0: Payojanappayojanampana sāmatthiyaladdhabbaṃ sayamācariyena “ko pana saddalakkhaṇassa ajānane doso”tiādinā vuttanayena viññātabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n:35_3: ‘saṅkhepanayenā’tica ‘sārabhūtaṃ vipulatthagā hiṃ anākula’nti ca imehi ganthārambhaphalaṃ sotujanasamussāhanañca,
anya-e0806n:35_4: abhidheyyasaṅkhātappayojanampana‘saṃvaṇṇana’nti iminā dassitaṃ anvattha byapadesena saṃvaṇṇīyati vivaritvā
anya-e0806n:35_5: vitthāretvā kathīyati attho etāyāti saṃvaṇṇanābhi katvā,
anya-e0806n:35_6: tampana vivaritvā kathanaṃ saddānusāsanasatthasannissayattā abhidheyyo nāma samuditena satthena vacanīyattho
anya-e0806n:36_1: yoti aniyamavacanaṃ dhammarājasaddā pekkhāya cettha pulliṅgatā,
anya-e0806n:36_3: dayati dukkhaṃ apanetvā paresaṃ sukhaṃ dadāti,
anya-e0806n:36_4: dayīyati vā sappurisehi gamiya(ti sa) santāne pavattīyati,
anya-e0806n:36_6: dayati vā paradukkhaṃ gaṇhāti taṃvasena attano hadayakhedaṃ karotīti dayā,
anya-e0806n:36_9: visayamahantatāya mahatī pasatthā vā dayā assāti mahādayo,
anya-e0806n:36_13: iminā khīṇāsavāpi saṅgayhanti tesampi diṭṭhadhammikasukhavihārasaṅkhāta hitassa dānato,
anya-e0806n:36_14: janānaṃ samūho janatā tassā hitāya abhivaḍḍhiyā sakalavaṭṭa dukkhanissaṭanibbānasukhabhāgiyakaraṇāyāti vuttaṃ hoti,
anya-e0806n:36_16: sambodhīti ettha saṃsaddo sāmanti imamatthaṃ dīpeti,
anya-e0806n:36_17: tasmā saṃsayameva anaññabodhito hutvā cattāri saccāni bujjhati paṭivijjhati etāyāti sambodhi,
anya-e0806n:36_22: kinti dhammajātaṃ dhammasaddenettha pāramidhammā pañcamahāpariccāgādayo ca adhippetā,
anya-e0806n:36_23: tepi hi attānaṃ dhārentaṃ dhārenti sambodhi sampāpanasāmatthiyayogena parepi dhārenti nāmāti dhammāti vuccanti,
anya-e0806n:36_31: “kathannāmete accanta dussahavaṭṭadukkhopagate satte taṃmahādukkhā mocessāmī”ti vaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇekahetutāya
anya-e0806n:36_32: sammā pūrento vaḍḍhento vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhaṃ vepullaṃ gamentoti vuttaṃ hoti,
anya-e0806n:36_35: duṭṭhu khanati kāyikaṃ assādanti’dupubbā khanismā’ “kvī”ti (5- 4) kvi,
anya-e0806n:36_41: tasmā anantaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo assāti anantarūpaṃ,
anya-e0806n:36_50: kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti “aniṭṭhānubhavanasabhāvāyāpi dukkhavedanāya anubhavanasabhāvasāmaññena ajjhāsayasampattivisesayogā
anya-e0806n:36_51: mahākāruṇikassa sukhena sadisatāpattihotīti dukkhampi samānaṃ taṃ sukhamiva vindī”ti.
anya-e0806n:36_53: athavā sukhamiva sukhaṃ vindanto viya anaññavindiyamapi tādisaṃ dukkhaṃ sakalalokahitāva hitamanatāya vindīti attho,
anya-e0806n:36_55: akhinnaṃ parissamamappattaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo assāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n:37_0: Taṃ dhammarājanti yoti aniyamaniddiṭṭhassa vuttaguṇavisesādhāra puggalassaniyamanavacanaṃ,
anya-e0806n:37_2: attanā paṭividdhassa sāmibhāvena dhammassa rājā sāmīti vā,
anya-e0806n:37_3: attanā paṭivijjhiyamāne dhamme paṭivijjhantova tattha rājati dippatīti vā,
anya-e0806n:37_4: parūpakāravasena tadatthāyeva paṭipannattā paresaṃ dhammaṃ rājeti pakāsetīti vā dhammarājā,
anya-e0806n:37_9: Tattha māro ca so vīrocāti māravīro jito vidtedhastabalo māravīro nāti jitamāravīro, taṃ,
anya-e0806n:37_12: tathāpi vīrasaddasannidhānena devaputtamāre gahite taṃvijayā aññepi jitā eva nāma hontīti viññeyyaṃ,
anya-e0806n:37_17: athavā sudhantañca taṃ suvaṇṇaṃ ceti samāse tassidanti “ṇo”ti (4-
anya-e0806n:39_0: Hetu phalaṃ parattho ca, sabbopi thutisaṅgaho;
anya-e0806n:41_0: Vuttahetuphalasattopakāravasena buddharatanassa thutipubbakampaṇāmaṃ dassetvā idāni dhammarājena tenāpi
anya-e0806n:41_1: pūjanīyassa dhammaratanassa nipaccakāraṃ dassetuṃ‘dhammañca mohandhatamappadhaṃsi’nti āha,
anya-e0806n:41_2: tattha ca saddo ‘dhammañca namitvā’ti namassitvā (potthake) namassanakriyāya dhammaṃ sampiṇḍeti,
anya-e0806n:41_9: taṃ padhaṃseti pakārena nāseti sīlenāti mohandhatamappadhaṃsī,
anya-e0806n:41_10: pasaddassapakāsanatthaṃ hitvā pakāratthasseva gahaṇato pariyattiyā saha–
anya-e0806n:43_0: Cattāri atha nibbānaṃ, dhammā lokuttarā navāti.
anya-e0806n:44_4: tappahānasmiñhi vuccamāne tammukhenetaresampi pahānaṃ vuttameva hotīti.
anya-e0806n:45_0: Evaṃ dhammaratanassa namakkāraṃ dassetvā idāni tadādhārabhūtasaṅgharatanaṃ namassituṃ ‘saṅghaṃ tathā saṅghaṭitaṃ guṇehī’ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:45_5: saṃpubbato hanatismā kvimhi “kvimhi ghoparipaccasamo hī”ti (5.100) hanassa gho,
anya-e0806n:46_0: Cattāro ca paṭipannā, cattāro ca phaleṭhitā;
anya-e0806n:48_0: Vuttaaṭṭhaariyapuggalā gayhanti, guṇehīti lokiyalokuttarehi sīlādiguṇehi, saṅghaṭitanti saṃhataṃ.
anya-e0806n:49_1: paṇāmaṃ dassetvā idāni gantha kattādiyathāvuttatthopadassana pubbaṅgamamattanā samārabhitabbaṃ gantha
anya-e0806n:49_4: etāya sattā ijjhanti iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi=iddhividhādayo lokiyā lokuttarā ca sā etesamatthīti iddhimanto,
anya-e0806n:49_11: “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ iddhimantānaṃ yadidaṃ moggallāno”ti bhagavatā iddhimantesu
anya-e0806n:49_12: etadagge ṭhapito mahāmoggallānatthero nāma yo dutiyo aggasāvako…
anya-e0806n:49_14: yamācariyo anuddhatabhāvena ujunākkamena nāmādikamavatvā vaṅkavuttiyā attano moggallānoti nāmaṃ mahāsāmiṭṭhānantarappattiṃ
anya-e0806n:49_21: suttaṃ(hi) ‘saddā (lakkhīyanti) sāsīyanti anusāsīyanti pakatippaccayādivibhāgakappanāya etenā’ti saddalakkhaṇanti
anya-e0806n:49_22: ca ‘byākarīyanti saddanipphādanavasena kathīyanti etenā’ti byākaraṇanti ca vuccati,
anya-e0806n:49_23: aparampana vutyādi tadupakaraṇabhāvena saddasatthaṃ saddalakkhaṇaṃ byākaraṇanti ca vuccatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n:50_1: saṅgahetvā saddavasena saṅkucitaṃ viya katvā khipanaṃ saṅkhepo,
anya-e0806n:50_3: bhovāti yo saddasatthassa vuttiyā ca kattā so eva,
anya-e0806n:50_5: samārabheyya sammā ārambhaṃ kareyya bahunnaṃ kriyākkhaṇānamādibhūtaṃ kriyākkhaṇamanutiṭṭheyya,
anya-e0806n:50_8: pañcīyati vipañcīyati byattī karīyati vutti attho etāyāti vā,
anya-e0806n:51_0: Evamattanā karaṇīyasatthampaṭijānitvā tadanantaraṃ “dve me bhikkhave paccayā sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāya (katame
anya-e0806n:51_1: dve) parato ca ghoso (ajjhattañca) yoniso manasikāro”ti vacanato sammāsavanapaṭibaddhā sabbāpi sāsana
anya-e0806n:51_2: (ppaṭi) sampattīti sāsanappaṭipattiyā byākaraṇassa mūlakāraṇattā taṃ savane sādhujane niyojento ‘taṃ
anya-e0806n:51_4: tattha tanti yasaddavirahepi adhikatattā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ parāmasati,
anya-e0806n:51_8: byañjanānurūpañca atthaṃsallakkhetvā anaññamanā hutvā sakkaccaṃ suṇantūti attho suvaṇṇabhājane nikkhittasīhavasāviya
anya-e0806n:51_13: tathāvidhā eva sappurisā sādhukaṃ sotukāmā hontīti,
anya-e0806n:51_16: phegguttābhāvena apariccajanīyatāya sāro thiraṃ so attho byañjanañca assā atthīti sārā ca sā bhūtāca,
anya-e0806n:51_17: atha vā lokiyalokuttaraguṇātisayasādhanekasādhanabhāvato seṭṭhaṭṭhena sārañca sā bhūtācāti sārabhūtā,
anya-e0806n:51_19: attho pana nayaggāhitatāyapi sabbathā dassitoyevāti vipulaṃ atthaṃ gaṇhātīti vipulatthagāhī, taṃ,
anya-e0806n:51_20: vidhīyamānavaṇṇanākkamavisesena byākulassa vaṇṇanākkamassa nirasanato natthi ākulaṃ kiñci assāti anākulaṃ, taṃ,
anya-e0806n:51_21: iminā ca kaccāyanavuttivaṇṇanāsu na tathābhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0806n:52_0: Tadevamadhikatattāyevāyamācariyo ganthārambhe’mahādayo yo’tiādike paṭipajjitvā dāni attanā vaṇṇanīyassa
anya-e0806n:52_8: ramayatī ra tayatī (potthake) ti (vā) ratanaṃ anappaccayena,
anya-e0806n:52_9: athavā yaṃ loke cittīkatādikaṃ ratananti vuccati,
anya-e0806n:55_3: avayavavinimmuttassa pana samudāyassa abhāvato tīṇi eva ratanāni vuccanti,
anya-e0806n:55_10: yena ca yo paṭipādīyati so tassa attho hotīti,
anya-e0806n:55_18: kāyamanomayenāpi puññāti sayappattiyā abhisamīhitatthasiddhi hotevāti codanaṃ manasi nidhāya vacīpaṇāmassa
anya-e0806n:55_21: guṇasaddo ettha “sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhā”tiādīsu viya ānisaṃsaṭṭho,
anya-e0806n:55_31: yathā te sotāro ratanattayassa paṇāmakaraṇena puññātisayappaṭilābhā anekānisaṃsātisayappaṭilābhānukūla
anya-e0806n:55_36: adhigatā pattā aneke bahū ānisaṃsavisesā āyu vaṇṇasukhabalapaṭibhānādayo yesanti viggaho,
anya-e0806n:55_37: visositā sukkhāpitā antarāyā bhayādayo ajjhattikā bāhiyā vā yesaṃ tathāvidhānaṃ sotūnaṃ,
anya-e0806n:55_39: abhisamīhitassa anuṭṭhitassa kataniṭṭhitassa ganthassa avabodhoyeva phalaṃ,
anya-e0806n:58_1: paratthe sampādite pana sakattho sampannova nāma siyāti manasi katvā āha-
anya-e0806n:58_3: Kāyamanosamācaraṇena sampajjamānañca vacīsamācaraṇena sampajjatevāti aneneva vākyena viññāyatīti avagantabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n:58_4: buddhi pubbā yasmiṃ karaṇe taṃ buddhi pubbaṃ,
anya-e0806n:58_6: abhidheyyassa adhigamo jānanaṃ pubbo yassa so abhidheyyādhigamapubbako,
anya-e0806n:58_8: ekadesadassane “samuddo diṭṭho”ti viya ekadesepi samudāyavohāradassanato pacchima pādenāti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:58_14: sādhanassa cedaṃ sādhiyanti evamassedambhāvahetusabhāvo sambandhoti vuttaṃ hoti,
anya-e0806n:62_0: Vuttaaṭṭhadhammasamannāgatena abhinīhārena samannāgatā hutvā yathāvutte pāramitādayo dhamme pūretvāti attho,
anya-e0806n:62_4: tathāgatoti yathā sampati jātā te bhagavanto sattapadavītihārena gatā,
anya-e0806n:62_9: satta padāni gantvāna disā vilokesīti idaṃ “dhammatā esā bhikkhave sampati jāto bodhisattā samehi pādehi
anya-e0806n:62_10: patiṭṭhahitvā”ti eva mādikāya pāḷiyā sattapadavītihārūpariṭhitassa sabbadisānuvilokanassa vuttattā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:62_11: disā vilokesi samantatoti idampana ‘samehi pādehi phusī vasundhara’nti etassa anantaraṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ…
anya-e0806n:65_3: evamādinātiādisaddena tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ tathaṃ āgato yathāvato adhigato’yegatyatthā te buddhyatthā,
anya-e0806n:65_4: ye buddhyā te gatyatthā’titathāgatoti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti,
anya-e0806n:65_6: tathāgatabhāvoti tathāgatoti bhavanaṃ nipphatti namassanakiriyābhisambandhāti’namassitvā’ti ettha namassanakiriyāya
anya-e0806n:65_8: namassanakiriyāvisesanattāti ‘namassitvā’ti namassanaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ nāma siyāti namassananti vuttanamassanakiriyāya visesanattā,
anya-e0806n:65_12: mūleti mūlasamīpe “yāva majjhanhike kāle chāyā pharati nivāte paṇṇāni patanti etāvatā rukkhamūlaṃ”tiādīsu viya,
anya-e0806n:65_13: nanu aññepi khīṇāsavā ‘aggamaggene’ccādinā vakkhamāna nayena nipphannā evāti anuyogaṃ manasikatvā vuttaṃ ‘saheva vāsanāyā’ti,
anya-e0806n:65_14: na hi bhagavantaṃ ṭhapetvā aññe saha vāsanāya kilese pahātuṃ sakkonti,
anya-e0806n:65_15: etena aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ bhagavato arahattanti dasseti,
anya-e0806n:65_16: teneva iddhasaddassa atthaṃ dassento’tepi hi’ccādikaṃ vakkhati,
anya-e0806n:65_17: kāpanāyaṃ vāsanā nāma pahīnakilesassāpi appahīnakilesassa payogasadisapayogahetubhūto kilesanihito sāmatthiyaviseso’āyasmato
anya-e0806n:65_22: sammuti upapattidevabhāvato aññena visuddhi devabhāvenātinipphannattā āha-
anya-e0806n:65_24: sakalakilesakālussiyāpagamena visuddhippattiyā sabbaññuguṇā laṅkārena visuddhidevabhāvenāti attho.
anya-e0806n:66_9: keci ‘siddho middhaguṇo assāti siddhamiddhaguṇanti duṭṭhamatthaṃ parikappetvā vākyamidaṃ dūsenti,
anya-e0806n:66_10: te pana ‘middho nāma koci guṇo natthī’ti ca,
anya-e0806n:66_11: ‘tathāgato nāma middha guṇo na hotī’ti ca,
anya-e0806n:66_12: ‘tādiso ce siyā na ñāṇanissitapūjā pakatopayoginī bhavatī’ti ca ajānitvā vadatha tumhehi vatvā uyyojetabbā,
anya-e0806n:66_15: dhammasaṅghānampīti iminā avayavena viggahepi samudāyassa samāsatthattā aññapadatthasamāsoyaṃ tagguṇasaṃviññāṇoti dīpeti, tenāha-
anya-e0806n:66_18: kiriyātisambandho vagamyate dhammasaṅghānaṃ guṇībhūtānampi tadavinābhāvittena namassanātisambandhā,
anya-e0806n:66_20: puttena saha vattamānoti tagguṇasaṃviññāṇaaññapadatthasamāsattā tulyamubhinnampi āgamananti puttopi āgatoti patīyate,
anya-e0806n:66_28: tañca yathārūpaṃ kilesasamucchindanatappaṭippassaddhi ālambanabhāvena hotīti āha- ‘so…pe…
anya-e0806n:66_35: sīladiṭṭhisāmaññenāti ariyena sīlena ariyāya ca diṭṭhiyā samānabhāvena,
anya-e0806n:66_37: tena te yatthakatthaci ṭhitāpi sahagatāvāti saṃhatoti imasmiṃ atthe saṅghoti padasiddhi daṭṭhabbā,
anya-e0806n:66_39: lokiyasīladiṭṭhiyā sāmaññena saṃhatattā sammutisaṅghopi paṇāmārahoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n:67_5: ye lokasaṅketānurodhenātthappakāsakā tesaṃ sātthakāname vidaṃ lakkhaṇanti,
anya-e0806n:67_6: apica ‘saddā ghaṭapaṭādayo’ti vadanto vedikānaṃ viya unti ñatthi (potthake) ādīnaṃ anupubbīniyamāvatthānamasambhavā
anya-e0806n:67_7: tadanukkamena nipphādiyamānanampi saddānaṃ lokiyattānabhivattanañca bodhetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n:67_8: nu tattha pakāsakatthaṃ saddassa samudāyavasena vā siyā paccekavaṇṇavasena vā,
anya-e0806n:67_15: tathā sati katha matthaṃ saddo pakāsayatīti ce kamena sotacittādigahitakkhara pāḷiyā ca yo saddoti viññeyyo sātthako cittagocaro,
anya-e0806n:67_16: cittagocarassāpi saddassa pana bālajanappabodhāya kappanāmattena pakatyādivibhāgato,
anya-e0806n:67_19: nanu goiccādisādhusaddaniyame sati gotādayo asādhu saddāti viññāyanti gantabbamagganiyame agantabbamaggo viya,
anya-e0806n:67_20: gotādi asādhusaddaniyame vā goiccādayo saddā sādhavoti agantabbamagganiyame gantabbamaggo viya,
anya-e0806n:67_30: 34) ṇappaccaye māgadhā māgadhanti ca padanipphatti veditabbāti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n:67_36: lakkhaṇaṃ māgadhanti vadatā pakāsitaṃ hotīti attho,
anya-e0806n:67_38: lakkhaṇaṃ visesayatāti saddalakkhaṇa saddassa uttarapadatthappadhānattā māgadhanti iminā lakkhaṇaṃ visesayatā byavacchedayatā vuttikārena,
anya-e0806n:67_40: sadde ca visesito hotīti saddalakkhaṇasaddo māgadhe eva saddeeva (potthake) byavacchedito hoti,
anya-e0806n:67_41: ayametthādhippāyo ‘magadhesu viditā māgadhāti sadde gahetvā tesamidaṃ māgadhanti māgadhasaddena yasmā saddalakkhaṇasadde lakkhaṇaṃ visesitaṃ,
anya-e0806n:67_42: tasmā saddalakkhaṇasadde saddo yadi amāgadho kathaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ māgadhaṃ siyāti sāmatthiyā saddopi visesito hotī’ti,
anya-e0806n:67_43: nanu māgadhanti lakkhaṇassa māgadha saddasambandhittajhāpanato saddalakkhaṇanti ettha saddasaddassa niratthaka tāpatti hotīti,
anya-e0806n:67_44: na hoti gammamānatthassa saddassa payogampati kāmacārattā saddalakkhaṇasaddassa vā samāsatthe niruḷhattā
anya-e0806n:67_46: kopanātiādisaddalakkhaṇanti iminā abhidheyyasaṅkhātapayojanassa dassitattā tappayojanapucchanaparā codanā,
anya-e0806n:68_0: Piyo ca garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e0806n:70_0: Vuttehi tato parehi ca pasatthatarehi guṇavisesehi samupetaṃ guruṃ.
anya-e0806n:73_3: sussūsā sakkaccasippapaṭiggahaṇehi sammā upaṭṭhahantena savana,uggahana- dhāraṇa-
anya-e0806n:73_5: bhāvanā hi kaṅkhāvicchedaṃ katvā viññātabbaṃ saddalakkhaṇaṃ,

anya-e0806n:74_0: Yo niruttiṃ na sikkheyya, sikkhanto piṭakattayaṃ;
anya-e0806n:76_1: ayametthādhippāyo “yathā vuttanayena sambhūtapada byāmohavasena padatthepi byāmohasambhavato suttantopadassitāya
anya-e0806n:76_2: diṭṭhiviniveṭṭhanāya ca abhidhammāgate nāmarūpaparicchede ca vinaya niddiṭṭhe saṃvarāsaṃvare ca akosallaṃ siyā”ti,
anya-e0806n:76_6: paṭipajjitumasakkontoti tatthatattheva vuttāsu adhisīla adhicitta adhipaññāsikkhāsu pavattituṃ asamattho,
anya-e0806n:77_0: Yāva tiṭṭhanti suttantā, vinayo yāva dippati;
anya-e0806n:78_0: Tāva dakkhanti ālokaṃ, sūriye abbhuggate yathāti.
anya-e0806n:79_0: Paṭipattinti paṭipajjīyatīti paṭipattīti yathāvuttaṃ tividhampi paṭipattiṃ,
anya-e0806n:79_2: nassati hi paṭipatti tesuyevā ko sallatamagatattā,
anya-e0806n:81_0: Tamo bhavissati loke, sūriye atthaṅgate yathāti.
anya-e0806n:82_2: nukkamapariccāgena anurūpapaṭipattiyā paṭilabhitabbattā adhigamavisayassa visathattā (potthake) yo gakkhemassa,
anya-e0806n:83_0: Suttante rakkhite sante, paṭipatti hoti rakkhitā;
anya-e0806n:84_0: Paṭipattiyaṃ ṭhito dhīro, yogakkhemā na dhaṃsatīti.
anya-e0806n:85_0: Etāvatā aviññātasaddalakkhaṇassa sakatthaparihāniṃ dassetvā idāni sakatthasampattimūlikā paratthasampattīti
anya-e0806n:85_1: tadabhāvā tādiso puggalo paresampi paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkotīti dassetuṃ ‘nacā’tiādi vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:85_3: tañcettha tesaṃ tesaṃ kula puttānaṃ dhammavinayasikkhāpanaṃ taṃtaṃ kammato nittharaṇādi ca,
anya-e0806n:85_8: idha pana taṃ sādhanabhūto puggalo upacārato patiṭṭhāti gahetabbo,
anya-e0806n:85_10: saddalakkhaṇaññūyevāti avadhāraṇampana tesu tabbidūyeva samatthoti dassanatthaṃ pakaraṇavasena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:85_11: attano pana suguttasīlakkhandhavirahena kadāci koci yathāvuttānaṃ patiṭṭhābhavituṃ na sakkoti…
anya-e0806n:85_13: teneva vinayadhare ānisaṃsaṃ dassentena bhagavatā tappadhānaṃ tappamukhaṃva katvā “pañcime bhikkhave ānisaṃsā vinayadhara puggale,
anya-e0806n:85_14: katame pañca attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti su rakkhito,
anya-e0806n:85_25: atha khoti vidho saddhammopi nāsitoyevāti vatthumāha ‘ajānanto panā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n:85_26: ayathāpaṭipajjamānoti saddalakkhaṇaññunā yathā yena pakārena atthānurūpaṃ byañjane byañjanānurūpañca atthe paṭipajjitabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n:85_32: terasa dhutaguṇā cuddasa khandhakavattāni dve asīti mahāvattānīti ayaṃ paṭipattisaddhammo nāma,
anya-e0806n:85_33: cattāro maggā cattāri ca phalāni ayaṃ adhigamasaddhammo nāma,
anya-e0806n:85_41: vākyaṃ athavā pajjate gamyate attho etenāti padaṃ-
anya-e0806n:85_45: dunnikkhittaṃ duṭṭhu nikkhittaṃ ṭhapitaṃ virādhetvā kathitaṃ,
anya-e0806n:85_46: attho ca dunnītoti dunnikkhittattāyeva padabyañjanassa tabbacanīyopi duṭṭhuviññāto hoti,
anya-e0806n:85_49: na hi attāva attanā veditabboti yuttanti.
anya-e0806n:86_0: Tadevantiādinā yathāvuttaṃ nigametvā saññāvidhāne payojanaṃ dasseti,
anya-e0806n:86_2: yasmā saddalakkhaṇassa jānanaṃsāni saṃsaṃ tasmāti attho,
anya-e0806n:86_7: Nanuca saññīnaṃ saññānaṃ vattabbatte “aādayo titālīsavaṇṇā”tiādīnaṃ vākyānaṃ visuṃvisuṃ mahantattā kuto
anya-e0806n:86_8: lāghavaṃ satthassāti maññamāno ‘tathāhi’ccādinā saññāvidhāne lāghavasabbhāvaṃ samattheti,
anya-e0806n:86_9: hotevāti avadhāraṇena katthaci parasatthe viya no na hotīti dasseti,
anya-e0806n:86_12: 24) vaṇṇādisaññāsamuddharitā nāttānamattāvagametumalanti pare pucchitvā jānitabbā assa,
anya-e0806n:86_14: tatossa saññāti saññāsaññīvivecanaṃ tadanuṭṭhānanti paramparāpekkhāya bhavitabbaṃ paṭipatti gāravābhāvā.
anya-e0806n:86_19: visayo gocaro yatthete syādayo vidhī yante,
anya-e0806n:86_21: paṭhamaṃ karīyatīti pakati yato syādayo vidhīyante,
anya-e0806n:86_28: samānattantuṇādivuttiyā “rājādivisiṭṭhe purisā doviya’vasiṭṭhādivisiṭṭhe apaccādimhi atthe pavattanato.
anya-e0806n:92_0: Sabbavacanānaṃ sātthakaniratthakattabyabhicārittā ‘ida’ntiādinā sadiṭṭhantena saṃsayamupadassiya sātthakattamassa dassetuñca ‘na tāva…pe…
anya-e0806n:93_0: Atha aādyādisaddānaṃ sādhuttānvākhyānāya idaṃ vacanamiccādivikappantarasambhave kathaṃ niyamo vuttiyaṃ
anya-e0806n:93_2: ākārādayo niggahītantā’iccādinā vuttiyaṃ vakkhamāno attho yassa taṃ tathā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:93_3: sādhūnaṃ sādhusaddānaṃ anusāsanaṃ ākhyānaṃ attho payojanaṃ yassa tanti viggaho.
anya-e0806n:94_3: 45) ippaccaye ākāralope ca ādīti aādiyesanti aññapadatthasamāse yomhi “yosu jhissa pume”ti (2-
anya-e0806n:94_5: tayo ca cattālīsā cāti cattha samāse “tadaminādīni”ti cata lopeca rasse ca titālīsāti, ‘vaṇṇa-
anya-e0806n:94_8: payoganiyamatthanti titālīsavaṇṇasaddesu paresu eva aādisaddo payujjīyatīti evaṃ payoganiyamatthaṃ,
anya-e0806n:94_9: ayampi vikappantara sambhāvanā “abhūtatabbhāve karāsabhūyoge vikārā cī”ti (4-
anya-e0806n:94_11: ṭhānyādesatthanti aādisaddassa ṭhāne titālīsavaṇṇasaddā ādesā honti tesaṃ vā so iti,
anya-e0806n:94_14: agamāgami bhāvatthanti aādisaddassa titālīsa vaṇṇasaddā āgamā honti tesaṃ vā so iti,
anya-e0806n:94_19: āgama liṅgābhāvatoti ukāra kakāra makārānaṃ abhāvato,
anya-e0806n:94_23: saddalakkhaṇā nupayogatoti saddalakkhaṇena saddasaṅkharaṇassa pakatattā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:94_27: na hi visesana visessabhāve paṭipādite aādyādisaddānaṃ rūpavisesassa saṅkharaṇaṃ kataṃ siyāti,
anya-e0806n:94_29: tathā sati ‘nīluppala’miccādīnampi vattabbatā āpajjeyyāti nāssa tadattha tāpi sambhāvīyate,
anya-e0806n:94_32: tadatthampetaṃ na hotīti dassanatthaṃ ‘tagguṇajjhāropanatthampetaṃ na hotī’ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:97_2: upalakkhaṇattāti upalakkhiyamānānamākārādīnaṃ gahaṇe kāraṇabhāvena appadhānattā, tenāha-
anya-e0806n:97_5: na gunnampi ānayanaṃ bhavati..gunnamupasajjanīya bhūtattā aññapadatthasseva padhānattā,
anya-e0806n:97_13: itarathā byañjanaparasseva rassatte dassite titālīsaiti abyañjane padaṃ na sampajjeyyāti viññāyati,
anya-e0806n:97_19: sakkatānusārenāti sakkate “sandhi yakkharānaṃ rassā na santī”ti vuttassa anusārena,
anya-e0806n:97_22: yamadhippāyo ‘rassāivāti ivasaddo sādhammopamājotako vā siyā vedhammopamājotako vā,
anya-e0806n:97_24: rassadhammassa e okāresva sambhavā tesaṃ dīghakālappavattito te dīghāyeva siyuṃ,
anya-e0806n:97_26: tesu rassadhammassasambhavā rassakālappavattito rassāeva te siyunti ‘etthātiādīsu e okārānaṃ uccāraṇakālakataṃ rassattameva hotī’ti,
anya-e0806n:97_27: rassakālavantoyevāti evasaddo sogate vaṇṇavinimmuttassa kālassevābhāvā vaṇṇānañca paccakkha siddhattā
anya-e0806n:97_28: pamāṇasiddhaṃ pāramatthika me okārānaṃ rassakālavantataṃ dīpeti,
anya-e0806n:97_29: atthāti vadato panāyamadhippāyo ‘etthātiādīsu yadi ekārādayo dīghāeva saṃyogapubbattā rassāva siyuṃtathā
anya-e0806n:97_30: sati atthāti etthāpi dīghova ākāro saṃyogapubbattārasso iva uccatīti āpajjeyya,
anya-e0806n:97_34: payojanābhāvāti tena sādhetabbassa kassaci iṭṭhassa abhāvamāha,
anya-e0806n:97_38: aññathā ‘rukkhā vana’ntiādīsu viya samudāye vākyaparisamattiyaṃ “iyuvaṇṇā jhalā namassante” (1-
anya-e0806n:97_40: paccekaṃ vaṇṇā nāmahontīti akāro vaṇṇo nāma hoti ākāro vaṇṇo nāma hotītiādinā,
anya-e0806n:97_41: avayaveccādinā vuttiyaṃ avuttepi ‘pacceka’nti vacane sadiṭṭhantaṃ kāraṇamāha,
anya-e0806n:97_43: ettha hi paccekanti avuttepi devadatto bhojīyatūtiādinā paccekaṃ bhuñjikiriyā parisamāpīyate, tenāha-
anya-e0806n:97_45: athavā samudāyepi vākyaparisamā pattiyaṃ sati samudāye pavattā saddā avayavesupi vattantīti ‘samuddekadesadassanepi samuddo diṭṭho,
anya-e0806n:97_46: khandhekadesa bhūtāyapi paññāya paññākkhandhotiādīsu viya na doso,
anya-e0806n:97_48: vaṇṇasaddassa guṇādyanekatthattepi pakaraṇato akārādayovettha vuccantīti āha-
anya-e0806n:100_0: Nanu jhalādisaññā viya lahusaññaṃ akatvā kasmā gurusaññā katāti codanaṃ manasi nidhāya ruḷhi anvatthavasena
anya-e0806n:100_1: dvippakārāsu saññāsu jhālāti ruḷhi saññātthābhāvena vohārasukhamattapayojanā,
anya-e0806n:100_2: anvatthasaññā pana tappayojanāpi hoti tadaññappayojanā pīti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n:100_4: vaṇṇīyatī attho etehīti vuttamatthaṃ anugatā anugatatthā vaṇṇasaññā taṃ,
anya-e0806n:100_9: vaṇṇaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo etesanti vaṇṇarūpāni- padāni,
anya-e0806n:100_13: sabbañcetamupacārena vaṇṇasaddavacanīyattaṃ gacchati vaṇṇamayattāti sabbopi sammutiparamatthabhedabhinno
anya-e0806n:100_14: attho vākyādhigamanīyo vaṇṇeneva viññāyati nāma tasmā yathā vuttamattha visesadassanaṃlahusaññāya na
anya-e0806n:100_15: sakkāti tadatthamakārādīnaṃ gurubhūtā vaṇṇasaññā katāti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n:100_18: Ubhohi panetehi bhinno tatiyo koṭṭhāso nāma natthi,
anya-e0806n:101_0: Duve saccāni akkhāsi, sambuddho vadataṃ varo,
anya-e0806n:106_0: “Ādayo titālīsa vaṇṇā” “titālīsādayo vaṇṇā”ti vā vattabbanti na tathā sati sandiddhaṃ suttaṃ siyāti,
anya-e0806n:106_4: saddasādhanamattappayojanattā pana sabbavidhānassa pubbācariya saññāvālametthāti kiṃ punāpi vaṇṇādisaññāvidhānena ganthagārava karaṇenāti saccametaṃ,
anya-e0806n:106_5: pubbācariyesu pana gāravaṃ tadanugamanañca dīpetuṃ kāci saññāyopyanvākhyāyante,
anya-e0806n:106_6: yajjevaṃ saṃyogasabbanāmalopādayopi saññā pubbācariyehi vuttā vattabbāti nanu bho vuttamevāmhehi’kāci saññāyo ākhyāyante’ti,
anya-e0806n:106_7: kintadākhyānadvārena bhavatā tāpi viññātuṃ na sakkāti,
anya-e0806n:106_10: lopena niddiṭṭhattā panassā assavanaṃ sannikaṃsavacanicchābhāvā saṃhitāyāniddeso,
anya-e0806n:106_13: saresupi ekaṭṭhāniyā akārādayo bahuttā paṭhamaṃ vuttā ṭhānānukkamena,
anya-e0806n:106_17: byañjanesupi vaggā bahuttā ṭhānappaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṃ vuttā,
anya-e0806n:106_26: tesupihakāro kesañci orasopi hotīti dvijattā pacchā vutto,
anya-e0806n:106_27: kehici “laḷānamaviseso”ti dvinnamavisese vuccamānepi lipibhedena ṭhānabhedena ca bhinnattā ḷakāro visuṃ akkharabhāvena gahito,
anya-e0806n:106_28: sopi ghosabhāvena ṭhānānukkamenaca hakārato paraṃ vutto niggahītaṃ pana sarattādisabbavinimmuttattā sabbapacchā vuttanti akārādīnamayamanukkamo,
anya-e0806n:106_29: imassevānukkamassa manasi vipassa vattamānattā titālīsāti gaṇanāparicchedassa dassitattā ca ‘niggahītantā’ti vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:106_34: amhehi pana kathamakārādīnamayamanukkamo uppannoti sissānaṃ kaṅkhā vicchedappayojanampati anukkamasaddassa atthakathanabyājena vaṇṇito yevāti,
anya-e0806n:106_41: tampana vaṇṇuccāraṇato abbhantaro bāhiyo ca ussāho,
anya-e0806n:106_53: tasmā “dasādo sarā”iccādo ‘tenā’tiādīsu ‘tena saraiccanena kvattho kasmiṃ sutte payojanaṃ taṃ dasseti
anya-e0806n:106_56: kasmā pana’so cemināva ñāpakena siddho’ti vuccati nanu ‘tadaminādīni”ti (1-
anya-e0806n:106_59: evasaddo pana ‘yadi ñāpakena vaṇṇalopo siyā so imināva ñāpakena siddho,
anya-e0806n:108_0: Nanu aādayoti paṭhamantenuvattante kathamettha’tatthā’ti sattamīniddiṭṭhatāti āha-
anya-e0806n:108_2: atthavasāvibhattivipariṇāmenāti aādayoti paṭhamantassa‘ādo dasā’tyanena sambandhā sambajjhamāne cādhāratthena
anya-e0806n:108_3: bhavitabbanti ādhāratthavasena sattamī vibhattiyā parivattanenāti attho,
anya-e0806n:108_4: atthavasā sattamiyā vipariṇāmasambhavāyevasutte avijjamānepi‘tatthā’ti vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:108_5: ādodasannamanaññatthapavattisambhavato tesaṃ aādayo visayabhāvenapi sakkā parikappetunti vuttaṃ-
anya-e0806n:108_8: vaṇṇasamudāyato tadekadesabhūtāna mādo vaṇṇānaṃ dasasaṅkhyāguṇena niddhāriyamānattā,
anya-e0806n:108_9: ādimhi dasa vaṇṇāti vutte avuttānampi avassaṃ vattabbānaṃ ūnapūraṇatthamajjhāhāro hotīti vuttaṃ-
anya-e0806n:108_11: ekādīna maṭṭhārasantānaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ saṅkhyeyye vattanato āha-
anya-e0806n:108_13: gayhupagānaṃ rassae ovaṇṇānampi kaccāyane viya apariccāgā anūnā,
anya-e0806n:108_14: agayhupagānaṃ tadaññesaṃ kesañci sarānaṃ pariccagā anadhikā,
anya-e0806n:108_15: dasasaddassa saṅkhyeyya vuttittā dasannampi adhikatavaṇṇānaññattā vuttaṃ-
anya-e0806n:108_17: sayaṃ pubbā’rāja=cittiyaṃ’tīsmā kvimhi antalope samāse ca tadaminādittā niruttinayena vā sarasaddo nipphajjatīti, ‘sara-
anya-e0806n:108_18: gatihiṃ sācintāsu’ iccasmā appaccayena vā nippajjatīti dassetumāha=‘sayaṃ rājantī’tiādi.
anya-e0806n:110_1: heṭṭhā viyāti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ atthavasā vibhattivipariṇāmaṃ upameti,
anya-e0806n:110_3: tesuti pana niddhāraṇattavivacchāyaṃ tampi sambhavatīti tesaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ majjhe dvedveti dvisaṅkhyāya niddhāraṇatthopi veditabbo,
anya-e0806n:110_4: vicchāyaṃ vutti yassa so vicchāvutti- dvisaddo,
anya-e0806n:110_7: Nanu samānā vaṇṇā savaṇṇātyanvatthe savaṇṇasadde sati kataṃ rassadīghānaṃ savaṇṇasaññā siyā…
anya-e0806n:110_10: nevampi vattuṃ yuttaṃ“dvedve savaṇṇā”ti suttassa tādisasāmatthiyasabbhāve sabbhāvena (potthake) visesakāraṇābhāvāti āha‘samānattampanā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n:110_11: Tiṭṭhanti ettha vaṇṇā cittajattepi abhibyatti vasenāti ṭhānaṃ kaṇṭhādi,
anya-e0806n:112_0: Oraso iti viññeyyo, kaṇṭhajo tadasaṃyuto”ti vadanti.
anya-e0806n:114_7: nanu ca pubbasaddo yamekattā ekaṃ pubbamācikkhati na sakalanti kathaṃ “pubbo’ti vutte yoyoti ñāyati ‘yoyo
anya-e0806n:114_8: pubbo’ti ca vutte ‘tesu dvīsu’ti ettha’dvīsu dvīsu’ti idaṃ kathaṃ sukheneva patīyate tadidamasiddhenāsiddhasādhananti
anya-e0806n:116_0: Sesamiccādinā‘tesu dvīsūti savaṇṇasaññakesu dvīsu’ iccādi kamatidissati.
anya-e0806n:116_2: saṃyogapubbassa rassassa dīghassa ca gurusaññā na vattabbā…
anya-e0806n:118_0: Kevala byañjanānamatthappakāsattābhāvā sarānamatthappakāsane accantopakārā byañjanāti ‘etehī’ti karaṇattena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:123_0: Sajātyapekkhāya samudāyavācittepi kādayotī anuvattanato vaggasaddena kakhagaghañādayova gayhanti,
anya-e0806n:123_3: sutte ādibhūto pañcasaddo pañcasaṅkhyāparicchedaṃ kurumāno māvasānānaṃ vaggānaṃ bahuttaṃ gametīti ‘pañcakā’ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:125_0: Anekatthattā dhātūna muccāraṇatthopettha gaṇhātīti nipubbā tato kammanti ttappaccaye ññimhi pādisamāse dīgheca rūpaṃ dassento ‘rassā’tiādīmāha,
anya-e0806n:125_5: niggahena itanti amādisa māse rūpaṃ dassento ‘karaṇaṃ niggahena vā’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n:129_0: Taṃ sabbatthe namanato, viduṃ nāmanti tabbidū.
anya-e0806n:130_15: inda (udaka pakhuma) saddādīna manta ādimajjhabhūtaivaṇṇādīnaṃ jhalasaññā vidhāya tato parāsaṃ sādi vibhattīnaṃ “jhalā sassa no”ti (2-
anya-e0806n:130_25: Itthiyanti idanti “pitthiya”nti sutte itthiyanti idaṃ padaṃ.
anya-e0806n:130_26: Vaṇṇavisesanaṃ siyāti “pitthiya”nti sutte ‘iyuvaṇṇā’ti anuvattanato ‘itthiyaṃ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā’ti evaṃ ivaṇṇu
anya-e0806n:130_27: vaṇṇā “gho”ti sutte ‘itthiyaṃ ā’tievaṃ avaṇṇassa ca visesanaṃ bhaveyya.
anya-e0806n:130_31: Sakkānāmavisesanaṃ kātunti dvīsu suttesu itthiyantiādinā vakkhamānakkamena.
anya-e0806n:130_32: Nāmassa anto nāmantoti samāsassa uttarapadatthappadhānattā samāse guṇībhūtassa nāmassa itthiyanti idaṃ visesanaṃ kātuṃ na sakkāti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n:132_0: Kokilā kumudānī vo, pasevante vanaṃ jalaṃ” (260).
anya-e0806n:135_1: ante ivaṇṇuvaṇṇāti ca vutte tesamā dhārādheyyasambandho ādheyyassādhāre pavattiṃ vinā na sambhavatīti ajjhāhāravasena ‘vattamānā’ti vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n:135_2: Ivaṇṇu vaṇṇāti apekkhiya‘visesīyantī’ti bahuvacanametaṃ sambandhassa purisādhīnatāya nāmantīminā sambandhe sati‘visesīyatī’tekattena pariṇamati.
anya-e0806n:137_1: Heṭṭhā sabbattha saññino niddisiya saññāya niddiṭṭhattā tattha viya visuṃ saññino paṭhamamaniddese asanto
anya-e0806n:137_6: Pacchāvuttamattenāti “ghā”ti sutte kāriyino ākārassa pacchā vuttamattena.
anya-e0806n:144_6: nte vā sabbhāvato yenakenaci ākārena abhedopacārena akārādivisesanavato nāmādino,
anya-e0806n:144_8: nādo na majjhe yassa taṃ tadantaṃ,
anya-e0806n:144_17: na sabbatthappasaṅgoti saṃhitādividhimhi sabbattha tadanta vidhippasaṅgo na hoti,
anya-e0806n:144_19: 26) ettha saroti visesanabhāvena vacanicchāya sabbhāve saroti tatrā’dīnaṃ visesananti yathākathañcisarādisaramajjhasarantānaṃ
anya-e0806n:144_25: tathā sati ‘tatrime’tiādimhi ‘ime’tiādinā vattabbatā āpajjeyyāti payogaṃ nānusaṭā nāmasiyunti na sabbattha tadanta vidhippasaṅgo,
anya-e0806n:146_6: tañcopasilese bhavamadhikaraṇaṃ pubbassa vā paraṃ siyā parassa vā pubbanti pubbaparopasi lesassāvisiṭṭhattā pubbaparānaṃ sambandhassa avisesā,
anya-e0806n:146_8: satītyasmiṃ atthe jotanīye sattamī saṃsattamī santasaddassa samādesena,
anya-e0806n:146_14: sattamiyā niddese satiyeva taṃ sambandhāya sattāya sambhavo,
anya-e0806n:146_29: vagamyateti “pubbasaddassa byavahitepi payogadassane byavahitepi kāriyaṃ pappotī”ti bhassakārādayo vaṇṇenti,
anya-e0806n:146_33: mathurāya pāṭaliputtakassa cāntarāḷe gāmādīnaṃ sabbhāvā byavadhānepi pubbasaddassa pavattiyā diṭṭhantamāha-
anya-e0806n:146_36: tasmā byavadhāne saralopo na hotīti evaṃ saṅkhepabyākhyānena vuttiya mattho veditabbo,
anya-e0806n:146_42: vattuno yā icchā vacanicchā tassā anutūlena vidhānato atthassa kathanatoti attho,yena hi yamatthaṃ vattātidhātumicchati
anya-e0806n:146_55: yasmā kāraṇā anvayo gurupārampariyo padeso gurukulamupagamma pañhakaraṇādinā anvicchīyate gavesīyati,
anya-e0806n:146_56: ato kāraṇā guruparamparā gataupadesato vasīyatoti attho,
anya-e0806n:146_64: tassa ca opasilesikādhāra mantarena aññathānupapattiyā ādhāravisesappaṭippattīti idamettha sāmatthiyaṃ,
anya-e0806n:146_68: renāpi ādhārantarepi opasilesikādhārepi vacanantarappasaṅgo siyāti sambandhasambhavā opasilesikādhāranissayanepi
anya-e0806n:146_69: ānisaṃso na dissatīti samuccayatthenāpi natthi payojananti vajjetabbo yampi saddoti,
anya-e0806n:146_70: nanu kimevaṃ vaṇṇīyate pubbasseveti vacana mevopasilesikamadhikaraṇaṃ viññāpayati…
anya-e0806n:146_76: ‘gaṅgāyaṃ ghoso’ti vutte ghoso gaṅgāyaṃ pubbo vā paro veti gammamānattā sāmīpikepyadhikaraṇe pubbaparattassa sambhavāti attho,
anya-e0806n:146_77: etāvavuccateti pubbasseva hoti na parassāti ettakameva vuccate,
anya-e0806n:146_88: chaṭṭhī niddiṭṭhe pubbassa chaṭṭhīti pubbassa kāriyittapaṭipādanayoggo chaṭṭhī tabbodhakapade bhavatityattho,
anya-e0806n:146_90: ujjotaṭīkā ti chaṭṭhīpakappanaṃ paṭipādenti ‘yasmiṃ sutte chaṭṭhīniddeso natthi,
anya-e0806n:146_92: idha pana vacanantarābhāvepi yattha chaṭṭhīniddeso natthi,
anya-e0806n:146_97: yathā “vagge vagganto”ti etthānuvattamānaṃ niggahīta’ntidaṃ chaṭṭhīyantaṃ viññāyate,
anya-e0806n:146_99: 38) pubbasutte katatthatāya paṭhamā vibhattiyā chaṭṭhīvibhattimpakappeti sattamiyaṃ pubbasse’ti tathetyavagantabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n:146_100: Etāva vuccateti vutte idanti na viññāyateti āha ‘kinta’ntiādi,
anya-e0806n:146_102: Kimidamuccate pariyāyappasaṅge niyamatthaṃ vacananti nanu pubbaparānaṃ yugapaduppattiya mācariyavacanappamāṇenāppaṭipattiyaṃ
anya-e0806n:148_4: ‘gāmā devadatto’ti vutte so tato pubbo parogeti viññāyatītyavadhibhāvassa pubbaparāpekkhattenāviseso,
anya-e0806n:148_6: 41) vuccamāne ato pubbesaṃ yonaṃ athavā paresanti pubbaparāpekkhattenāvadhibhāvassāvisesāti maññate,
anya-e0806n:148_7: pure viyātyanena sattamiyanti ettha vuttaṃ niddesavacane kāraṇamatidisati,
anya-e0806n:148_8: vuttiyaṃ ‘narānamere’ti ettha apavādavippaṭisedhe satiparattā ṭāṭeādesānaṃ pavattiṃ “ādissā”ti ettha vaṇṇayissāma,
anya-e0806n:148_9: atha kimiminā vacanena nanu yato yattha pañcamī niddeso tattha sabbattha “mānubandho sarānamantā paro” (1-
anya-e0806n:148_10: 21) tyato ‘paro’tyanuvattetuṃ sakkāti tassānuvattitassa yonamiccanena sāmānādhikaraṇyā‘paresaṃ yonaṃ’tyayamattho viññāyate,
anya-e0806n:148_13: paroti tyanuvattamānaṃ ‘ato’ti pañcamyantena sambajjhamānaṃ na koci vāretā atthīti parato-
anya-e0806n:148_14: kārato pubbesampi yonaṃ ṭāṭeādesā pappontīti vacaneneminā bhavitabbamevāti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n:148_20: pubbako parihāroti byava hitanivattiyā pubbasutte vutto “saretopasilesikādhāro”ti parihāro,
anya-e0806n:148_21: na sambhavatīti iha sattamiyā abhāvā na sambhavati,
anya-e0806n:148_27: ‘paccāsatyā jātiṃ sannissāyā’ti jātiṃ sannissāya paccāsatyā karaṇabhūtāya nivattimāheti sambandho,
anya-e0806n:148_28: iminā paccāsatti ñāyabyāpanañāyajātipadatthabyattipadatthesu paccāsattiñāyo jātipadatthoceha nissīyateti dasseti,
anya-e0806n:148_29: na hi kevalaṃ jātiṃ nissāya byavahitanivatti vattuṃ sakkā,
anya-e0806n:148_31: tadā byāpanañāyena byavahite cābyavahite cāsajjatīti jātiyā nissayane satyapi byavahitepi byāpyamānā
anya-e0806n:148_32: jāti kena nivārīyate nāpi kevalaṃ paccāsattinnissāya byavahitanivatti vattuṃ sakkā,
anya-e0806n:148_34: byattiyañca padatthe paṭilakkhiyaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ pavattatīti paccāsatti ñāyanissayanepyabyavahitampati yaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ bhinnaṃ tadabyavahite pavattaṃ,
anya-e0806n:148_36: tañca vacanappamāṇato mābhavatvassa byatthatāti byavahitepi pavattate,
anya-e0806n:148_41: ‘osadhyo’ti ettha sakāre akārā parassa dhakārena byavahitassa yossa viyāvasesānampi sabbhāvato vuttaṃ-
anya-e0806n:148_48: katohi jātyattho kasiṇoti yasmā sakalo brāhmaṇa jātisaṅkhāto attho parisamatto,
anya-e0806n:148_51: ‘yāva diṭṭhambhojaye’ti vutte vuttena (potthake) santāya sāmaññavutti brāhmaṇasaddappayogasāmatthiyā paccekambhojanakiriyā katā nāma hoti,
anya-e0806n:148_54: 33) sutte byañjaneti sattamī pubbassa dīghādividhimhi caritattā “saramhā dve”ti (1-
anya-e0806n:148_57: tato “sattamiyaṃ pubbassa” “pañcamiyaṃ parassā”ti dvinnaṃ parassa samuṭṭhāpane ‘byañjane’ti sattamī parassa
anya-e0806n:148_58: kāriya yogitāya atthato vibhattivipariṇāmena chaṭṭhībhāvena pariṇamatī…
anya-e0806n:148_59: dvinnaṃ suttānaṃ vippaṭisedhe parassa balī yattāvāti etādisasāmatthiyasabbhāvato vuttaṃ-
anya-e0806n:150_0: Kiñci antassa sampattanti yaṃ ṭānubandhamanekavaṇṇaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0806n:150_6: tassāyama pavādo hotu ṭānubandhādikāriyaṃ kathanti āha-
anya-e0806n:150_17: ntassa pattopi tadapavādattā “ādissā”tiādibhūtassa dakārassa hotīti āha ‘dakārassaro’ti.
anya-e0806n:152_7: nanu brahmassāti visesanatthena vattumicchito mahābrahmasaddo chaṭṭhīniddiṭṭho nāmāti “brahmassu vā”ti (2-
anya-e0806n:152_9: tathā sati ‘na hi chaṭṭhī niddiṭṭhassa antaṃ padaṃ vākyaṃ vā sambhavatī’ti kasmā vuttanti, vuccate-
anya-e0806n:152_10: na visesanatthenākkhepamattena mahābrahmasaddo chaṭṭhī niddiṭṭho nāma bhavatīti na brahmasaddassa sabbassādesappasaṅgo,
anya-e0806n:152_11: mahābrahmasadde vā brahmasaddo atthīti tassāntassa uttaṃ vidhīyate.
anya-e0806n:154_4: tassa ca “vānubandho”tyayaṃ yogo bādhakoti bādhakabādhanattho sampajjate,
anya-e0806n:154_6: panayane vā vattateti apodyante ussaggalakkhaṇāni vajjīyante nīvārīyante apanīyante nenetyapavādo,
anya-e0806n:154_7: suttekadesena suttamevopalakkhitanti antassa‘chaṭṭhiyantassā’ti suttassa apavādo antāpavādo,
anya-e0806n:158_2: ādyantasaddānaṃ niyatavayavavācittā avayavassa cāvayavināmantarenā sambhavato sāmatthiyāvayavī lakkhīyati,
anya-e0806n:158_6: teneva paccayavidhimhi kūppaccayādayo na dosā bhavantīti,
anya-e0806n:158_9: katākatappasaṅgittāti otte katepi akatepi vukāgamassa pasaṅgato,
anya-e0806n:158_10: bhūyattattā hi ottassa bhūggahaṇe sati katepi otte vukāgamena bhavitabbamakatepi tatova “katākatappa
anya-e0806n:158_11: saṅgī yo vidhi sanicco”ti niccattā ottaṃ bādhitvā vukāgamo hoti,
anya-e0806n:158_12: atha vukāgame pacchā tena na bhavitabbanti āha-
anya-e0806n:160_0: Yadiniddhāraṇe chaṭṭhī antassāvisesitattā avisesena yato kutoci antato bānubandho paro siyā,
anya-e0806n:160_7: tena “sutānumitesusutasambandhobalavā”ti rundhatītetthadhakārassā numitassa maṃ na hotīti dīpeti,
anya-e0806n:160_10: yathā’kaṇhā gāvīnaṃ sampannakhīratamā’ti vutte avisesitattepi kaṇhāya kaṇhāgāvīyeva patīyate,
anya-e0806n:160_11: tathehāpi sarānaṃ majjhe antātyantattena niddhāriyamāno samānajātiyo saroyeva patīyate,
anya-e0806n:160_14: 163) sutte assāti vutte ayameveti niyamābhāvā yassakassaci akārassa ñippatti,
anya-e0806n:160_15: tenāniṭṭhappattīti lānusaṅgisseva assāti lassa yaṃ visesanattaṃ taṃ attho payojanamassa “kattarilo”ti (5-
anya-e0806n:162_1: so cāññādhikyaiṭṭhādyanekatthopi idha iṭṭha vācī daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n:162_3: 44) sāmaññena vihitattā vippaṭisedhananti atthe ghaṇi vippaṭī sedho, tenāha-
anya-e0806n:162_7: saṃsiddhiyaṃ vattamānopi sidhi upasaggasambandhe nātthantarepi hotīti aññamaññavirodhotyattho,
anya-e0806n:162_9: kathampana pamāṇabhūtassācariyassa vacanesu aññamaññavirodho sambhavatīccāsaṅkiya ubhinnaṃ sāvakāsatte
anya-e0806n:162_10: sati sambhavati nāññathāti ‘dvinna’miccādi vuttigantho pavattoti vattuṃ ‘socā’tiādimāha aññamaññānajjhāsiteti
anya-e0806n:162_12: anubhayatāginīti yo visayekadeso ubhayanna bhajate tasmiṃ anubhayabhāgini visayekadese,
anya-e0806n:162_14: tattha pavattippasaṅge sati soca vippaṭisedho jāyatīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n:162_15: iminā vippaṭisedhassa visayo pavattippasaṅgo visayavisayīnamabhedena sutte ‘vippaṭisedho’tivuttoti ‘dvinna’miccādinā vuttigantho racitoti dīpeti,
anya-e0806n:162_16: paro hotī tividhidassitoti iminā yadi niyamo-
anya-e0806n:162_19: pāṇiniyā hi jātiyaṃ padatthe sakimeva lakkhaṇaṃ pavattatīti caritatthattā visayantare dvinnampi lakkhaṇānamappavattiyaṃ
anya-e0806n:162_21: byattiyantu padatthe latvādīnamiva pariyāyappasaṅge niyamatthanti paṭipannā,
anya-e0806n:162_22: idha pana jātiyaṃ byattiyañca dvinnampi suttānamappavattiyameva vidhyatthamevidaṃ vacanaṃ,
anya-e0806n:162_26: kāmato parisamāpanañcetissā sabbasmiṃ attano gocare avicchedabyāpanena pavattisabbhāvato.
anya-e0806n:162_31: abhimatakāriyavidhāne liṅgabhāvena saddikānumatattā(tesaṃ) vidhīnaṃ vidhāyakañca tasmāti attho.
anya-e0806n:162_37: viruddhācāti dvinnaṃ vacanānaṃ pamāṇattā ubhinnampi appavattīti sambandho veditabbo.
anya-e0806n:162_38: Samānabalānaṃ dvinnaṃ lokepi virodhittaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva ubhinnampi kāriye appavatti ca dissatīti diṭṭhantamāha ‘lokece’tyādi,
anya-e0806n:162_39: ettha ca pessassa (a)virodhatthino kāriye appavattiriva appavattiyeva (potthake) samānabalāna mubhinnaṃ
anya-e0806n:162_40: vacanānaṃ kāriye appavattīti sukheno pamāsaṃsandanaṃ viññātabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n:163_0: Jātipakkheyeva bhassakārena dvinnaṃ yugapadippattiyaṃ ‘latvādīnamiva’ pariyāyappasaṅgo vaṇṇito,
anya-e0806n:163_7: yattha yasmiṃ dhātvatthekadese pavattā samānā pavattā santo laddhāvakāsā siyuṃ tassekadesassa parihārenāpi pariccāgenāpi na vidhīyanteti sambandho,
anya-e0806n:163_8: latvādīna mekakkhaṇe asambhavā ekasmiṃ kate satītaravacanāna mānatthakyappasaṅgāca pariyāyena bhavantīti yantaṃ yuttanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n:163_15: vippaṭisedhe yaṃ bādhitaṃ tambādhitamevā”tīmāsamubhinnaṃ paribhāsanampavattiṃ paṭipādento āha-
anya-e0806n:163_18: paribhāsanampana ayamattho ‘punappasaṅgavijānanāti dvinnaṃ suttānamekatthappa saṅgasaṅkhāte vippaṭisedhe satiparamiṭṭhaṃ paṭhamaṃ hoti,
anya-e0806n:163_19: hontena tena yadītarassa nimittopaghāto na kato tadā tassāpi punappasaṅgo tassa vijānanā siddhanti,
anya-e0806n:163_20: vippaṭisedhe yathāvutte sati paṭhamaṃ hontena yaṃ suttaṃ bādhitaṃ tassa punappavattiyā yadi nimittaṃ natthi taṃ bādhitameve’ti.
anya-e0806n:163_24: evaṃ maññate ‘byattiyaṃ paṭilakkhiyaṃlakkhaṇappavattiyaṃ dvinnaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ ṭhānampati yāni vacanāni
anya-e0806n:163_27: Byattiyampi yathāvuttānaṃ paribhāsānaṃ pavatti vuttavidhinevāti dassento ‘paribhāsānampi’ccādimāha.
anya-e0806n:164_0: Jātiyampadatthe “vattamāneti anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe,
anya-e0806n:164_2: vattamāne si tha iccādīnaṃ vākyekadesānaṃ gacchaticcādo gaccha siccādo ca lakkhiye sakimpavattiyā sabbasmiṃ
anya-e0806n:164_3: sake visaye paṭhama majjhimapurisekavacanajāti parisamattāti caritatthattā tumhe gacchathāti ettha dvīhi
anya-e0806n:164_4: dvinnaṃ purisāna mekakkhaṇe pavattiyaṃ na kassaci,
anya-e0806n:164_5: byattiyampi paṭilakkhiyaṃ lakkhaṇāni bhijjantīti sādhāraṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ patibhinnehi lakkhaṇehi dvinnampekatthe-
anya-e0806n:164_7: tathā vuttanayeneva tiṇṇaṃ purisānamekakkhaṇe pavattiyanti sabbathā appavattiyaṃ sampattāyaṃ vacanamidaṃ,
anya-e0806n:164_8: paro hotīti majjhimuttamaṃ bhavatīti adhippāyena ‘yathe’ccādinā vuttaṃ vuttiganthampañhamukhenā haritvā dassetuṃ ‘kvapanā’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n:164_11: kuto yato “vattamāneti anti”ccādippabhutīnaṃ vattamāneti anticcādīhi vākyekadesehi niddiṭṭhānameva pubbaparacchakkānaṃ
anya-e0806n:164_12: purisavacanavisesavidhāyakena “pubbaparacchakkāna mekānekesu tumhāmha sesesu dvedve majjhimuttamapaṭhamā” (6-
anya-e0806n:164_13: 14) tīminā vākyāvayavena tumhāmhasesesu payujjamānesu appayujjamānesu vā yathākkamaṃ pubbacchakkānaṃ
anya-e0806n:164_14: paracchakkānañca majjhimuttamapaṭhamānaṃ paccekaṃ dvedve vacanāni yathākkamaṃ bhavantīti ‘gacchatha gacchāmā’ti
anya-e0806n:164_16: dvinnampana sāvakāsāna mekakkhaṇe pavattiyeva hi vippaṭisedhoti,
anya-e0806n:164_17: tathāpi vuttanayena vippaṭisedhappakappanāpi sakkā kātuntīdamudāhaṭaṃ siyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n:164_18: imissā pana paribhāsāya nirākulappavatti “ādissā” tīmissā vuttanayena veditabbā,
anya-e0806n:164_20: yotvakateyevāyamaniccoti vuttaniccāniccesu antaraṅgabahiraṅgesu cātulyabalattā nāssa yogassa byāpāro,
anya-e0806n:166_2: vuttiyaṃ “yonavayavabhūto saṅketo”ti sāmaññena vuttepi “bhāsissaṃ māgadhaṃ saddalakkhaṇa”nti saddalakkhaṇā
anya-e0806n:166_11: anupubbo bandhivināsatthoti āhu uccāritapadhaṃsittā anubandhyate vinassatetyanubandhoti imāya sadda byuppattiyāvasena.
anya-e0806n:168_1: 108) ettha atoti rassabyattiniddeso vā siyā rassajātiniddeso vā sakalanissayabyāpī atthajāti niddesovā,
anya-e0806n:168_2: tattha rassabyattiniddese sati buddhasiddhādīsu yatthakatthaci akāro gayhateti neṭṭhappasiddhi…
anya-e0806n:168_4: rassa jātiniddese pana buddhasiddhādisabbākārantānaṃ lakkhaṇikagavādyakā rantānañcākāro gayhatīti sabbathā iṭṭhappasiddhi,
anya-e0806n:168_5: nāñño dīgho byattantarattāti nāniṭṭhappatti ākārato nāssenābhāvā,
anya-e0806n:168_6: tasmā atoti rassajātiniddese nissite sabbamidamiṭṭhaṃ nipphajjatīti nātthajāti nissīyate,
anya-e0806n:168_9: 29) ādīsu pana rassabyattiyā rassajātiyā vā niddese ‘tassedaṃ nopeti’ccādīsu eoādikamiṭṭhaṃ katthaci bhaveyya,
anya-e0806n:168_11: sabbattha vā bhaveyya ‘vāteritaṃ samonā’tiādīsu byattanta rattā,
anya-e0806n:168_13: athavā vaṇṇuccāraṇampati kesañci vaṇṇuppattiṭṭhānānaṃ uccanīcatadubhaya saṃhāravasena vaṇṇavisesuppatti
anya-e0806n:168_14: dassanato tesaṃ vasena rassa byattiniddese rassajātiniddese vā vuttanayena iṭṭhāniṭṭhappattiyaṃ sabbathā
anya-e0806n:168_16: tattha vaṇṇa parena savaṇṇaggahaṇaṃ niyamituṃ vacanamidamāraddhanti ‘sabbatthevā’tiādinā vacanārambhaphalamāha,
anya-e0806n:168_20: aññaṃ vā (saya)to rūpanti siddhepyevaṃ sati atthettha paro koci visesoti ñāpetuṃ sañca rūpa’nti vuttikāro āhāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n:168_21: rūpassa visesitabbattā ‘sañca rūpa’nti vuttiyaṃ niddisīyamānattā ca rūpanti viññāyatīti ‘sañca gayhatī’ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:168_28: samāsena vuttattā padhānatū tattepi guṇo bhavati aññapadattho-
anya-e0806n:168_34: ttākārekārādiñca gayhatītyamattho sambhāvīyatīti codanampanasi nidhāya ‘sañca rūpa’nti vadanto sādhippāyāruḷhaṃ
anya-e0806n:168_35: kiñci atthavisesaṃ pakāsetuṃ tathevāhāti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ-
anya-e0806n:168_42: tathā sati attaniyaṃ rūpaṃ nāmāttasaṅkhātasaddasambandhīti āha-
anya-e0806n:168_46: sati sambhave byabhicāre ca visesanassa sātthakatāya asādhāraṇanti rūpaṃ visesatā sādhāraṇassāpi sambhavo vuttoyeva nāmāti āha-
anya-e0806n:168_52: taṃtaṃ saddattādīhi tesaṃtesaṃ buddha aiādīnaṃ saddānaṃ saddattādi,
anya-e0806n:168_61: ca saddo panettha ‘idaṃ dassetī’ti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ samuccinoti,
anya-e0806n:168_65: parassāpīti aññassa yassakassaci saddassāpi, iti idaṃ,
anya-e0806n:168_68: yasmā idaṃ yathāvuttaṃ pasiddhaṃ tasmā pubbācariyaparamparāyāgato padesato upādiyantoti pakataṃ,
anya-e0806n:168_74: cakkhuvisayopi hi attho kathaṃ sotavisayasaddassa na āsanno saṃrūpambhavitumarahatīti,
anya-e0806n:168_87: idāni kāraṇattayaṃ samodhānetvā imehi kāraṇehi rūpameva saddassa saṃnāma,
anya-e0806n:170_1: 215) tyādinā gahaṇappasaṅge jātiyamabhippasaṅgabādhanatthaṃ byattiyaṃ vantvādi sambandhīnamupādānattamidamāraddhaṃ “vantvavaṇṇā” (4-
anya-e0806n:175_1: opasilesikādhāraṃ vinā ādhārantare gahite sati vacanantaraṃ suttantaraṃ vinā byavahitanivatti kātuṃ na ca sakkāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n:175_3: te hi yadi vaṇṇena kālena vā byavadhānepi sandhi bhaveyya tadā sareti nimittasso pādānaṃ niratthakaṃ
anya-e0806n:175_4: bhaveyyāti sareti nimittopādānasāmatthiyenānena vaṇṇādibyavadhāne no sandhīti maññamānā ‘nimitto’ccādikaṃ
anya-e0806n:175_8: ayuttatte kāraṇaṃ byabhicārasabbhāvena sāmatthiyābhāvoyevāti byabhicārandassetvā sāmatthiyābhāvandassetumāha-
anya-e0806n:175_12: atha kho ‘ete na saccena suvatthi hotū’tyādo avasāne ‘pamādo maccuno padaṃ’ tyādo anta bindu saṅkhātanimittantare
anya-e0806n:175_13: vā kāriyābhāvepi nimitto pādānassa sātthakatoti apisaddassattho,
anya-e0806n:175_16: aññathā nimittopādānameva sātthakaṃ nāmāti ‘nimitto pādānassa sātthakato’ti na yujjati,
anya-e0806n:175_17: ayametthādhippāyo ‘avasāne nimintare vā kāriyābhāvena byabhicārasabbhāvā aññathānupapattilakkhaṇaṃ sāmatthiyaṃ natthi,
anya-e0806n:175_19: yathā’dārunimittaṃ vanopasaṅkamana’nti tasmā vaṇṇakālabyavadhānepi sareti nimitte sati lopakāriyaṃ pappote vā’ti.
anya-e0806n:175_27: ihāti iminā satthantare bhāvasādhanavasena gahaṇaṃ vibhāveti,
anya-e0806n:175_29: sarassa lopoti vā lopaṃ pappotīti vā avattabbattā,
anya-e0806n:175_30: saroti paṭhamāya niddiṭṭhattā saro lopo nāma hotīti saṅkāpi siyāti āha-
anya-e0806n:175_35: ussaggato āgato sambhūto tassa vā ayaṃti ossaggiko pubbalopo,
anya-e0806n:175_37: ossaggikattā pubbalopassa kāriyantarehi paralopādīhi apavādavidhīhi ābādhito eva,
anya-e0806n:175_40: 27) kvaciggahaṇena pubbaparalopānaṃ tulyabalattābhāvā yathā gamappattito paralopassāpavādarūpattaṃ,
anya-e0806n:177_1: kvaci lopanīyo hotīti idaṃ vacanaṃ dīpetīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n:177_11: niccaṃ pakkhevā paralopo siyāti honticcādo niccaṃ,
anya-e0806n:177_13: evaṃ maññate “kasminti atthe kvāti nipphannenāniyamavuttinā aniyamatthasseva visesakato vacane sabbatthevāniyatatthavuttittā kvacisaddo-
anya-e0806n:177_15: tattha honticcādiko nicca pakkho paralopasseva visayo,
anya-e0806n:177_16: latāvātiādiko aniccapakkho ubhayasādhāraṇattā pubbalopassāpi visayoti iminā niccaṃ pakkhe vā paralopo hoti,
anya-e0806n:177_17: asantapakkho pana saddhindriyantiādiko pubbalopasseva visayo sabbathānena pariccattattā”ti,
anya-e0806n:177_18: tīsupi cetesu pana pakkhesu niccāniccapakkhesu yevassāpavādarūpatā…
anya-e0806n:177_19: pubbalopassa sabbathā honticcādo nivārakattā vā vidhāyakattā vā paralopassa,
anya-e0806n:177_22: lokaggotiādi tu kvacisaddassa payogānusāritā dīpakattā nicce asantevāpi vidhimhi dīpite paralopena vā nipphajjatīti neṭṭhabyāghāto,
anya-e0806n:177_23: evaṃ tāva kvaciggahaṇe sabbathāniṭṭhaparihārena iṭṭhappasiddhi siyā,
anya-e0806n:177_26: pariyāyena bhavantīti kvaciggahaṇābhāve ‘paro’ti suttaṃ siyā tathā sati suttadvayamekavisayaṃ tulyabalañca siyā,
anya-e0806n:177_27: tattha vippaṭisedhābhāvā pamāṇabhūtānamācariya (vacanā)naṃ niratthakatā mā bhavīti vārena bhavantīti attho,
anya-e0806n:177_29: pakkheyeva siyāti latāvātiādīsu pubbalope pariyāyappavatte pariyāyena paralopassāppavattito latāvāti pakkheyeva paralopo bhaveyya,
anya-e0806n:177_39: Nacevamiṭṭhanti evamidaṃ yathāvuttaṃ vikappavidhānaṃ saddalakkhaṇaññūhi nevābhimatanti attho,
anya-e0806n:177_42: nena pariccattaṭṭhāne ussaggappavattiyā latāva latevāti rūpadvayaṃ sampajjati tasmā payogānusāritādīpakena
anya-e0806n:177_43: kvacisaddeneva honti saddhindriyaṃ latāva latevāti payoga sambhavopi,
anya-e0806n:177_44: tathāpi aniccapakkhe latāivāti tatiyarūpappasiddhiyā pariyāyena bhavitabbanti parikappeti ‘nanu cetyādinā,
anya-e0806n:177_45: atha “paro kvacī’ti kvaciggahaṇe sati apa(vādarūpa)ttā kathampariyāyappavattīti manasi nidhāyāniccapakkhe
anya-e0806n:177_46: pariyāyappavattidīpanatthaṃ “na dvevā”ti suttitanti apavāde rūpattayepi pariyāyappavattiyaṃ dosābhāvamāha-
anya-e0806n:177_48: tathāhiccādinā “na dvevā”ti sutteneva pariyāyassāpi dīpitattaṃ sādheti,
anya-e0806n:177_49: sā ca ekatthappavatti pariyāyaṃ vinā na sambhavati…
anya-e0806n:177_51: nanu ca kvacābhāve pariyāyappavattiyaṃ yathāvutta dosassevāppasaṅgato mā hotu pariyāyo,
anya-e0806n:177_52: bhinnavisaye pana pubbaparalopappavattiyā “na dvevā’ti nisedhe lateva latāva latāivāti rūpattayaṃ nipphajjatīti codanaṃ manasi nidhāyāha-
anya-e0806n:177_58: vikappena vā katthaci yathodakaṃ yathāudakaṃ tyādo pubbalopasseva katthaci itipi iccapiccādo paralopasseva
anya-e0806n:177_59: katthaci lateva latāva latāivāccādo pariyāyenubhayalopasseva dassanatoti sambandho,
anya-e0806n:177_60: etthaca itipīti vavatthitavibhāsatta dīpanena kvacisaddena paralope kate-
anya-e0806n:177_61: ññatra pubba lope sampatte “na dvevā”ti etthānuvattamāna kvacānubhāvena niccaṃ nisedhe iccapicceva bhavati.
anya-e0806n:179_1: tathā ca sati aññoññānajjhāsi taṃ yathodakaṃ yathāudakaṃtyādi itipi iccapiccādica saṅgahitaṃ bhavatīti,
anya-e0806n:179_2: pubbalope paralope ca pariyāyena sampatte dvinnampi pakkhe abhāve sati kathamidaṃ yujjatīti codeti‘yajjeva’miccādinā,
anya-e0806n:179_3: yajjevanti hi ayaṃ nipātasamudāyo aniṭṭhāpādanārambha vattate,
anya-e0806n:179_9: vattumiṭṭhattāti iminā sannikaṃso vaṇṇāna maddhamattakālabyavadhānā paccāsatti,
anya-e0806n:179_10: sannikaṃsassetassa vacanicchāyaṃ satiyeva sandhikāriyaṃ hotīti dīpeti,
anya-e0806n:179_16: kālantarenāti ubhayattha ṭhitavaṇṇāna muccāraṇakālato aññena majjhappatitakālena,
anya-e0806n:179_20: yadipi sabbampetaṃ yajjevaṃtyādinā vuttaṃ kvaci saddappabhāveneva sijjhati,
anya-e0806n:179_22: yampi satthe yojetabbo vāti dassetuṃ vutto.
anya-e0806n:181_1: ‘yathākkamaṃ’ti tu vacanābhāve kathaṃ yathākkamantīdaṃ vuttanti āha-
anya-e0806n:181_3: samā saṅkhyā gaṇanā yesu te samasaṅkhyā-
anya-e0806n:181_10: e okārā anudesino ca dveti uddesīnamanudesīnañca ṭhānyādesānaṃ samasaṅkhyā siyā,
anya-e0806n:181_15: pare “satipi heṭṭhā vāggahaṇe‘kvacāsavaṇṇaṃ lutte’ti sutte kvaciggahaṇakaraṇato avaṇṇe eva lutte asavaṇṇo vidhi hoti,
anya-e0806n:181_16: tato idha na hoti diṭṭhupādāna”nti vadanti,
anya-e0806n:181_17: kvacīti adhikāro idha na hoti mahussavo mātūpaṭṭhānanti,
anya-e0806n:181_19: tena samānādhikaraṇo urasaddopīti urasminti nicca samāsattā asakapadena viggahe kate “asaṅkhyaṃ vibhatti”ccādinā (3-
anya-e0806n:181_22: ettha pana yuvaṇṇānanti saṃsāmi samīpasamūha vikārāvayavādīsu ṭhānyādesasambandhe chaṭṭhī,
anya-e0806n:181_23: tasmā ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ ṭhāne e oādesā hontīti attho,
anya-e0806n:181_24: ṭhānampana tidhā apakaṃso nivatti pasaṅgo ceti,
anya-e0806n:181_25: tattha gunnaṃ ṭhāne assā sambandhīyantu bajjhantu (jinindabuddhi) ti apakaṃso ṭhānasaddassattho,
anya-e0806n:181_26: “semhassa ṭhāne kaṭukamosadhaṃ dātabba”nti nivatti “dabbhānaṃ ṭhāne sarehi attharitabba”nti pasaṅgo,
anya-e0806n:181_30: sutte atthābhidhānāya ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ pavattippasaṅge tadatthābhidhānāyeva eoādesā bhavantīti.
anya-e0806n:183_1: 14) pubbassa kāriyavidhānato sattamī niddiṭṭhassa paratā viññāyatīti vuttiyaṃ ‘pare’ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:183_3: parehi iccassa ajjhiṇamutto’ti sādhetuṃ “sabbocanti” “ajjho adhī”ti ca suttitaṃ,
anya-e0806n:183_6: abbhakkhānanti abbhuggabho imināva siddhanti “abbho abhī”ti ca na vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n:183_7: iti+assa iti ṭhite paralopoti dassanatthaṃ ‘iti assa paralopo’ti āha,
anya-e0806n:187_16: katepi tasminti tasmiṃ sutte vihite ca,
anya-e0806n:187_17: na sijjhatīti evādissa riādeso na katoti katvā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:187_18: bhusaṃ+evāti (pana) ṭhite mahāvuttinā evādissa iādese rūpasiddhi hoteva,
anya-e0806n:189_0: Rassadīghānanti sutte avutte kathaṃ rassadīghānanti labhati uddesinoti āha-
anya-e0806n:191_4: dve rūpāni hontīti iminā na sarūpappadhānoti dassitaṃ hotīti sambandho, hetumāha-
anya-e0806n:191_6: dve rūpānihontītyādi vacanamidaṃ padamidaṃ (potthake) dasseti “sarūpappadhānepi dvisadde dvisaddasāmaññena saṅkhyādvisaddānusiṭṭhaṃ nappayujjate,
anya-e0806n:191_7: tassa (pana) saṅkhyeyyavacanasaṅkhyābhāvā ekavacanameva ( ) (pana) (potthake) hotī”ti, iminā ca-
anya-e0806n:191_12: taṃ khaṇanti ettha ekaṅgavikalaṃ paccudāharaṇanti saramhā parattābhāvā na dvittaṃ.
anya-e0806n:193_0: Tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamāti kasmā vuttaṃ catuttha (dutiya) saddehi vaggakkharesveva gayhamānesu tathā niddeso yutto,
anya-e0806n:193_1: na hi catunnampūraṇo catuttho dvinnampūraṇo dutiyoti akkharāyeva vuccantīti āsaṅkiya ‘vināpī’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n:193_2: akkhare akkharavisaye catutthādi vohāro karīyamāno vaggaggahaṇaṃ vināpi vaggakkhareyeva ruḷho pasiddhoti sambandho,
anya-e0806n:193_11: yathāyogganti catutthakkhare catutthassa tatiyo dutiyakkhare dutiyassa paṭhamoti evaṃ yoggamanatikkamma,
anya-e0806n:193_12: dhassa dabhāvoti imināva pubbassa dhassa dattamupalakkheti,
anya-e0806n:193_14: Theroti ettha ekāro vaggakkharo na hotīti tasmiṃ tavaggadutiyakkharassa tassa to paṭhamo na hoti.
anya-e0806n:193_15: Panthoti ettha tavagga dutiyakkharena thakārena tabbaggabhūte nakāre satīpi na so tabbaggadutiyakkharoti na tassa paṭhamo to,
anya-e0806n:195_5: tesu bhāravāhako koci tena pīḷito ‘aho bhāro’ti vattabbe sattivekallā ‘aho bāla’ iccāha,
anya-e0806n:195_6: taṃsamīpavattī ‘kimayamāhe’ti kenaci puṭṭho samāno ‘aho bāla iccayamāhe’ti vadati,
anya-e0806n:197_1: 36) votyanuvattiya avaṇṇe eonaṃ vo hotīti ca sakkā viññātuṃ,
anya-e0806n:197_2: tathā sati ‘avaṇṇe kvaci vo hotī”ti vattabbaṃ ‘ahoti vā’ti kasmā vuttanti codanamāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n:197_5: 31) vakārādesassa vijjamānattā vakārādesampati puna okāro ṭhānibhāvena niddisitabbo na siyāti adhippāyenāha,
anya-e0806n:197_6: na nimittanti eonaṃ vakārādesatthaṃ avaṇṇo kāraṇaṃ na hotīti attho,
anya-e0806n:197_10: sve bhavanti viggayha tanappaccaye taddhitavuttiyaṃ vibhattiyā “ekatthatāyaṃ”ti (2-
anya-e0806n:197_11: 119) lope akārādese dīgheca syādimhi svātanaṃ dvitte hiyyattanaṃ.
anya-e0806n:199_0: Katha‘māgamo hotī’ti vuttaṃ yadi niggahītamāgamo siyā sutte āgamaggahaṇena vā bhavitabbaṃ ña- ma-
anya-e0806n:199_7: tathā sati āgaminiddesābhāvā āgamattampi na siyāti codeti ‘yajjeva’miccādinā, na-
anya-e0806n:199_8: iti codanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā tassa āgamattameva sādhetumāha-
anya-e0806n:199_14: purimā jātīti visesanasamāsekate rasse ca bindvāgamo,
anya-e0806n:199_17: satipi payogānusārittadīpakassa kvacisaddassāpi vavatthitavibhāsatte vāsaddassāpi tādisattasseva paṭipādakatta
anya-e0806n:199_19: vavatthitassa lakkhiyassa anurodhena lakkhaṇappavattikā vibhāsā vavatthitavibhāsā,
anya-e0806n:199_23: imasmiṃ ṭhāne āgamattappakāsako ṭhāninidde sābhāvā ādesattāyogasaṅkhāto kāraṇaviseso samattho,
anya-e0806n:201_2: lopoti yadi kammasādhano siyā tadā tena samānādhikaraṇaṃ katvā upari “parasaro”ti suttamārabhīyeyyāti byatirekamāha ‘na parasaro’ti,
anya-e0806n:203_0: Tvaṃsi tvamasīti vikappo, idha na hoti tāsāhaṃ.
anya-e0806n:205_0: Nanu vaggevaggantoti ettakeyeva vutte yasmiṃ (kismi)ñci vaggakkhare pare binduno yokoci vagganto aniyamena
anya-e0806n:205_1: bhaveyya tathā sati aniṭṭhampi siyātyāsaṅkiya paccāsattiṃ sannissāyāniṭṭha nivattindassetumāha-
anya-e0806n:207_0: Nanu saddattā byabhicārittā evassa tāva saddo hotu, saṃyato,
anya-e0806n:207_1: saṃhitoti saddekadesabhūtānampi sambhavā tepi gahe tabbā siyunti ‘yaevahi saddesu’ti yahīnampi kathaṃ saddavohāro katoti āha ‘evā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n:209_0: Yasadde pubbasutteneva saṃssapyādese siddhe so ( ) (tassa) (potthake) ya kāramatteyeva pare saṃsseva (yathā) siyāti suttamidamāraddhaṃ.
anya-e0806n:211_0: Ṭhāninamāsilissa gacchati pavattatīti āgamo nāma, ko-
anya-e0806n:211_3: sutte anuvattassa ca avijjamānattā ‘sarassā’ti kuto labbhatīti codeti ‘nanu ce’tyādinā.
anya-e0806n:211_4: Āgamasutiyā vanādīnaṃ ṭhānisutiyā abhāvepi sāmatthiyā byañjanassa vā āgamo siyā sarassa vā,
anya-e0806n:211_7: tasmā tadeva ñāpeti ‘saro yevettha ṭhānī bhavitumarahatī’ti.
anya-e0806n:211_15: kaccāyanena ‘atippagokhotāvā’ti sādhanatthaṃ “kvaci o byañjane”ti okārāgamo gakārāgamo ca suttantarena vihito,
anya-e0806n:211_17: ‘atippago kho tāvā’ti yaṃ vuttaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ ‘atippā’tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n:213_0: Dvādayo aṭṭhārasantā bahuvacanantāti ‘chakī’ti vattabbe ‘chā’ti ekavacanaṃ na yujjatīti codeti ‘nanucā’tiādinā,
anya-e0806n:213_6: pariccatto jahito attho vidhinisedharūpo yassa taṃ pariccattattaṃ,
anya-e0806n:213_11: anukāriyassāti ekādino saṅkhyā saddassa tadaññassa vā yadanukāriyamekādikaṃ tadaññaṃ vā saddarūpaṃ tassa.
anya-e0806n:213_15: nukāriyaṃ dvisaddarūpaṃ tabbacanīyañca dvisaṅkhyāvisesamparāmasatīti tabbācakaṃ dvinnanti bahuvacanaṃ,
anya-e0806n:213_16: atha ‘ḷañi’ti kasmā na vuttaṃ evañhi sati ñānabandhattāḷakāro ādyavayavo bhavitumarahatīti codanammanasi nidhāya ‘chasaddā’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n:213_17: antāpavādena vidhīyamāno ḷakāro cha saddā parassādissa āgamattā…pe…
anya-e0806n:213_22: ādissāti iminā ḷassekavaṇṇattā antāpavādena “ādissā”ti sutte na ādyanto viyekopi saroti sarassādissa pattiṃ dasseti,
anya-e0806n:213_27: Ādibhūtova hotīti asatipi ñakāre āgamaggahaṇānuvattiyā āgaminaṃ saraṃ avināsento tassa ādyavayavabhūtova hotīti attho,
anya-e0806n:213_34: tattha hi sotaviññāṇavīthiyā laḷānaṃ visuṃvisuṃ gahaṇaṃ suti,
anya-e0806n:213_35: taṃtaṃ desavāsīnaṃ lekhā va vatthānaṃ lipi,
anya-e0806n:215_3: sādhūni bhavantīti vutti pāṭhassa atthaṃ vattuṃ ‘sādhūni bhavantīti nipātanato’ti āha,
anya-e0806n:215_7: tesaṃ idha pāṭhāti tesaṃ tathā icchantānaṃ idhāti nipātassa imasmiṃ tadaminādisutte pāṭhā,
anya-e0806n:215_8: uddhassa udūti uddhaṃ khamassāti aññapadatthasamāse uddhaṃkha iti ṭhite uddhaṃsaddassa uduādeso, asa-
anya-e0806n:215_11: ‘pisitamasanā’ti “kvacaṇa” iti mahiyaṃ ravatīti ṭhite imināva gaṇanipātanena samāse kate mayūrasaddo nipphajjatīti dassetumāha ‘mahisaddasse’ccādi,
anya-e0806n:218_9: veditabbāti iminā niruttasatthe ye saddā paṭipadaṃ nipphādiyanti tesamidaṃ sāmaññena nipphādananti dīpeti,
anya-e0806n:218_10: dvāre niyutto dovārikoti ettha ṇike dakāravakārānaṃ majjhe okārāgamo,
anya-e0806n:218_16: Atha vaṇṇavikāroti vuttattā javaṇṇassa yādese niyakādayo tāva sijjhantu,
anya-e0806n:218_18: Aññathā vaṇṇasamudāyādesassa visuṃgahaṇe chabbitopattiyā ‘pañcavidhaṃ nirutta’nti saṅkhyāniyamo na yujjeyyāti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n:218_22: Mayūroti ettha ravati mayūrarāve eva vattate,
anya-e0806n:222_0: Yantaṃ saddānaṃ niccasambandhittepi pakkantavisayattā taṃsaddo yaṃsaddaṃ nāpekkhatetyāha-
anya-e0806n:222_2: taṃ saddo hi pakkanta visayo tathā pasiddhavisayo anubhūtavisayo ca yaṃsaddaṃ nāpekkhate,
anya-e0806n:225_0: Etissā gāthāya amhehi vitthāritanayena gahetabbaṃ, yathā rahanti sakammākammadhātūnamanurūpaṃ.
anya-e0806n:227_0: Kiñcāpīdaṃ idaṃkiñcāpi (potthake) vikappanatthaṃ katanti heṭṭhimena ni(nnāna)ttaṃ viññāyati,
anya-e0806n:227_2: heṭṭhime pana kvacādhikārā hakārantadhātuto dhyaṇpaccaye mehyaṃ,
anya-e0806n:229_3: soyamattho sumaṅgalappasādaniyā khuddasikkhā ṭīkāya‘ādito upasampannā’ti ettha amhehi vuttanayena veditabbo,
anya-e0806n:231_0: Yaṃvattateti vuttivacanaṃ nikkhipitvā tassa atthaṃ vattumārabhate ‘sambhavāpekkhāye’ccādi,
anya-e0806n:231_1: yaṃvattateti ca sutte avijjamānepi gammamānatthassa saddassa payogampati kāmacāroti vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:231_2: yasaddassāniyamatthavuttittepi padavākyato nāññaṃ sambhavati vicchāyamābhikkhaññe ca vattamānanti āha ‘sambhavāpekkhāyapadaṃ vākyaṃvā’ti,
anya-e0806n:231_5: tasmiṃ apekkhāya padaṃ vākyaṃ vā vattateti sambandho,
anya-e0806n:231_7: nanu padassa vākyassa vā visuṃyeva dabbādayo atthā,
anya-e0806n:231_8: taṃ kathamida metasmiṃ vattudhamme kiriyādhamme ca vicchābhikkhaññatthe vattateti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha-
anya-e0806n:231_10: vicchāya vattudhammassa kiriyādhammassa cābhikkhaññassa visayo padaṃ vākyaṃ vā…
anya-e0806n:231_13: abhidhāyakattena ceti gocarattena pakāsakattena cāti attho,
anya-e0806n:231_14: yaṃvattateti ajjhāhaṭassa yanti paṭhamantassa vibhattivipariṇāmaṃ dasseti (tassāti) ādinā,
anya-e0806n:231_17: kathaṃ dve iccādesaniddesā ādeso ca sambandhīnamapekkhate,
anya-e0806n:231_20: tasmā vicchābhikkhaññesu yaṃ padaṃ vākyaṃ vā vattate tassa dve bhavanticcevaṃ chaṭṭhīyattho sakkā vattu”nti,
anya-e0806n:231_21: dve rūpāni hontīti dassitaṃ hotīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n:231_22: saddarūpe saṅkhyayyeti dutiyā bahuvacanantaṃ paṭipādayamānoti ettha paṭipādanakiriyāya sambandhenopadiṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0806n:231_23: “vākyantaraṭṭhopi saddo tadaññasmimpi sambandhamupayātī”ti dvisaddoti idaṃ upari vākyadvayepyupayujjati ‘dvisaddo vutto,
anya-e0806n:231_25: atha sarūpappadhāno kasmā na vuttoti āha-
anya-e0806n:231_27: atha dveti sāmaññena vuttattā padavākyānaṃ ṭhāne dvibbacanaṃ vā siyā,
anya-e0806n:231_29: tathā sati ‘yaṃvattate tassā’ti kasmā paṭhamameva nissāya vuttiyaṃ vivaraṇaṃ katanti āha-
anya-e0806n:231_33: tusaddo pubbasmā pakkhā visesassa padassako visesanattho (potthake),
anya-e0806n:231_37: yaṃ “ādasahi saṅkhyā saṅkhyeyye vattante”ti vacanato saṅkhyeyyavacano,
anya-e0806n:231_38: tasmeha saṅkhyeyyaṃ saddarūpaṃ vā siyā āvutti vā,
anya-e0806n:231_39: iccapi niddeso tadubhayamapekkhiya napuṃsakaliṅgena vā siyā itthiliṅgena vā,
anya-e0806n:231_43: tadā saddassāvuttī uccāraṇalakkhaṇā kiriyā saṅkhyeyā bhavanti,
anya-e0806n:231_45: tadā dvippayogo dvibbavacananti esa pakkhoti ayamettha bhāvo” yadā dve āvuttiyo vidhīyante tadā dvippayogo dvibbacanante sopekkho,
anya-e0806n:231_46: (atra ṭhānyādesabhāvo natthi) natuṭṭhāne dvibbacanapakkho (potthake) āvutti hi kiriyā,
anya-e0806n:231_48: na ca kiriyāya sādhanassa ca ṭhānyādesabhāvo upapajjate,
anya-e0806n:231_55: te hi dutiyampi pakkhamabbhupagamma upacāramattato bhedo,
anya-e0806n:231_59: ṇyo nasiyāti “tassa bhāvakammesu tta tā ttana ṇya ṇeyya ṇiya ṇiyā”ti (4-
anya-e0806n:231_60: 59) bhāve vidhīyamāno ṇyo dvippayogapakkhe saddabhedasabbhāvā puna puneti samudāyasabhāvato punapuna
anya-e0806n:231_61: bhāvoti atthe punapuna samudāyato na bhaveyyāti attho,
anya-e0806n:231_63: atha kho ekapadantogadhānaṃ sarānaṃ sarānamādibhūtassukārassa bhavanto okāropi “sarānamādissā yuvaṇṇassā eo ṇānubandhe”ti (4-
anya-e0806n:231_68: pubbapakkhepi hi dve saddarūpānyevādisīyanteti hoteva pada bhedo,
anya-e0806n:231_74: aññatheti upacarito bhedo na sabhāvatoti ce,
anya-e0806n:231_75: kāriyambhavatīti evi na sakkā vattunti sambandho,
anya-e0806n:231_76: sabhāvato tvabhedo vāti upacārābhāvena vatthuto vijjamānabhedamavadhārayati,
anya-e0806n:231_78: āvuttiyeva na siyāti etthāyamadhippāyo “yadi sabhāvatova bhedo bhinnassa pana kathamāvutti siyā”ti,
anya-e0806n:232_6: tenāti yena bahuvacananiddesena sakiṃ byāpanicchā jotīyati tena karaṇabhūtena hetubhūtena vā,
anya-e0806n:232_8: tattha ayañca gāmo ramaṇīyo ayañca gāmo ramaṇīyoti kamena byāpitumicchā,
anya-e0806n:232_12: natthi sākallena kamena (potthake) byāpitumiṭṭhattanti sakalabyāpanicchāyābhāvoti na dvibbacanaṃ,
anya-e0806n:232_17: ekamatthaṃ ñāpayissāmīti jātisaddo payujjate ane katthanissayāca vicchā,
anya-e0806n:232_30: tassa saddassa yaṃ rūpaṃ atta bhāvo,
anya-e0806n:232_31: tameva paccāsatyā “sutānumitesu sutasambandhova balavā”ti vicchā bhikkhaññesu vattamānassa sutasseva
anya-e0806n:232_32: tassa rūpassa paccāsannabhāvato dvisaṅkhyā yuttaṃ dvisaṅkhātāya saṅkhyāya ‘rukkhaṃ rukkha’miccevaṃ yuttaṃ
anya-e0806n:232_36: tathāhi sabbeyevetettha vicchāyaṃ dvittehyabhidhayanteti bahattā bahuvacanaṃ pappoti,
anya-e0806n:232_37: ekavacanantu na sijjhati ‘rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ siñcatī’ti ekatthābhidhānabhinnasabbarukkhappatītīti kathamekavacanantassa dvibbavacanantī āsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n:232_39: atthasāmatthiyāti ‘bahuvacanantappayogehi’ccādinā vakkhamānanayena bahuvacanantappayogeneva vicchātthajotanato na tattha dvībbacanaṃ siyā,
anya-e0806n:232_41: e) kavacanattamantarena na cātthi dvibbacanāvakā soti patīti balāvagato yo- ttho,
anya-e0806n:232_51: ato yevāti bahuvacanantassa saddasattiyā vicchājotanato dvibbacanābhāvāyeva,
anya-e0806n:232_54: tattha kiñci sātthakānaṃ saddayogapajjamatthayoga pajjaṃ na sambhavatīti,
anya-e0806n:232_55: yugapadi adhikaraṇaṃ dhavādi attho yassa sodhavakhadirapalāsasaddo yugapadādhikaraṇo,
anya-e0806n:232_59: taṃ sahavacanicchāyanti iminā dassitanti tassaṃ sahavacanicchāyañca sati,
anya-e0806n:232_60: sobhanā dhavakhadirapalāsā sobhanā rukkhāti sobhanaguṇayogepi bahuvacaneneva vicchājotanato dvibbacanābhāvoti,
anya-e0806n:232_61: sobhanaṃ dhavakhadiranti pana satīpi saddayogapajje samāhārattā natthatthayogapajja nātvayāgapajja (potthake)
anya-e0806n:232_62: nti ekavacanantattā dvittappasaṅgepi sobhanaṃ dhavakhadiranti saddānaṃ sakiṃ byāpanicchāyābhāvā na dvibbacananti
anya-e0806n:233_3: atthevānupubbiyepi vicchā tatova dvittanti paṭipādaya ‘mānupubbiya’miccādinā ‘atthiyeveccādino vuttivākyassa vivaraṇamāha.
anya-e0806n:233_4: Gāmajātiyā tulyajātiyānaṃ disā desādibhedena bhinnānamiva gāmānaṃ,
anya-e0806n:233_11: na hi gogoti vutte (vāhīka)gatā vicchāvagamyateti ācariyajinindabuddhinā ānupubbiye vicchāyābhāvaṃ paṭipāditaṃ,
anya-e0806n:233_12: taṃ vighaṭayituṃ ‘yadi hi’ccādinā yaṃ vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:233_17: yassūparibhāgo atthi tampi mūlanti mūla byapadesassāpekkhā katattamāha,
anya-e0806n:233_19: tathā aññepi mūlaggabhāgāti iminā mūlaggabhedānaṃ heṭṭhā viya gahaṇe sati bahuttamāha,
anya-e0806n:233_21: idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “mūlādīnaṃ bāhullena thūlādi guṇayogammantvā sattamīvibhattiyuttena mūlādisaddasahitena
anya-e0806n:233_22: sabba saddena mūlādikamatthamabhisaṃharitvā sabbasmiṃ mūle thūlā sabbasmiṃ agge sukhumāti evaṃ (vattuno)
anya-e0806n:234_0: Jeṭṭhānaṃ vicchāsambhave sabbakaniṭṭhassa jeṭṭhattābhāvānuppaveso na siyāti ānupubbiyamattavacanicchāyaṃ
anya-e0806n:234_9: vatticchādibandhaneti vattuno icchā nibandhanaṃ kāraṇamassāti samāso,
anya-e0806n:235_3: atthappakāraṇādyanapekkhassa padassa atthe sakatthe avadhāriyamāne ettakameveti gammamāne anekasmiṃ diyyamāne
anya-e0806n:235_5: ayampanesamadhippāyo ‘māsakaṃ māsakaṃ imamhā kahāpaṇā bhavantānaṃ dvinnaṃ dehī tyatra dve eva māsā dātumicchitā,
anya-e0806n:236_0: Cattāro vihayo guñjā, dveguñjā māsako bhave;
anya-e0806n:238_1: tattha na sabbe kahāpaṇa sambandhino māsā dānakiriyāya byāpitā,
anya-e0806n:238_9: avadhāraṇe patīyamāneti kahāpaṇasambandhini bahumhi māsakasamudāye māsakadvayanicchaye viññāyamāne sati,
anya-e0806n:238_10: avisesena sāmaññena māsānaṃ dehīti dānakiriyāya byāpanā bhāvāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n:238_18: tadanu pana imamhā kahāpaṇātisaddantarasambandhe sati yadi kahāpaṇasambandhya na vasesamāsakavicchā pariggayhati
anya-e0806n:238_20: imamhā kahāpaṇāti pana avadhipañcamīniddesato kahāpaṇato dvayameva gahetvā bhavantānaṃ dvinnaṃ dehīti
anya-e0806n:239_3: pubbapaṭhamānaṃ pubbapaṭhama saddānaṃ atthātisayo yo atthassa pakaṃso,
anya-e0806n:239_5: sabbapaṭhamabhāvasaṅkhāta atthātisayamattāva vacanicchāti na ettha vicchāti tesamadhippāyo,
anya-e0806n:239_6: vikasanakiriyāya pākakiriyāyāti vuttepi vikāsakaraṇakiriyāya pākakaraṇakiriyāyāti atthasambhavato ‘pubbaṃ pubbaṃ puppha’nti tyādo,
anya-e0806n:239_8: paṭhamaṃ paṭhamaṃ vacanaṃ karontīti kiriyāvisesanavasena attho daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n:239_9: pubbāti matā paṭhamābhimatāti iminā pubbapaṭhamabhāvenābhimatānaṃ bahutta byāpanena vicchāsabbhāve kāraṇamāha.
anya-e0806n:240_0: “Ḍatara ḍatamānaṃ samasampadhāraṇāyamitthīnigade bhāve dve bhavantīti vattabba”nti (8- 1- 12-
anya-e0806n:240_8: tasmiṃ itthiliṅge bhāve vattamānānaṃ ratararatamantānaṃ dvibbacanamabhimatanti sambandho,
anya-e0806n:240_11: samena aḍḍhatādinā guṇena ime ubho aḍḍhā itvevaṃ rūpā sampadhāraṇā nirūpanā avabodho samasampadhāraṇā,
anya-e0806n:240_14: aḍḍhatāya bahuvidhattābhāvā kiriyādiyo gābhāvā ca natthettha vicchāti tesamadhippāyo,
anya-e0806n:240_15: pucchiyamānāti iminā ime ubho’ iccādīnaṃ pucchāvākyataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0806n:241_2: iminā ākhyātādīnameva kiriyājotakapadabhāvena ponopuññasaṅkhātakiriyā dhammassa dhanasameva visayattaṃ dīpeti,
anya-e0806n:241_3: atisayavisiṭṭhanti iminā papacatisaddepakāro pakaṃsattha jotako upasaggoti dasseti,
anya-e0806n:241_10: 62) miccevāti evakārena paresamivāyamapyābhikkhaññe paccayo ce vidhīyate,
anya-e0806n:241_11: tadā papacatiiccatra viya ābhikkhaññe vidhīyamānena paccayeneva ābhikkhaññatthassa pakāsitattā na dvibbacanena bhavitabbanti dasseti,
anya-e0806n:241_12: yadā tu bhusaṃ punappunaṃ pacatīti vacanicchā tadāpi papacatīti bhavatyeva.
anya-e0806n:242_1: ābhikkhaññe iccevāti iminā anukaraṇamattamevetaṃ natthetthābhikkhaññanti pāṇiniyā suttantarena dvittampaṭipādenti,
anya-e0806n:242_4: evamaññate “paṭaiccetamanukaraṇaṃ bhavana kiriyampati vattatīti bhavanakiriyāmatī vuttīti (potthake) kiriyādhammaṃ ponopuññamettha atthevā”ti,
anya-e0806n:242_8: rāppaccayoti paṭhamaṃ dvitte kate pacchā rāppaccayo,
anya-e0806n:242_11: dīgho niccanti paṭhamaṃ dvitte paṭapaṭakarotīti ṭhite niccaṃ dīgho,
anya-e0806n:242_12: paṭapaṭā karotīti ettha nipphattiṃ dassetvā idāni paṭapaṭāyatīti ettha dassetuṃ paṭapaṭāyatītiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0806n:244_0: Ekassa ekassa iti ṭhite pubbavibhattiyā lutte saṃhitāyañca katāyaṃ ekekassa,
anya-e0806n:244_1: evaṃ matthakena matthakenāti ṭhite matthaka matthakenāti.
anya-e0806n:246_0: Aññaṃ aññanti ṭhite iminā vibhattiyā lope akārassa “tadaminā” (1-47) dinā okāre aññoññantipi hoti.
anya-e0806n:250_0: Kvaci pavatyappavatti, kvacaññaṃ kvaci vā kvaci;
anya-e0806n:256_6: pañcikāyantu tabbisesana vasena ca paccayatthavisesanavasena ca attho dassito,
anya-e0806n:256_9: tathā byācikkhissāma “yadi panettha vutyānukūlā pañcikā bhaveyya paccayatthapakkho jahitabbo siyāti ‘te…pe…
anya-e0806n:256_11: yojaniya’nti ca etesaṃ jahitabbatāya bahupāṭhavilopo āpajjati,
anya-e0806n:256_12: yadi pana pañcikānukūlā vutti bhaveyya vuttiyaṃ kiñcimattaṃ pakkhipitabba mattameva siyāti bahuvilopāpatti
anya-e0806n:256_13: (na) hotīti etesaṃ dvedve honti ekāne katthesu vattamānato nāmasmā’ti vuttiyā bhavitabba”nti,
anya-e0806n:256_15: sutte ‘dvedvekānekesu nāmasmā’ti vuttattā ‘ekānekesū’ti idaṃ paccayavisesanaṃ vā yujjati
anya-e0806n:257_3: tathāhyekādīsu bhavantā pakativāccānamevekattādiabyati rittaatthamattādīrūpānaṃ jotakā syādayo kathamekattādīsu
anya-e0806n:257_5: tathā itthiṇādippaccayādīnampi pana pakativisesānupādānepi yato dhātvādi vāccottho natthi,
anya-e0806n:257_7: dhātutyādyantehi tyādyanta vāccehi (potthake) na honte vittipaccayā,
anya-e0806n:257_10: yadetampakativisesanaṃ tadāpi sāmatthiyeneva ekattādīsu vattamānato nāmasmā tajjotanāya bhavantā syādayo
anya-e0806n:257_11: kathamaññattha honti asambhavāti ekānekesu dvedveti labbhati,
anya-e0806n:257_12: athavā sarūpena avuttampi sāmatthiyenekānekatthesūti gammamānaṃ vuttameva hotīti katvā‘tecā’tiādikaṃ vuttanti gahetabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n:257_13: ekānekesu vattamānato nāmasmāti kimatthaṃ asatvabhūtāya kiriyāyekattādisambandhābhāvā kriyatthāca tyādīhi
anya-e0806n:257_14: yevekattādīnaṃ vuttattā tyādyantehi ca na bhaveyyunti payojanantaramāha-
anya-e0806n:257_17: Tathāhi saṅkhyākammādayo nāma vāccassa dabbassa dhammo sakattho-
anya-e0806n:257_20: tattha dabbavācinā saddena dabbadhammānamabbhantarīkaraṇanti nāyuttametaṃ nāmena pañcannamabhidhānaṃ,
anya-e0806n:259_0: Samavetaṃ vade liṅgaṃ, saṅkhyaṃ kammādikammi ceti.
anya-e0806n:260_1: tenāti yena pañcako nāmattho adhippeto ekādīsu ca atthesu jo-
anya-e0806n:260_4: sabhāvatotyādikassāyamadhippāyo “yadyapi syādayo ekānekesu honti tathāpi ekādayo saṅkhyāya paricchinne atthe vattanti na saṅkhyāmatte,
anya-e0806n:260_5: saṅkhyāya sambhavābhāvā saṅkhyeye bhavatīti na saṅkhyāpi syādīnamattho”ti (na) kevalaṃ sakattha dabbādiyeva syādīnamattho na bhavati,
anya-e0806n:260_7: anena saṅkhyā vibhatyattho catukko nāmatthotyayampakkho nirākato pañcako nāmatthoti dassane saṅkhyākammādīnaṃ vibhattiyo jotikā honti,
anya-e0806n:260_8: tiko nāmatthoti dassane tu saṅkhyākammādayo vibhattivāccā honti,
anya-e0806n:260_10: tattha sakattho visesananti sarūpādi yaṃ kiñci visesanattena vattumicchitaṃ taṃ sakattho nāmati attho,
anya-e0806n:264_0: Bhāvābhāvasabhāvo yo, so guṇo nigguṇo mato.
anya-e0806n:267_0: Idāni sarūpādino visesanassa sakatthabhāvaṃ jātyādivisesassa dabbabhāvañca dassetuṃ ‘tatthā’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n:267_3: ettha pana goti jātimattavācini gosadde payutte gosaddo jātimattamāheti so jātiṃ viseseti nāma.
anya-e0806n:267_4: Yaṭṭhiādisaddehi yaṭṭhiādisahacaritā upacārato gahitāti yaṭṭhiādidabbehi yaṭṭhiādisahacaritā purisā visesīyantīti āha-
anya-e0806n:267_6: yaṭṭhiyopavesayāti yaṭṭhisaddavacanīya yaṭṭhidabbavisiṭṭhe purise pavesayāti attho,
anya-e0806n:267_10: sambandhanimittoti sambandho nimittaṃ kāraṇaṃ paccayappavattiyā assa paccayassa soti samāso,
anya-e0806n:267_11: ettha hi daṇḍo assa atthīti assāti sāmino purisassa saṃsaṅkhātadaṇḍādidabbena sahayo sassāmisambandho,
anya-e0806n:267_15: (kiri)yā padatthassāpi visesanattena sakatthabhāvo jātipadatthādīnaṃ vutta ṭhāneyeva vattabboti pācakoti
anya-e0806n:267_16: ettha kiriyākārakasambandhasaṅkhātaṃ parābhimataṃ sakatthampi paropadesenopadisitukāmo idha sambandhasakatthassa
anya-e0806n:267_18: Nāmasabhāvena viññāyamānaṃ pañcamaṃ nāmasaṅkhātamatthaṃ dabbapadatthena saṅgahetvā jātiguṇakiriyādabbānīti hi catubbidho nāmattho,
anya-e0806n:267_19: nāmampi anvattharuḷhivasena duvidhaṃ pumitthinapuṃsaka liṅgavasena tividhampi catubbidhaṃ hoti…
anya-e0806n:267_21: te vā attani nāmetīti iminā kāraṇena.
anya-e0806n:267_29: atoti ādesa bhavanato phalaṃ dassitaṃ na siyāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n:267_30: vuttiyaṃ ‘evaṃ kumārī kumāriyo’tiādīsu evanti yathā pulliṅge ikārantato syādīnamudāharaṇamanādesatthaṃ vuttaṃ evamitthiyampi anākārantatoti dasseti,
anya-e0806n:267_33: vacaneti iminā pāṇiniyānaṃ vibhattisaññāvidhāyakassa suttantarassa atthibhāvaṃ dasseti,
anya-e0806n:267_40: kathampanetesu syādīsu vibhajīyaticcassa vākyatthāssānugamo yenevaṃ vuccaticcāsaṅkiya yena yathā ca vibhajīyati tamupadassento āha-
anya-e0806n:269_0: Vuttiyaṃ kattukiriyāyāti kattusādyatāya taṃ sambandhiniyā kattukammaṭṭhāyapi duvidhāya kiriyāya,
anya-e0806n:269_1: anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ karoti ettha sambandhanatthoti āha-
anya-e0806n:269_5: sabbakārakānampi pana kiriyāsambandha sabbhāvepi kiriyābhisambandhīyamānatteneva yaṃ vattumicchitaṃ tadeva kammaṃ viññeyyaṃ,
anya-e0806n:269_6: kattādi kattu kiriyāyābhisambandhīyamānattepi kattādittavacanicchāyeva kammaṃ na hoti…
anya-e0806n:269_8: evaṃ sabbakārakānampi kārakantarappattiyaṃ tadabhāvo yathāyogaṃ vattabbo,
anya-e0806n:269_9: vākyekadesenetyanena “dvedvekā”dino vākyassa “kamme dutiyā”iccādino ca ekavākyattaṃ sūceti,
anya-e0806n:269_10: pakaraṇassa mahāvākyarūpattā vippakaṭṭhānipi vākyāni ākaṅkhādisabhāve aññamaññasambandhānubhavanenekavākyabhāvampaṭīpajjante, vuttī hi–
anya-e0806n:272_2: tena yadyapi tyādinopi dvinnaṃ pūraṇiyā dutiyāti sakkā voharituṃ,
anya-e0806n:272_3: tathāpi syādīnaṃ dukeyeva dutiyātatiyā ruḷhīti natyādīnaṃ dukāni dutiyādisaddena gayhanti,
anya-e0806n:278_0: Satī-satī vā pakati, na yattha pariṇāminī,
anya-e0806n:280_0: Asantaṃ jāyate yaṃ vā, yaṃ santamappakāsati,
anya-e0806n:282_0: Ayamettha attho “kaṭavikārassa kāsasaṅkhātā vijjamānā pakati pariṇāminī kaṭavikārampati pariṇamantī yatthappayoge na nissīyate…
anya-e0806n:282_1: kaṭaṃ karotītettha kevalamatthāvagamamattassa vattumicchitattā kāseti asuyyamānattā ca,
anya-e0806n:282_2: pakatiyā tu suyya mānatte vikāriyaṃ siyā,
anya-e0806n:282_4: taṇḍule odanaṃ pacatīti dvayattho karoti pacati ca,
anya-e0806n:282_5: tasmā kāse karoti taṇḍule pacatīti vikārīyati,
anya-e0806n:282_6: kaṭaṃ karoti odanampacatīti nibbattī yatīti attho,
anya-e0806n:282_7: asatī vā pakati avijjamānattāyeva yattha na nissīyate…
anya-e0806n:282_8: (yathā) (potthake) ( ) saṃyogaṃ janayati vibhāgamuppādayatīti saṃyogavibhāgānaṃ kassāpi pakatiyā avikārattā
anya-e0806n:282_10: tamevambhūtamanissitapakatikaṃ avijjamāna (pakati) kaṃ vā kāriyaṃ nibbattikammaṃ nāmāti eko,
anya-e0806n:282_15: santaṃ vijjamānameva vā kevalamappakāsitapubbaṃ yaṃ uppattiyā abhibyattiyā vā pakāsati,
anya-e0806n:282_18: tadevaṃ kesañci matena anissitapakatikaṃ avijjamānapakatikanti duvidhaṃ nibbattikammampi aññesammatena
anya-e0806n:282_19: asantaṃ jāyamānaṃ santamappakāsamānanti duvidhaṃ nibbattikammampītisabbampi aṭṭhitapubbameva jāyatītyasato
anya-e0806n:285_0: Kiñci vikāriyaṃ kammaṃ pakatiyā kāraṇassa ucchedena sambhūtaṃ,
anya-e0806n:285_1: yathā kaṭṭhaṃ bhasmaṃ karotīti kaṭṭhassāccantaparāvatti parāvattiyā (potthake),
anya-e0806n:285_3: yathā suvaṇṇaṃ kaṭakaṃ keyuraṃ vā karotīti evaṃ dvīdhā sā vikati hotīti attho,
anya-e0806n:287_0: Dassanā vānumānā vā, sā pattīti pakittitā.
anya-e0806n:288_0: Yattha kiriyākato kiriyāsampādito viseso atisayo koci nāvagamyate nappatīyate dassanā vā paccakkhappamāṇena
anya-e0806n:288_1: anumānappamāṇena vā yathā nibbattivikatīnamatisayo paccakkhānumānā vagamanīyo,
anya-e0806n:288_7: devadattaṃ roseti pasādayati veti visiṭṭhamukhavaṇṇādikāriyānumeyyattā rosādino,
anya-e0806n:288_8: evaṃ yattha na visesasiddhi api tu pattimattaṃ,
anya-e0806n:288_11: kathañcarahi asantassa santassa (potthake) pattikammassa kiñci (akaronta)ssa kārakattaṃ,
anya-e0806n:288_12: na hi kiñci akarontaṃ kārakambhavitumarahatīti uccate-
anya-e0806n:291_0: Atra daṭṭhuṃ sakkā iti dassane khamatā ābhāsopagamo visayattopagamo visayattopagamanaṃ byatti ceti evamādayo
anya-e0806n:291_3: ādiccaṃ passatīti ettha hi ādicco daṭṭhuṃ sakkā,
anya-e0806n:291_4: tatova so dissati abhibyattiñcopayātīti dassanakiriyānipphādakatthenāssa kārakattamupapajjate,
anya-e0806n:291_8: pattikammampi kiriyāsambandharūpenāsantameva pacchā tathā bhavatīti nibbattiyevāti saccaṃ-
anya-e0806n:293_0: Tatra yampetaṃ ghaṭate, yathā patīti saddatthāvattānato.
anya-e0806n:294_2: kato kaṭo ccevamādīsu tyādippabhutīhi atihitakammādinissayesupi ekattādīsu dutiyādayo papponti niyamābhāvā,
anya-e0806n:294_3: tathāhi pañcake nāmatthe kaṭādivacanīyassa sambandhī kammādyattho,
anya-e0806n:294_4: tyādippabhutīti anabhi hitassa saṅkhyākhyassāparassa vibhatyatthassābhidhānāya abhihitesupi kaṭādīsu
anya-e0806n:294_12: tathāpyekattādayo nābhihitāti tassa saṅkhyākhyassāparassa vibhatyatthassāti dhānāya abhihitesupi kammādīsu
anya-e0806n:294_16: tatra tasmiṃ dutiyādi vibhattividhāne idaṃ codyaṃ siyā,
anya-e0806n:294_21: dutiyādayo vibhattiyo yathā siyunti jotanāyābhidhānāya cāti yujjamānavasena attho veditabbo,
