anya-e0806n:730_0: Diṭṭhanteniminā imaṃ dīpeti “yathā pañca parimāṇamesanti pañcakāti ettha parimāṇarūpo-
anya-e0806n:732_0: Pakatippaccayatthabhedasambhavāti iminā paresaṃ pakatippaccayatthānaṃ bhedābhāvassa icchitattā saññāyaṃ sakatthe kappaccayassa vidhānaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0806n:734_1: tadattho cettha vikappattho vā siyā tadā pana dvinnaṃ gahaṇe na tiṇṇaṃ,
anya-e0806n:734_4: tadā tu saṃsayassobhayā lambanarūpattā dvevāti vutte tayo,
anya-e0806n:734_5: tayovāti vutte dve apekkhīyantīti buddhivisayā pañca atthā samāsābhidheyyo honti.
anya-e0806n:737_0: Nanu ca samānādhikaraṇānaṃ bahubbīhi vutto pāṇiniyehi ‘pañcahi bhuttamasseti byadhikaraṇānaṃ na siyā’ti,
anya-e0806n:737_1: tathā paṭhamatthaṃ vajjetvā sabbavibhatyatthesu iṭṭho ‘vuṭṭhe devegatoccatra vuṭṭhadevoti na siyā’ti
anya-e0806n:737_2: tasmā kathamatra byadhikaraṇānaṃ paṭhamatthe samāso vaṇṇīyateccāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n:737_4: byadhikaraṇānampi yathābhidhānaṃsamāsasabbhāvato pañcahi bhuttamassetyādo bahulādhikārā anabhidhānato vā na bhavissati,
anya-e0806n:737_7: tathā paṭhamatthepi kvaci na bhavissati vuṭṭhe deve gato’ti.
anya-e0806n:738_6: vā) sabhāvato eva nivatto na suttantarato,
anya-e0806n:738_7: gatatthassāpi hi payoge anavaṭṭhānaṃ siyā piṭṭhapesane viya,
anya-e0806n:739_3: tasmā oṭṭhova mukhamassāti viggayha oṭṭhamukhoti samāso,
anya-e0806n:739_5: mukheneva ca pāṇimukhassa sadisattaṃ pasiddhanti sāmatthiyā oṭṭhamukhamiva mukhamassetyattheva tiṭṭhate,
anya-e0806n:739_7: visayadassanatthāti iminā’kaṇṭhe kāḷo yassā’tyādīkameva vākyanti dasseti.
anya-e0806n:740_9: aya maññapadatthasamāso parehi bahubbīhīti vuccati tathāhi bahavo vihayo yassa so bahubbīhi,
anya-e0806n:742_3: Ekaṃ sādhanaṃ ekaṃ kiriyaṃ vā paṭicca cīyamānatāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n:742_8: Tattha devadatto bhuñjati tiṭṭhati pacaticāti sādhanampaṭicca kiriyānaṃ attarūpabhedena cīyamānatā veditabbā,
anya-e0806n:742_9: dhave ca khadire ca palāse ca chindāti kiriyampaṭicca attarūpabhedena sādhanānaṃ cīyamānatā veditabbā.
anya-e0806n:743_0: Soti samuccayo bhavatīti seso, kesanti āha- ‘tulya balāna’miccādi.
anya-e0806n:744_0: Tulyabalānanti iminā visuṃ padhānabhāvena kiriyābhisambandhā aññamaññānapekkhattamāha.
anya-e0806n:745_3: etthāyamadhippāyo “ettha gavādīnaṃ visuṃ padhānabhāvenānayanakiriyābhisambandhā tulyabalatā gavādīnaṃ
anya-e0806n:745_4: vuttakkameneva nayanābhāvā aniyatakkamatā gavādīnaṃ yugapadi nayanābhāvā aniyata yogapajjatā ca hoti,
anya-e0806n:745_12: taṃ karaṇe yadi gāvopi passati tāpyānayati,
anya-e0806n:746_1: vuttivayena sāriputtasaddo moggallānattho hoti moggallānasaddo sāriputtatthopīti aññamaññatthe padhānato
anya-e0806n:746_3: yamadhikaraṇa samudāyo ubhayapadānugataubhayatthavasena catubbidhopi yugapadi buddhiyā gayhamāno kadāci
anya-e0806n:746_5: nanu ca jananamaraṇānīti viruddhānaṃ kathamekenābhidhānanti vuccate-
anya-e0806n:746_8: tathāpi yathā sāriputtamoggallānāti ettha bahuvacanassaññathānupapattiyā yugapadyadhikaraṇavacanatā hotī,
anya-e0806n:747_0: Bahuttāti kiñcāpi vākye nesaṃ vākyenevesaṃ (potthake) visuṃ bahvatthatā,
anya-e0806n:747_1: na hi sāriputtamānayāti vutte moggallānassāpi sampaccayo bhavati,
anya-e0806n:747_2: tathāpi yato vuttivisaye sahabhūtānamevesaṃ visuṃ bahvatthatā,
anya-e0806n:747_3: tato tattha vacanīyassa atthassa saṅkhyātedena bahuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n:748_0: Ettha ca kiñcāpi itarītarayogassa samāhārassa ca bhāvarūpattā adabbarūpatā,
anya-e0806n:748_1: tathāpītarītarayoge tu yathā guṇavaca nānaṃ sukkaṃ vatthaṃ sukko kambalo sukkā gāvīti nissayabhedato liṅgavacanasiddhi,
anya-e0806n:748_2: tathā taddhammānamabhidhānato nissayato liṅgavacana siddhi veditabbā,
anya-e0806n:748_3: saṃhatippadhānattācekavacananti yadā bahunnaṃ samudāyo tirohitāvayavabhedo saṃghāto pakkamīyate,
anya-e0806n:748_4: tadā samāhārocceva saṃhatippadhānattā ekavacanaṃ hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n:749_33: asi ca satti ca tomarañca piṇḍañcāti viggaho.

anya-e0806n:751_0: Sataṃ vā pasate yesaṃ, keci ānakulā api.

anya-e0806n:752_26: tehi ajjhenavisese ca purise ca upacārāti sambandho.

anya-e0806n:756_0: Ekavīsaticcādino ekañca taṃ vīsaticāti visesanasamāso vā siyā,

anya-e0806n:756_4: sabhāparisāyāti ñāpakato vā samāhāre napuṃsakaliṅgamatra byabhicaratīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

anya-e0806n:759_3: saṅkho ca dundubhi ca vīṇā ca,

anya-e0806n:768_3: tadā pañca kumāriyo samāhaṭāti vākyassātthe vutti siyā pañcakumārītyettha sakapadatthappadhānattā bahuvacanaṃ siyā “ghāpassāntassāppadhānassā”ti (3-
anya-e0806n:768_6: tasmā pañca gāvo sa māhaṭātyetasmiṃ vākye samāsova natthi kammasādhanassānupagamato.

anya-e0806n:770_4: 74) suttayitvā niccaṃ ‘ucchucchāyaṃ salabhacchāya’nti ca nodāharitvā sāmaññena ‘salabhacchāyaṃ sakuntacchāya’nti udāharaṇe dassitepi.
anya-e0806n:772_5: tathāsati napuṃsake so (na siyāti) parikappeti ‘napuṃsakattā ghattameva natthīti cedi’ti.
anya-e0806n:772_6: Tampi neti yathā vuttampaṭikkhipitvā attheva napuṃsake ghattanti napuṃsakattanti (potthake) dassetumāha-

anya-e0806n:772_14: Etaṃ ghanissitaṃ kāriyaṃ naca yuttanti sambandho.

anya-e0806n:776_0: Sakatthapariccāgena kule pavattattāti iminā chaṭṭhīsamāsassa uttarapadatthappadhānattamāha.
anya-e0806n:778_2: Itthiyanti idaṃ nāmavisesanaṃ vā siyā paccayatthavisesanaṃ vā,
anya-e0806n:778_7: Itthiyeva hi esāti liṅgīyati saṅketīyatīti liṅgaṃ.
anya-e0806n:778_8: Itthiyā esāti pasiddhimato atthassa bhāvo sāmaññaṃ bālayuvattādi lakkhaṇaṃ itthattaṃ.
anya-e0806n:783_0: Atthesu yesu esā eso etanti pasiddhi lokassa hoti etāni yathākkamaṃ itthipurisanapuṃsakaliṅgānīti lokena vuccantīti attho.
anya-e0806n:783_1: Evañcakatvā vuccate “liṅgaṃ nānusāsanīyaṃ lokanissa yattā liṅgassā”ti.
anya-e0806n:783_11: Tato veccādinā paccayatthabhāvino ye dosā tesametthanāvakāsoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n:783_13: Iminā idaṃ dīpeti “itthattassa paccayatthatte sati padhānattāssa byatirekalakkhaṇāya chaṭṭhiyā ‘kumārittaṃ (devadattāyā’tibhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n:783_14: tato ca na siyā kumārī) devadattā’ti samānādhikaraṇattaṃ,
anya-e0806n:783_16: Pakatiyattha visesanapakkhe tu pakatiyā itthattavisiṭṭhaṃ dabbamevoccate,
anya-e0806n:783_17: āādayo tu jotakatāti tattha byatirekābhāvā chaṭṭhiyā appasaṅgo ca bahuvacanampi anekattāva dabbassa yuttanti
anya-e0806n:784_3: no papajjate nopapajjeyya (pañcikā) devadattāsaddavacanīyassāpi itthattato abyatirittattā ‘itthattaṃ devadattāyā’ti bhinnādhikaraṇatā na yujjate,
anya-e0806n:784_5: Samānādhikaraṇattameva siyā itthisaddavacanīyato anaññattā devadattā saddavacanīyassa itthī devadattāti.
anya-e0806n:785_1: Tabbatotthassāti idaṃ jayādiccādimatānugāminā nugāmī pana (potthake) vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:785_2: tathā hi te evaṃ liṅgalakkhaṇa māhu (pā, 4- 1-
anya-e0806n:785_3: 3 kāsikāyaṃ) “sāmaññavisesā itthattādayo gottādayo viya bahuppakārabyattiyoti sāmaññāni ca tulyajātiyapadatthasādhāraṇattā
anya-e0806n:785_4: tāni visesā ca añña maññehi vijātiyeti ca visissante byāvattanteti sāmaññavisesā.
anya-e0806n:785_6: bahuppakārā byatti yo yesaṃ sāmaññavisesānaṃ te tathāvuttāti–
anya-e0806n:785_7: (kāsikāvivaraṇa pañjikā.) te hyevaṃ maññante “yathā gottādayo samānajātiyesu sabbesvanuvattante,
anya-e0806n:785_10: Vicittattā pana sāmaññavisesanissayānaṃ byañjakānaṃ kociyeva sāmaññaviseso kenacideva nissayena byañjate,
anya-e0806n:785_12: tattha yenatthena itthattameva byañjate na pumattaṃ nāpi napuṃsakattaṃ,
anya-e0806n:785_13: sā itthiyeva bhavati na pumā nāpi napuṃsakaṃ.
anya-e0806n:785_19: 3 kāsikāvivaraṇapañjikā) tasmā pabbato yathā vuttaitthattavato atthassa abhidheyyassāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0806n:786_0: Atheccādinā yathāvuttadosaparihārāya jinindabuddhinā yadupavaṇṇi taṃ taṃ parikappeti.
anya-e0806n:786_2: Masimakkhitakukkuṭoviyāti yadā koci aññakukkuṭo aññasmā bhīto siyā,
anya-e0806n:786_3: tadā vijayino kukkuṭassa mukhaṃ masiyā makkhetvā upanenti so paṭhamaṃ tato bhītopi puna aññoti mantvā yujjhitumussahate.
anya-e0806n:790_0: Ttimhāti ettake vuttepi ttippaccayantatoti vacane kāraṇamāha-
anya-e0806n:794_4: Itthiyaṃ vattantīti soyamityabhedavacanicchāyaṃ yadā bhariyāsaṅkhātāyamitthiyaṃ vattante,
anya-e0806n:794_5: nadādipāṭhāti vutte viññāyati ‘ākatigaṇattā nadādipāṭho honto evaṃ hotī’ti dasseti,
anya-e0806n:796_0: Puthusaddato saññāyaṃ vīppaccayaṃ samattheti‘puthubhūtā pathavīti hi mahī vuccatī”ti,
anya-e0806n:796_1: puthubhūtāti hi iminā pathavīsaddassa puthusaddabhūtattaṃ viññāpeti,
anya-e0806n:796_2: mahī vuccatīti iminā nadādipāṭhā saññāyaṃ vīppaccayattaṃ,
anya-e0806n:798_0: Parādhikārato paccayassa paravidhināva sāmīpyassa siddhattā sādhīpyavacanassantasaddassa gahaṇamanatthakaṃ
anya-e0806n:798_1: siyāti mantvāvayavavacano yamantasaddo gayhatīti dassento āha-
anya-e0806n:798_8: Pallavitassa rukkhassa pallavānamavayavattaṃ viya samāsato uttarakālaṃ vidhīya mānassa akārassa samāsāvayavattaṃ na virujjhatīti attho.
anya-e0806n:800_2: dve aṅguliyo pamāṇamassāti viggahenevaṃ samāso tato mattappaccaye tagghappaccaye vā tassa “lopo”ti (4-
anya-e0806n:800_3: 123) iminā lope kate visesanasamāsā akāroti dassetuṃ ‘katha’miccādinā yaṃ vuttaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ ‘aññapadatthe’ccādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n:800_7: māne paccayalopavasena vināva appaccayena niṭṭhappattīti mantvā ‘aṅgulasaddo vā’ccādinā yaṃ vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ tattha āsaṅkaṃ viracayati ‘athe’ccādi.
anya-e0806n:800_8: Dvaṅgulasaddassa pamāṇinivattanato kathañcipi aññapadatthatā siyāti ‘yathā tathā aññapadatthe vattatū’tivuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n:800_10: tathā sati kimaṅguli saddā appaccayavidhānenetyāsaṅkiya payojanantaraṃ apadisitumāha-
anya-e0806n:800_12: Aṅgulisaddato appaccaye avihite niraṅguliccādipi siyā tannivattanamettha payojananti dasseti ‘aṅgulisaddanivattanattha’nti.
anya-e0806n:802_0: Dīgharattantyādo nānusiṭṭhattā liṅgavisesassa kathaṃ napuṃsakattameviccāsaṅkiya codeti ‘nanuce’ccādi.
anya-e0806n:803_2: samudāyasaddassāpyavayave vutti sabbhāvato ekadesavacano pubbarattādo rattisaddoccāha-
anya-e0806n:804_1: Pubbā atikkantā ratti pubbarattī(ti ratti saddo) nekadesavacanoti samāsantābhāvo.
anya-e0806n:806_1: Syādilopassiccādinā sulabhasyādi lopato pyasulabhataddhita lopova alopetīminā parāmaṭṭhuṃ yuttoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n:808_0: Rattindivaṃ bhuñjatīti payoge ādheyye bhojanasaṅkhāte apekkhite ratyādayo ādeyyasāpekkhā,
anya-e0806n:808_1: tesampi iminā nipāta nenevātimatā samāsassa siddhīti dassento āha-
anya-e0806n:810_2: nanu dve aṅgulī pamāṇamassa dārunoccādiṃ mukhyo aṅgulisaddogahitoti sambandho sambhavati kimevaṃ vuccateccāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n:810_19: 29) sissākārādesābhāvā niccamokārantarūpaṃ sampajjatīti parikappiyatassāyuttabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ yaṃ vuttaṃvuttikārena,
anya-e0806n:810_26: abyañjanantattāti iminā tiṇṇamesaṃ saddānaṃ sakkate byañjanantattameva bodheti,
anya-e0806n:812_1: iminā sutte kiriya saddābhāvepi vītiharaṇasaddeneva kiriyābyatihāreti labbhatīti dasseti.
anya-e0806n:818_0: Āparicchedāvasānā na pare parena (potthake) tato paraṃ ṇādikāriyavidhānā.
anya-e0806n:820_4: 27) mahato bhāvoti vākye“tassa bhāvakammesuttatā ttana ṇya ṇeyya ṇiya ṇiyā”ti (4- 56) tto,
anya-e0806n:826_0: Apavādavisayepīti “vijjāyonisambandhānamā tatra catthe”ti (3-64) imassa apavādasuttassa visayepi.
anya-e0806n:828_0: Atha vijjāyonisambandhānamityuccamāne vijjāsambandhīnaṃ yonisambandhīnanti kathaṃ vivaraṇamiccāha-
anya-e0806n:828_2: vijjā ca yoni ca vijjā yonī tāsaṃ sambandho,
anya-e0806n:828_3: so yesaṃ atthi te hotādayo mātādayo ca abhedopacāreneha vijjāyonisambandhisaddena gayhantīti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n:828_5: Te ca ltupitādayoti tasaddena parāmaṭṭhā ltupitādayo ca,
anya-e0806n:828_6: atthe kāriyā sambhavā taṃvācako saddo gayhati.
anya-e0806n:834_1: taggahaṇe sati ‘itthiyaṃ vattamāne’ti vuttiganthassa itthisaṅkhāte atthe vattamāneti attho gayheyya,
anya-e0806n:834_5: Atha itthiyanti ettake vutte kathaṃ taggahaṇaṃ siyāti āha-
anya-e0806n:834_7: ekattheti vuttepi itthiyaṃ vattamāneti ayamattho viññāyatīti itthiyanti vacanamanatthaṃ siyāti samatthamaññathānupapattiyanti
anya-e0806n:834_11: Byavacchejjābhāvā visesanamanatthakaṃ siyāti ekattheiccaneneva itthiyaṃ vuttiyā (gamma) bhāvatoti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n:836_0: Vattanaṃ ekasmiṃ atthe adhitthiccādo itthivisiṭṭhe sattamiyatthādo,
anya-e0806n:836_4: Sāmañña gahaṇatthanti iminā mattasaddassa kasiṇatthe pavattimāha.
anya-e0806n:838_0: Evanti iminā itarītarayoge catthasamāsaṃ vibhāveti. Jānijāyā,
anya-e0806n:838_1: saddantarenāti jānisaddena tathāsaddopadiṭṭhena daṃ jaṃ saddantarena ca,
anya-e0806n:840_0: Nanu sutte‘sare’ti ettakaṃ vuttaṃ‘sarādo’ti kathaṃ laddhanti āha-
anya-e0806n:840_3: vaṇṇe parabhūte yaṃ kāriyaṃ vidhīyate taṃ so vaṇṇo ādi yassa taṃ tadādi,
anya-e0806n:840_6: na visuṃ akārenāti dassetuṃ na ākkhātaṃ anakkhāta “byañjane dīgharassā”ti uttarapadādi sarassa rassatta’nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n:842_0: Saññāsaddesucātiādinā avayavatthanirapekkhānampi yathākathañci nipphattiṃ dassento sabbesameva saddānaṃ nipphannavācitañcāttano dīpeti,
anya-e0806n:842_6: na itthi pumanti samāse nipātaneniminā napuṃsakādeso napuṃsakaniddeso (potthake) ti dasseti ‘na itthi’ccādinā. Khī- khaye, khara-
anya-e0806n:842_7: vināse cāti hi etehi ‘na khīyati na kharatī’ti atthe “bhāvakārakesva ghaṇa ghakā”ti (5-
anya-e0806n:842_8: 44) appaccaye’ na khaya na khara’iti ṭhite khattādesoti āha-
anya-e0806n:844_0: Evanti iminā gacchatīti vākye kvippaccayādiṃ dasseti,
anya-e0806n:846_0: Tattha tasmiṃ parabhūte, yassa ca jhattanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n:848_4: Kapotādibhāveti katthaci gharādo kapotavātamaṇḍalikādīnaṃ dassanavasena sabbhāve sati.
anya-e0806n:850_0: Sakatthe vattamānassa sahasaddassāti vattabbe vattamāno tappadhānoyevāti āha-
anya-e0806n:854_0: Samāno pati yassā sapattinī sapattī iti nipphannānamekadeso ‘pattinī pattī’ti dassitoti vattumāha-
anya-e0806n:854_2: Vayasaddassa “saravayāyavāsacetā jalāsayākkhayalohapaṭamanesū”ti gaṇapāṭhato akkhaye vattamānasso manādittā okārantattanti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n:858_0: Tumhe viya dissantīti tumhādī amhādīccādiṃ “sabbādīnamā”ti (3-86) ā.
anya-e0806n:860_0: Gabbhenāti iminā kucchigatena gabbhena saha dvihadayattamassāti dasseti, pubbapadeti dusadde.
anya-e0806n:862_0: Guṇā paṭalā dve padāni assa iti bhavitabbaṃ dve pādā esaṃ dve satāni assa,
anya-e0806n:862_2: dvinnaṃ satānaṃ dvinnaṃ sahassānaṃ vā samāhāroti viggaho.
anya-e0806n:866_0: Dve ca tiṃsā ca, dvīhi vā adhikā tiṃsāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n:875_0: Nanu ca ‘ṇo vāpacce’ti vacanato kathaṃ pakativisayāvagamo siyā.
anya-e0806n:875_1: Yathākathañci pakativisayāvagamepi sāmaññavacanato pana dhammenāpaccantyādo yato kutoci dhammeniccāditopi
anya-e0806n:875_4: apaccavatāti “ṇo vāpacce”ti vasiṭṭhādyatthasseva pariggahaṇāya sāmaññavacanato yo apaccavā tato,
anya-e0806n:875_5: atthato pana asambhavā dabbācakasaddāva sāmatthiyena chaṭṭhiyantā sabbaliṅgavacanā jāyateti viññātabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n:876_5: dhammenāpaccaṃ kassāti pucchitvā devadattassāti apekkhiyamānaṃ vadati.
anya-e0806n:876_8: Na hettha ṇādivutti aññattha nahetakāmantattha (potthake) sāpekkhattā kambalo vasiṭṭhassāpaccaṃ devadattassāti ettha pana vasiṭṭho-
anya-e0806n:877_2: Na hettha sambandho vasiṭṭhassa kambalāpekkhattena apaccassa ca devadattāpekkhattenātthantarāpekkhāya
anya-e0806n:877_3: vasiṭṭhassāpaccena sambandhābhāvāyeva vasiṭṭhassa apaccaṃ vāsiṭṭhoti ṇādivuttiyā bhāve sāmatthiyaṃ natthi,
anya-e0806n:877_4: samatthañhi vasiṭṭhaṃ rājapurisādi samāsavuttiyamekatthattamiva vāsiṭṭhādiṇādivuttiyaṃ ṇādippaccayamupajanayati,
anya-e0806n:878_1: tadā visesato yassāpaccena sambandho tatova janakato so siyāti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n:879_0: Yo janakoti yoyo yassa yassa apaccassa janako.
anya-e0806n:879_2: Siyāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ apaccatthe ṇādippaccayo siyā.
anya-e0806n:879_6: na mūlappakatitoti paramappakatito na hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Hetumāha-
anya-e0806n:880_1: sambandhābhāvā (tādisavacanābhāvā) ca mūlappakatito ṇādippaccayassābhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni mūlappakatitovāssābhimatabhāvaṃ
anya-e0806n:881_0: Kathampanidaṃ viññāyaticcādinā janakassevābyāhitassāpaccena mukhya sambandhamānīya idamayuttantyādinā
anya-e0806n:881_2: evaṃ hiccādi kathaṃpanidamiccādinā yathāvuttassa samattha navākyaṃ,
anya-e0806n:881_3: hiyasmā taṃ disvā tathā pucchito devadattassavātiādinā uppādetārameva niddisati,
anya-e0806n:881_5: tasmā uppādetāyevāpaccena sambajjhati na pitāmahoti yojetvā adhippāyo veditabbo.
anya-e0806n:881_7: tena apaccena saddhiṃ uppādetuyeva janakasseva yogo sambandho paṭipādetuṃ na sakkāti sambandho.
anya-e0806n:882_4: soti yoso yassātyaniyamaniddiṭṭho so ñātuṃ na icchitoti sambandho.
anya-e0806n:882_6: “napatatyanena naraketyapaccanti vuccati apaccenānena yassakassaci avisesenāpatanambhavati narake soso tāya pucchāya ñātuṃ na icchito”ti.
anya-e0806n:882_7: So vāti kassāyaṃ puttoti pucchāyānurodhane so uppādetāyeva ñātumicchitoti sambandho.
anya-e0806n:882_13: yassa taṃ taṃnimittaṃ tasmā katvā (potthake) evaṃ diṭṭhiko hiccādinā yathāvuttaṃ samattheti.
anya-e0806n:883_3: Kasmā evaṃ diṭṭhikoti āha ‘yaṃ nimittaṃ hi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n:883_7: idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “tena byavahitajanitenāpi pumunā pubbajopi narakaṃ na patati so pubbajassāpya paccaṃ bhavati yathāvuttena nibbacanenā”ti.
anya-e0806n:883_11: Pubba pubbabhāve satīti pubbassa pubbassa vijjamānatte sati.
anya-e0806n:883_12: Byavahitena janite apaccepi nimittaṃ apāyāpatakāraṇabhāvo atthiye vāti sambandho.
anya-e0806n:883_17: Abhedopacārenāti pubbapubbabhāve saticcādinā vuttanayena janakassa viya pārampariyenapubbesampinimittatā
anya-e0806n:883_18: vato janakasadisattā janakāva nāma te siyunti evamabhedena upacaraṇato cintanatoti attho.
anya-e0806n:883_20: evamubhayathāpi mūlappakatiyā paccenābhisambandhā kathamanantara manantarādi (potthake) (tattha) potthake
anya-e0806n:885_1: paccasāmaññena ṇādippaccayaṃ vavatthapetvā idāni apaccāditopi hoteva ṇādi sāmaññavidhānā.
anya-e0806n:885_2: So ca bahulādhikārato gurujanāyattattā tanniyogācaraṇena pasatthe yevāpacce byavahitajanitepi itthivajjite siyāti dassetumāha ‘nattādīhi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n:885_4: paccetu nattādīvuttīhi vasiṭṭhādīhi ṇādippaccayo hoti vāsiṭṭhotiādi,
anya-e0806n:886_1: Apacce vidhīyamāno paccayo apaccavatā jāyamāno tassāpaccanti atthe jāyati.
anya-e0806n:886_2: Socāya matthaviseso cha(ṭṭhiyanta) tābhāve kathaṃ siyāti idamettha sāmatthiyaṃ.
anya-e0806n:886_9: Apacceti ekavacanena niddese pumunā napuṃsakena kariyati,
anya-e0806n:886_17: Tassa vacanicchābhāvatoti tassa liṅgavacanassa sutte vattumicchāyābhāvatoti attho.
anya-e0806n:887_0: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ sutte liṅgavacanāvacanicchāyaṃ tassāppadhānattā yenakenaci liṅgādinā niddeso-
anya-e0806n:887_9: bhidheyye vidhi hoticcevaṃ kāriyappaṭipattiyā vattuṃ na iṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0806n:889_0: Satipanāti vākāre sati tu aniccattā ṇappaccayassa.
anya-e0806n:889_4: Pakkhe vākyasamāsāpi siyunti pakkhe samāsavuttiyā eva bādhitattā pakkhantare ṇādivutti na bādhīyatīti vākyavuttiyopi siyunti attho.
anya-e0806n:891_0: Vacchakaccādinā kaccādigaṇaṃ dassetvā tassa vibhāgena nipphattiṃ dassetuṃ ‘vacchādīhī’tiādimāha.
anya-e0806n:891_2: Tattha kaṇhasaddo brāhmaṇe vattamāno ṇānaṇāya nappaccaye uppādayatīti attho.
anya-e0806n:891_7: tesu pāṭhāti taṃsuttappadese “katā ṇiyove”ti pāṭhābhāvepi diccā dīnamākatigaṇattā paṭhitameva nāma tanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n:892_3: Soyeva gāvaṃ sajāti sādhāraṇaṃ vijātivinivattanaṃ sakaṭādivacanaṃ tāyatīti gottanti vuttaṃ, tenāha-
anya-e0806n:892_9: Vacchādayo nattādino apaccassa apaccaṃ tadapaccādi cāti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n:894_2: atthi paṇhiādayo keciyeva kattikādīsu antogadhā hontīti vattumāha-
anya-e0806n:896_3: Tasmā tasmiṃ gaggādikepi parasatthapaṭhite yoyo payogo āgame dissati vaccho aggivessoccādi.
anya-e0806n:896_7: Gottassa gaggavaṃsassa ādibhūtena gaggena upalakkhito gaṇo gottādigaṇo,
anya-e0806n:898_1: Āti nāmavisesanesati “vidhibbisesanantassā”ti tadanta vidhinā akāranto gayhatīti āha-
anya-e0806n:902_2: Jātisaddāeteti idaṃ manusso mānusoti ettha apaccatthābhāve hetuvacanaṃ.
anya-e0806n:902_3: Apaccattho ettha natthevāti ca idaṃ visuṃ manussamānusa saṅkhātassa paccatthassābhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n:904_2: pañcālānaṃ janapadānaṃ rājāti vā evamettha vi(bhāgo) veditabbo okkākānaṃ apaccaṃ rājā vā okkāko.
anya-e0806n:907_6: tena sutte rāgāti vuttepi tabbācakā kasāvasaddāti viññāyati,
anya-e0806n:907_7: rāgāti pana tenāti rāgasseva niddiṭṭhepi tabbhāvenā tabbāvakabhāvenā-
anya-e0806n:907_9: tabbācakā ca honto‘tena ratta’nti atthe hotīti kasāvena rattanti viññāyatīti rāgavācino tatiyantattaṃ sampajjati,
anya-e0806n:907_10: tena ‘ṇa rāgā tena ratta’nti vuttepi labbhamānatthavasena vuttaṃ-
anya-e0806n:907_12: Sutte pana rāgena rattantetasmiṃ atthe rāgā rāgavācīsaddā tatiyantā ṇappaccayo hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n:909_1: Sutte ayamattho “induyuttena nakkhattena lakkhito ce kālo,
anya-e0806n:909_2: tadā tena lakkhite kāletyasmiṃ atthe tatiyantato nakkhattā ṇo hotī”ti.
anya-e0806n:909_5: kāleti pana atthaniddesato ṇappaccayādheyyassa kālo ādhāroti viññāyatīti ‘lakkhite kāle’ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:909_6: visessagatavibhattiyā vicāritāya visesana gatā ca (vicāritā) nāmāti āha-
anya-e0806n:909_10: Tasso bhayassapi kālassa candayuttena phussādinā lakkhiyabhāvā lakkhaṇe tatiyā yuttanti vattumāha-
anya-e0806n:910_6: Kattikāya lakkhito muhuttoti ettha candaṃ vinā kattikāya tu kevalāya muhutto kālo lakkhito ‘kattikā muhutto’ti.
anya-e0806n:910_7: Phussena lakkhitā atthasiddhīti ettha phusseninduyuttena atthasiddhi lakkhitā na kālo phussoti.
anya-e0806n:910_8: Nakkhattayuttassa kālassa ratyādivisesāparāmāsena nakkhattavācito uppannassa paccayassa suttantarena
anya-e0806n:910_9: lopaṃ vidhāya puna aññena suttena yuttāti desavidhānena sakaliṅgasaṅkhyāyuttehi-
anya-e0806n:911_0: Ratyādivisesāparāmāsenāti phussī ratti phusso ahoti evaṃ ratyādivisesassa aparāmāsena asammassena aggahaṇena.
anya-e0806n:911_1: Sakaliṅgasaṅkhyāyuttenāti phussakattikādīnaṃ yaṃyaṃ liṅgaṃ yāyā saṅkhyā,
anya-e0806n:911_2: attaniyehi tehi tehi liṅgehi tāhitāhi ca saṅkhyāhi yuttena nakkhattasaddena.
anya-e0806n:911_3: Na tadupalakkhito kāloti kattikā saddobahuvacananto bahutārakattā kattikāya,
anya-e0806n:912_0: Sattamī siyāti nakkhattasaddā taddhitalopantā phussena pāyasaṃ bhuñjeyya,
anya-e0806n:912_1: phusse pāyasaṃ bhuñjeyyā’tyādo ādheyyantarāpekkhā siyā sattamī,
anya-e0806n:912_9: tañca na vinādheyyena hotītyādheyyantarāpekkhāyaṃ tesu sattamīyeva siyā,
anya-e0806n:912_11: Attanodāni dassane sattamiyā appasaṅgaṃ paṭhamāyevopapattiṃ dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n:912_14: Evañcarahi vacanamantarena paresaṃ viya sattamīvidhāyakaṃ kathaṃ kattikāya jātoccāsaṅkiya tampaṭipādetumāha-
anya-e0806n:912_19: Lopenāti kattikāhi induyuttāhi lakkhito kāloti viggayha kataṇappaccayassa lopena.
anya-e0806n:914_5: Yāgasampadānampi loke devatāti pasiddhanti yāgassa yajitabbassa puroḍāsādino sampadānampi paṭiggāhako
anya-e0806n:914_6: pindādi loke deyyassa puroḍāsādino devatā sāmīti pasiddhantyattho,
anya-e0806n:915_0: Mantathomanīyampi devatāti pasiddhanti yena manthena yo thūyate so tassa mantassa devatā sāmīti loke
anya-e0806n:915_1: pasiddhantyattho mahindo yamo varuṇo devatā assāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n:915_6: 21) suttayitvā phussī puṇṇamāsī asmiṃ phusso māso phusso addhamāso phusso saṃvaccharoti saññāyaṃ paṭipādenti,
anya-e0806n:915_7: tena tesaṃ phussī puṇṇamāsī asmiṃ pañcadasaratteti ettha ca bhatakamāse ca taddhito na bhavati.
anya-e0806n:915_8: Idha pana ‘saññāya’nti vacanābhāve bhatakamāsepi chaṭṭhyatthe bhavatītyāsaṅka viracayati ‘bhatakamāsepi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n:915_9: Puṇṇo mā iccatra māsaddo candapariyāyoti āha-
anya-e0806n:915_11: Puṇṇo mā assanti nibbacanāti ettha puṇṇamāsīsaddassa puṇṇo mā assanti nīharitvā vacanāti attho.
anya-e0806n:915_16: bhatakassa bhatiyā kammakārakassa yo tiṃsati ratto māso paribbayaniyamito,
anya-e0806n:916_1: Atoeva ca nipātanāti imasmāva nipātanā, tenevāha-
anya-e0806n:916_4: Assāti sāmaññavacanepi ‘sāssa devatā puṇṇamāsī’ti sutte assāti avisesavacanepi soyeva puṇṇamāsīsadde
anya-e0806n:917_1: Atha addhamāsasaṃvaccharānampi udāharaṇatte nopaññāso kasmā na katoccāha-
anya-e0806n:917_3: Evammaññate “addhamāsasaṃvaccharānaṃ na paccayenojukamabhidhānamapi tu saṃvaccharepi phussādimāsasambhavāsmiṃ
anya-e0806n:917_5: yathā ca phussādimāsassa sambandhī addhamāso phusso addhamāsotyupacārīyate,
anya-e0806n:919_3: kociyeva hotīti hontīti ito bhinditvā ānetabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n:919_4: Tadā desassāti iminā “tadādesā taggahaṇena gayhantī”ti paribhāsamupalakkheti.
anya-e0806n:919_5: Katayādesassāpīti kato yādeso yassa tassa katayādesassāpīti.
anya-e0806n:919_10: 29) ntyādisutte ekova tasaddo bahūhi paccayattehi sambajjhate,
anya-e0806n:919_14: tattha paṭhamaṃ dassento jānaniccādinādhippāyamāvīkatvā dvitaggahaṇamiccādinā padatthamāha.
anya-e0806n:920_1: ‘yo yamadhīte jānāti cā’ti iminā dvitaggahaṇābhāve paccayatthāvayavassa samuccayappasaṅgamāha.
anya-e0806n:920_5: na (jānāti) tattha na siyāti bodhayituṃ byabhicāramāha‘na paccekāti sambandhene’ti.
anya-e0806n:920_6: Yathā “tena kathaṃ kīta”miccādo “tena jitaṃ jayati”ccādi paccekasambandhena bhavati evammāviññāyīti yatheccādi kassāttho.
anya-e0806n:920_7: ‘Tena kataṃ kīta”miccādīhi avatvā “tena jitaṃ jayati”ccādisuttekadesavacanamatthabyatti tathā vutte hotīti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:920_8: tena jitamiccādo jayanādikā kiriyāne kadabbasamavāyittena pasiddhāti yutto tattha paccekābhisambandho,
anya-e0806n:921_7: Yato ca uppannena vidhinā ajjhena ñātu abhidhānampasiddhanti sambandho,
anya-e0806n:921_10: tathā ca vuttaṃ subodhālaṅkāraṭīkāyaṃ pakkantavisayo tathā pasiddhavisayo anubhūtavisayo ca taṃsaddo yaṃ saddaṃ nā pekkhate’ti,
anya-e0806n:921_11: tasmā pasiddhivisayena tasaddena puthageva pasiddhiyā upasaṅgahatthaṃ dvitaggahaṇaṃ kattabba”nti.
anya-e0806n:921_12: Atthattaye vattamānassa tu tasaddassa savisayo viseso tatovātthikehi veditabbo.
anya-e0806n:931_0: Paccayantanāmeti paccayantanāmaṃ yassa sattamyatthabhūtassa desassa hasminti attho,
anya-e0806n:931_1: nāññasseti bhūmādivisiṭṭhatthayuttato aññassa paccayantanāmaṃ na hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n:931_2: Badarā babbajā asmiṃ dese santīti viggaho.
anya-e0806n:937_0: Majjhe bhavo majjhimo, ante bhavo antimo iccādi.
anya-e0806n:939_0: Magadhesu araññe gaṅgāyaṃ pabbate vane kule bārāṇasiyaṃ campāyaṃ mithilāyaṃ sambhavoti viggaho.
anya-e0806n:939_3: Paccayantaradassane sati imināva suttena ito aññatrāpi paccayantarāni hontīti seso,
anya-e0806n:939_4: gāme bhavo udare bhavo pañcālesu bhavo bodhipakkhe bhavoti viggaho.
anya-e0806n:943_10: iminā vīṇādisaddā dabbatthavuttino vādanādikiriyaṃ kiriyā visesañca sippamupacārena vadantīti dīpeti.
anya-e0806n:944_2: kathaṃ vīṇādisaddehi dabbavuttīti vādanā vuccatīti āha-
anya-e0806n:944_8: Kiriyātyāsapubbakaṃ ñāṇakkhamaṃ kosallaṃ vādanakiriyā visayattā vīṇāvādanamiccanena kiriyāsaddena vuccatītyattho.
anya-e0806n:945_3: Phalanirapekkhanti iminā idha loke cīvarādihetu paṇidhāya paṃsukūla dhāraṇādiṃ paṭikkhipati,
anya-e0806n:945_7: Ticīvaraṃ sīlamassāti viggaho tesaṃ guḷo paṇyamassāti viggaho tomaraṃ,
anya-e0806n:945_10: Kāmakkhandhakilesābhisaṅkhārā vā upadhi upadadhāti sukhaṃ dukkhaṃvāti katvā.
anya-e0806n:947_2: sutte vuttāya ekasaṅkhyāya vuttamānakā lasseva ca vattumanicchitattāti attho.
anya-e0806n:948_1: Taṃ nānantarīya kattāti upalakkhaṇavasena tesaṃ vacanakālantarānamavinābhāvittāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n:948_2: Hanticcādityādyantassa kiriyāppadhānatte kathaṃ ṇādīnaṃ tadatthe jāyamānānaṃ sādhanappadhānatta miccatra hetumāha ‘sabhāvato’ti.
anya-e0806n:948_5: diṭṭhova sandiṭṭhanti iminā saṃsaddassa visuṃ atthabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0806n:948_7: phaladhammopi heṭṭhimo sakadāgāmivipassanādīnaṃ paccayabhāvena uparimaggādhigamassa upanissayabhāvato pariyāyato dissamānova vaṭṭabhayaṃ nivatteti,
anya-e0806n:949_4: Amanuññampi kadāci sappayojanaṃ yathāsabhāvappakāsanena dassetabbaṃ bhaveyyāti tadabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0806n:949_13: Athavā ehi āgaccha imaṃ dhammaṃ passāti yo appatte-
anya-e0806n:951_2: ukkaṃsenāti ukkaṃsādhānena utkaṃsasādhanena (potthake) ca bhavitabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n:951_7: tattha paccayamudāharaṇena dassetvā vijjāya saha saṃsaggassāvijjamānatte kāraṇaṃ vadati ‘rūpī dhammattā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n:952_6: devadattikoti hi vutte devadattena kītotyayamattho nappatīyate…
anya-e0806n:952_8: avagamo ca nāma sati sāmatthiye siyāti imamatthaṃ saṅkhepato dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n:953_0: Abhidhānalakkhaṇattanti abhidhānaṃ sati sāmatthiye vākye vacanīyassātthassa vuttiyā kathanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvo yesante abhidhānalakkhaṇā,
anya-e0806n:957_0: Pavuttepīti kaccāyanena pavuttanti atthe “aññasmiṃ”tismiṃṇo hotevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n:961_0: Mātāpitunnaṃ mātāpitaroti mātuyā mātāpitaro pitussa mātāpitaro,
anya-e0806n:961_1: na ekamekato dvīsūti ekato ekato vuttanayena dvīsudvīsu atthesu na bhavatīti attho.
anya-e0806n:965_0: Sena rūpena ñātepi visesarūpena aññāto aññātaviseso.
anya-e0806n:965_2: Sambandho sassāmīlakkhaṇo assa atthīti sambandhi kassāti kiṃ saddaniddiṭṭho,
anya-e0806n:965_5: Payogāsambhavāti ayamassoti vutta assappakatiyāpi payogā sambhavā.
anya-e0806n:965_6: Tathāhi yadi yassāccantamajānanaṃ siyā tathā sati sabbathā vatthujānanābhāve pakatiyeva na siyā,
anya-e0806n:965_7: na hi sabbathā aviññātattho saddo payogamaharati,
anya-e0806n:965_8: tasmā sarūpena ñātassa yassa viseso aviññāto,
anya-e0806n:965_11: ssokassa aññāto sesaññassa (potthake) vā kutotivā kiṃ sabhāvo veti hi assakoti.
anya-e0806n:965_12: Kappaccayanto hatthikaiccayannāmadheyyaṃ nāmaṃ yassa hatthiviyāti dassitapaṭibhāgassa so kappaccayantanāmadheyyo.
anya-e0806n:965_13: Abhinivesena vā sijjhanti yathā ajjunādivesadhārini ajjunādisaddenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n:966_0: Paṭimāyāti ettha pūjanatthā eva paṭimā gahitā,
anya-e0806n:966_3: idha pana taṃ sadiso puriso manusso cañcā.
anya-e0806n:966_8: tasmiṃ ākasmikebhidheyyo sati ivasaddatthe vattamānato īyo hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n:968_4: Nanu pañcakaṃ ganthajātanti vatvā aññaṃ vā saṅghādikanti vuttaṃ taṃ kathaṃ pāṇiniyehi viya “saṅkhyāya saññāsaṅghasuttājjhayanesū”ti (5- 1-
anya-e0806n:968_6: “Ādasahi saṅkhyeye vattantī”ti pañcasaddassa saṅkhyeye vuttattā āha-
anya-e0806n:968_11: rūpānīti ca pariyāyantarena āvuttisaddasse vātthaṃ byattaṃ karoti.
anya-e0806n:970_0: Nanu sutte saṅkhyāyanti na vuttaṃ katyādayo ca payogā saṅkhyā parimāṇeyeva dissanti kathaṃ nāmetthāyaṃ vidhīti āha-
anya-e0806n:970_2: Saṅkhyāparimāṇeyevāyaṃ vidhīti kiṃ sadde saṅkhyāparimāṇa visayeyeva vattamāne ayaṃ ratyādiko vidhīti attho,
anya-e0806n:970_3: nanu cettha kiṃ saddo pañhe vattamāno kathaṃ saṅkhyāparimāṇe vattateti vuccate,
anya-e0806n:970_5: tathāpi saṅkhyāparimāṇassa pucchiyamānattā saṅkhyāparimāṇavisaye vattate vāti.
anya-e0806n:970_9: Ayametthādhippāyo “yadākimidaṃ saṅkhyā parimāṇamesaṃ dasannaṃ na kiñci appakamevetanti saṅkhyāparimāṇameva kiṃ saddena nindīyate,
anya-e0806n:970_10: tadāpi saṅkhyā parimāṇassa nindīyamānattā saṅkhyāparimāṇavisayattameveti khepe vattamānāpi kiṃ saddā raticcādi siyā,
anya-e0806n:972_1: 59) kattari kte ñimhi ca bubhukkhito pipāsitoti siddhepi vattamāne payogatthaṃ bubhukkhāpipāsāti pāṭho.
anya-e0806n:977_1: Paṭikkhitte tasmiṃ vidatthimattaṃ ratanamattaṃ vātiādi(nā) yaṃkiñci daṇḍapubbaṇṇādikaṃ paṇṇādikaṃ (potthake) saṃsayitaṃ,
anya-e0806n:977_2: tena mānasaṅkhātassa paricchedassābhāvā kathamete payogā siyunti āsaṅkiya tattha kāraṇamāha-
anya-e0806n:977_4: Tathābhyūhanatoti vidatthimānampamāṇamassa ratanammāna massātyādinā tenappakārena abhyūhanato abhyupagamatoti attho.
anya-e0806n:977_5: Saṃsayo ca nāma ubhayapakkhaparāmasane sati siyāti yathāvuttamabbhūhanaṃ sādhetumāha-
anya-e0806n:977_7: Pakkhadvayehīti vidatthi mānamassa ratanammānamassāti evamādikehi pakkhadvayehi.
anya-e0806n:983_0: Saccutīsāsadasantāya saṅkhyāya paṭhamantāya asmiṃ satasahasse adhikā saṅkhyāti atthe ḍo bhavatīti suttattho.
anya-e0806n:983_2: Nanu ca sutte ‘satasahassa satasahasse ḍo’ti na vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:983_3: tathā sati vuttiyaṃ kathaṃ ‘sataṃ sahassaṃ satasahassaṃ vā’ti vuttantyāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n:983_5: Ubhayathāvagamāti sataṃ sahassanti ca satasahassanti ca ubhayappakārenāvagamā,
anya-e0806n:983_6: ubhayathāvagamo payoga dassanañcettha evaṃ vivaraṇe kāraṇanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n:983_7: Paccayatthena samānajātiye pakatyatthe satīti yenakenaci suvaṇṇakahāpaṇādinā paccayatthena samānajātiye.
anya-e0806n:985_0: Nanu ca saṅkhyāsaddo saṅkhyāne saṅkhyeyye ca vattate,
anya-e0806n:985_1: kathamettha saṅkhyānevasitā vutti yenevaṃ vivaraṇaṃ katamiccāha-
anya-e0806n:985_6: Yatoti vuttayaṃ saddasambandhinā taṃsaddena seti ulliṅgitassa saṅkhyātiatthamupadassiya sāyeva pūrīyatetīmassa
anya-e0806n:985_7: kammabhāvena tiṭṭhatīti dassetuṃ tena pūraṇena pūrīyate’ti āha.
anya-e0806n:986_1: Anenetaṃ dasseti “(na) ghaṭikādīnamiva dabbānaṃ dabbantare nātirittīkaraṇaṃ saṅkhyāya pūraṇaṃ kiñcarahi tassa samappattiyevā”ti.
anya-e0806n:986_3: yāvatā sāti yasmā paccayo vihito tassa saṅkhyāsaddassa parāmāso tassa ca pūraṇena abhedoccāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n:986_5: saṅkhyeyyapūraṇe ḍo na hotīti vatvā tadatthaṃ vibhāvetumāha-
anya-e0806n:986_7: So ghaṭo tāsaṃ ghaṭikānaṃ pūraṇo dabbānaṃ dabbantare nāti rittīkaraṇavasena.
anya-e0806n:988_1: 42) suttena dvitisaddehi tiyappaccayaṃ vidhāya “tiye dutāpi cā”ti (2- 8-
anya-e0806n:988_2: 43) dvitīnaṃ dutādesena dutiyaṃ tatiyanti ca “catuchehi thaṭhā”ti (2- 8-
anya-e0806n:988_3: 41) suttena catuto thappaccayaṃ vidhāya dvittena catutthanti ca nipphāditaṃ.
anya-e0806n:988_4: Idha tathā bhāvena kathaṃ te sijjhantīti āsaṅkiya vuttiyaṃ ‘katha’miccādi vuttanti dassetumāha ‘saṅkhye’ccādi.
anya-e0806n:988_5: Vuttiyaṃ ‘dutiyassā’tiādinā suttekadesā dassitāti tāni sampuṇṇaṃ katvā dassetuṃ ‘dutiyassā’tiādinā ‘catutthatatiyāna’miccādinā ca vuttāni.
anya-e0806n:990_2: Bahuttavisaye payogo na siyāti saṅkhyāvacanassa ekatthe niyatattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n:992_0: Taro hotīti vuttepi tehi taro hotīti viññāyati,
anya-e0806n:992_1: vacchādīhīti sutattā pana vacchādīnanti ca viññāyatīti vacchādīnantiādinā vuttiganthopadassanaṃ.
anya-e0806n:992_5: tasmā kathamatra sabhāvasseva tanuttaṃ viññāyate yenevaṃ vivaṭamiccāha-
anya-e0806n:992_7: vacchādīhi pakatīti paccaye vidhīyamāne tāsaṃ pavattinimittaṃ vayovisesādi,
anya-e0806n:992_11: na ca kisattassa bhāvā dabbe vacchādisaddā pavattante.
anya-e0806n:992_12: Ato tasseva saddappavattinimittassa tanutte yuttaṃ paccayena bhavituṃ,
anya-e0806n:993_2: Dutiyañhi vayaṃ pappontassa vacchassa paṭhamo vayo vacchasaddassa pavattinimittaṃ kiñcimattāvasesaṃ bhavati amumevāha-
anya-e0806n:993_6: Tatiyañhi vayappattakāle dutiyassa vayassa ukkhasaddappavatti nimittassa kiñcimattā vasesato vasissate
anya-e0806n:993_10: yadātu tassa bhāravāhakatte sāmatthiyaṃ mandaṃ bhavati parikkhīṇaṃ,
anya-e0806n:995_0: Samudāyo nāma dvyavayavo vā siyā bahukāvayavo vā,
anya-e0806n:995_1: tattha dvyavayavasamudāyā niddhāraṇe sāmatthiyā ekasseva niddhāraṇaṃ viññāyati tamevānusarati.
anya-e0806n:995_2: Bahukāvayavasamudāyāpye ‘kassa niddhāraṇe’ti sutte ekassāti vacanābhāvepi ekasseva niddhāraṇaṃ viññātabbaṃ
anya-e0806n:995_4: Kataro bhavataṃ devadatto kataro bhavataṃ kaṭhotyādyudāharaṇabahuttena niddhāraṇavācīnamabahutthepi niddhāriyamānavācīhī’ti bahuttena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n:995_8: caraṇasaddā ca kaṭhā yo kiriyāsaddā bhavanti kaṭhādīhi vuttajjhayanatthaṃ yathā sakaṃvatacaraṇakiriyānimittattenājjhetūsu
anya-e0806n:995_9: pavattāti tesaṃ sambandhisaddānaṃ kesañci atthassa kiriyāsaddānaṃ cātthassa asatyapi jātitte jātinibandhanaṃ
anya-e0806n:997_4: Devehi datto brahmunā dattotiādīni kattari karaṇe vā viggahavākyāni.
anya-e0806n:998_1: devalo deviyotiādīnampana vacanantareneva nipphattiṃ dassetuṃ ‘devehi datto’tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n:998_2: Parasaddasatthakārānampi devalo deviyoti vacanantareneva sādhanaṃ sādhanākārañca tesaṃ dassetuṃ ‘kecīhī’tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n:998_3: Ekadesatoyeva paccayamicchanti tena tesaṃ devalo deviyo datti loccādi bhavati.
anya-e0806n:1000_0: Na ca sabbetiādinā bahulādhikāre phalaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n:1000_1: Bhāvasaddo katthaci kiriyāyaṃ vattate ‘bhāve ayaṃ vidhī’ti.
anya-e0806n:1000_12: nenāttho pacceti attha miti vā paccayoti vuccati.
anya-e0806n:1001_0: Nanu ca ‘bhavanti etasmā buddhisaddā’ti vuttaṃ tasmā pavattinimittamubhinnampi bhavati,
anya-e0806n:1001_1: tathāsati ‘saddappavattinimitta’nti saddasseva pavattinimittatā kasmā vuttāti vuccate.
anya-e0806n:1001_2: Pākaṭabhāvena abhidhānābhidheyyasambandhassa saddasseva pavattinimittataṃ vatvā visuṃ buddhiyā nimittassa
anya-e0806n:1001_4: Dabbeguṇoti dabbe vuttiyaṃ guṇo nimittanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n:1001_6: guṇassa jātiyā visuṃ jātinimittassābhāvato nidhittassa bhāvato.
anya-e0806n:1001_9: Tesaṃ devadattādīnaṃ avatthāvisesena avatthābhedena sāmaññaṃ tadavatthā visesasāmaññaṃ. Tenāha-
anya-e0806n:1001_11: Vijjamāno padattho visayo yesaṃ devadattādīnaṃ saññāsaddānaṃ tesaṃ pavattinimittaṃ jātilakkhaṇamācikkhitampaṭipāditanti attho.
anya-e0806n:1002_0: Anena ca devadattādayo saññāsaddāpi samānā jātisaddāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0806n:1003_1: Abhāvassabhedatoti ghaṭapaṭādīnaṃ sambandhīnaṃ bhedena abhāvassa bhedato abhedepi bhedā upacaritā santīti yojanā.
anya-e0806n:1003_4: Niravayavāvijjamānavisayānantiye ākāso viya niravayavā abhāvo viya asantā ca,
anya-e0806n:1003_5: te visayo yesaṃ saddānaṃ tesanti attho.
anya-e0806n:1003_8: brahmaññaṃ jāti cāpalyaṃ nepuññaṃ guṇo vā.
anya-e0806n:1007_9: Anapekkhito kiriyāguṇānaṃ nissayo dabbasaṅkhāto yesanti viggaho,
anya-e0806n:1007_11: tisayattaṃ hontampi nissitānaṃ kiriyā guṇānaṃ vaseneva siyā nāññathāti vattumāha-
anya-e0806n:1008_3: kassa carahi guṇassa go ayaṃ yo sakaṭaṃ vahati, gotaro-
anya-e0806n:1008_5: jātiyā hi niccāyekarūpāya nokkaṃsāpakaṃsayogo sambhavatīti dabbassāpi nātisayasambhavo.
anya-e0806n:1008_6: Tathāhi tulyappamāṇassa guṇakatova mūlato ukkaṃso dissati samānepi hi āyāme vitthāre ca paṭassa kāsikassāññovāggho bhavati māthurassāñño vāti.
anya-e0806n:1008_9: Yadaggena kiriyāguṇānaṃ nissitānamatisayavasena nissayabhūtampi dabbaṃ kathañcidapyatisaye vattati nāma,
anya-e0806n:1008_10: tadagge tabbācikāpi pakati attano vacanīyatthavasena tattha vattatiyeva nāmāti ‘atiyaye vattamānato’ti pakativisesanavasena vuttaṃ, tenevāha-
anya-e0806n:1009_7: tisaye jātattā sakatthikehi yathāvuttanayena pakatyatthabhūtetisayo jotanīyo hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n:1010_1: Ukkaṃso samānaguṇavisayeyeva loke diṭṭho paviṭṭho (potthake) tena sāmaññavacanepi tādithavisayeyeva soyeva kāraṇa vasena hotīti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n:1011_1: tarappaccayo na hotīti eko māthuro dutiyo pāṭaliputtako imesaṃ sukumārānaṃ dvinnameko māthuro-
anya-e0806n:1011_3: ekamaññesaṃ dvinnamukkaṃsetathāññesaṃ dvinnamekassāti evaṃ dvinnaṃdvinnamekekassa ukkaṃse tarappaccayo bhavati,
anya-e0806n:1011_5: tathāhi sukumārattenukkaṃsiyamānānaṃ samudāyānamavayavā māthurā bahavo pāṭaliputtakāpi nikkaṃsiyamānā tathevāvayavā bahavo honti,
anya-e0806n:1011_6: evaṃ māthurā pāṭali puttakehi sukumāratarā’ti tarappaccayena sijjhati.
anya-e0806n:1011_7: Imasmiṃ gāme aḍḍhatarā vāṇijjāccādopi kathitena ñāyena dvinnaṃdvinnamekekassa ukkaṃse tarappaccayo bhavati,
anya-e0806n:1011_8: bahuvacanantu katthaci avayavāpekkhanti sabbaṃ sakkate kicchena sādhenti.
anya-e0806n:1011_9: Iha tu tathāvidhassa suttassā vidhānā “taratamissikiyiṭṭhātisaye”ti tarādīnamatisaye sāmaññena vidhānā sabbattha tarappaccayena sukhasādhanaṃ hotī”ti.
anya-e0806n:1012_6: Pañcasvetesūti etesaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ tarādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ majjhe,
anya-e0806n:1012_9: Issika iyaiṭṭhā sarādī tato (aññato) na honti bahulādhikārā.
anya-e0806n:1014_0: Tassāti sāmaññena vuttepi vikārasambandhīyeva chaṭṭhiyanto gayhati,
anya-e0806n:1014_1: chaṭṭhiyantasambandhīyeva ca vikāro gayhati sambandhavasāti dassetumāha ‘yassā’ccādi.
anya-e0806n:1014_5: rukkhā pupphaphalūpagāti rukkhosadhīnaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vadanti tallakkhaṇenettha rukkho sadhayo na gayhanti,
anya-e0806n:1018_1: Rājaññamanussānampi jātiyamapacce ññassappaccayānaṃ vidhānā vuttaṃ ‘gottappaccayantā’ti āha-
anya-e0806n:1018_9: ṇikaacittāti iminā ṇiko acittavāca keheva dissatīti ñāpeti.
anya-e0806n:1020_1: 13) kaccāyanasuttassāya mattho “tadassaṭṭhānamiccetasmiṃ atthe chaṭṭhiyantato īyappaccayo hotī’ti.
anya-e0806n:1020_2: Tena madanassa ṭhānaṃ madanīyaṃ bandhanassa ṭhānaṃ bandhanīyaṃtyādikaṃ sādhenti.
anya-e0806n:1020_3: Idha pana tathāvidhassābhāvā kathaṃ taṃ sijjhatītyāsaṅkiya ‘madanīya’ntiādikaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:1021_2: 14) kaccāyanasuttassāyamattho “upamatthe āyitattappaccayo hotī”ti tena dhūmo viya dissatīti dhūmāyitattaṃ
anya-e0806n:1021_5: dhūmo viya dissatīti dassito yo kammattho sopi dhūmāyīti kattuvasena sakkā parikappetunti kattusādhanato
anya-e0806n:1021_6: dhūmāyitasaddā sakatthettappaccayepi dhūmo viya dissatīti atthe āyitatthappaccayepi nātthabhedo-
anya-e0806n:1025_0: Pavāse dūragamane sādhu pavāsiko, upavāse ratyabhojane sādhu upavāsiko.
anya-e0806n:1027_2: sapatimhi dhana patimhi sādhu upakaraṇaṃ sāpateyyaṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e0806n:1031_2: Nanu ca yaṃ yassa hoti taṃ tasmimpi hoti (yaṃ yasmiṃ hoti) tassāpi taṃ hoti teneva vuccate-
anya-e0806n:1031_4: tatrañña taraniddeseneva siddhe kimatthamiha chaṭṭhīsattamīnaṃ bhedenopādānaṃ karīyatīti vuccate-
anya-e0806n:1031_6: tattheva chaṭṭhīsattamīnamatthassa aviseso vatthuto (potthake) yathā ‘rukkhesākhā rukkhassa sākhā’ti.
anya-e0806n:1032_0: Nanu ca sambhave byabhicāre ca sati visesanaṃ sātthakaṃ bhavati yathā ‘nīlamuppala’nti,
anya-e0806n:1033_0: Nanu ca suttesu kālo padhānaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0806n:1033_2: tathā hi kāyikaṃvācasikaṃ tyādo na kālasampaccayo,
anya-e0806n:1033_4: atthīti tu vattamānasattāya eva pariggaho kathamavasīyate yena kālavisesanaṃ siyāti. Saccaṃ,
anya-e0806n:1033_5: kintu padatthassa sattābyabhicārābhāvepi atthītivisesanopādānasāmatthiyātra visiṭṭho sattā atthīti visesanattenopāttā,
anya-e0806n:1033_8: atthi ca tassā byabhicāro sāmaññasattāyāti yujjateva visesanavisessabhāvoti maññate.
anya-e0806n:1034_0: Na bhuñjaticcādiviyāti yathā na bhuñjatīti nañssa paṭisedhattā viruddhatthapadassa sannidhāne-
anya-e0806n:1034_1: tthantarassa paṭisedharūpassatthassāvagati padanibandhanassa vidhino abādhikā bhavati,
anya-e0806n:1034_5: Kati payasambhave na pana gomā rukkhavāti yojanā,
anya-e0806n:1034_11: Saṃsatto daṇḍo assa atthiccanena gehaṭṭhitena vijjamānenapi daṇḍena daṇḍīti nābhidhīyatīti vadati.
anya-e0806n:1034_14: bhavaṃ bhaveyyāti yadākadāci bhavanto yadi bhaveyya.
anya-e0806n:1038_0: Dve hontīti iko īceti dve honti,
anya-e0806n:1038_15: asannihitopādhikā atthantā ca ika īppaccayo bhavatītyattho.
anya-e0806n:1039_8: Tīsu vaṇṇesu bhavo tadantogadhattā tevaṇṇikoti bhavatthe ṇiko.
anya-e0806n:1040_1: taṃ brahmaṃ nibbānaṃ dhammaṃ vā tepiṭakaṃ caratīti brahmacārī, yati.
anya-e0806n:1040_7: Padumagaccha pokkharaṇīnaṃ vācakassāti iminā padumāni assaṃ santīti paduminīti pokkharaṇīpi vuccatīti dasseti.
anya-e0806n:1042_0: Ihāpi pasajjeyya madhu asmiṃ ghaṭe atthīti etthāpi payoge madhuranti rappaccayo pāpuṇeyya madhumhi abhidheyyati adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n:1042_3: tathāpi ñusādivato paccaya(ttha)ttena vacanicchābhāvā ñusavā ghaṭoccādi na sijjhati tasmā pahūtādivisayātthitāsambhavepi taṃvato-
anya-e0806n:1042_4: tthassa paccaya(ttha)ttena ñusaro desoti vattu micchāyaṃ paccayo yathā siyā aññatramābhaviccevamattho veditabboti āha-
anya-e0806n:1044_0: Parehi vācāsaddā ālo vihito nindāyaṃ, neha tatheti codanamubbhāvayati ‘nindāya’miccādinā.
anya-e0806n:1050_0: Akārādeso ca ṇasanniyogenāti iminā yattha ṇakāro tatthevāyamakārādesoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n:1050_1: Upādānatoti iminā nissayakaraṇameko satthiyo ñāyoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n:1050_2: Antassa avidhānasāmatthiyācāti iminā satipi pubbalopena payoga nipphattiyaṃ akāraṃ vidhāya tassa lopo niratthakoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n:1052_0: Kappo yogyatā assa atthīti kappiyo, jaṭā hānabhāgo, senā assa atthīti viggaho.
anya-e0806n:1054_0: ‘Ohāka cāge’ iti sakakārassa hādhātuno payoge toppaccayaṃ nisedhetvā‘satthā hīyate satthā hīno’ti udāharaṇaṃ dassitaṃ. Tenāha-
anya-e0806n:1054_4: 119) vutto cīppaccayo avasāne ye santi viggaho.
anya-e0806n:1054_7: Kaccāyane tu toādīnaṃ vibhatti saññattā na tato puna vibhattuppatti.
anya-e0806n:1056_0: Vuttiyaṃ ‘etassa ṭa eta’ iti atoiccatra etassa ṭādeso etto iccatra etaādesoti attho.
anya-e0806n:1058_7: apañcamyantā pana “ādyādīhī”ti sutte sasaṅkhyassādisaddassa gahaṇena taṃsadisā sasaṅkhyāevopalakkhīyantītipi
anya-e0806n:1058_8: viññāyeyya tato apañcamyantehi abhyādīhi to na siyāti abhitoccādi na sijjhatīti “abhyādīhī”ti suttanti
anya-e0806n:1060_0: Nanu ca toicceva sāmaññena suttite yatokutoci pañcamyantā vā apañcamyantā vā bahulaṃ vā tomhi iṭṭhappasiddhīti kiṃ ādyādīhīti suttenāti saccaṃ,
anya-e0806n:1060_1: tathāpi vibhāgena dassite vibhāgaso visesāvasāyo siyāti na dosoti.
anya-e0806n:1062_0: Pubbenevāti “sabbādito” (4-99) ccādināva. Etassāti etasaddassa, imassāti imasaddassa.
anya-e0806n:1066_0: Yatrāti vutte yatthāti uppalakkhitameva siyāti na vuttaṃ. Evamuparipi.
anya-e0806n:1068_0: Hiñcanaṃ vidhīyate “hiṃ haṃ hiñcana”nti (2-5-9) suttena. Hiñciādīnanti hiñcidācirahaciādīnaṃ.
anya-e0806n:1074_3: Ettha pana mammatāḷanaṃ nimittaṃ pāṇa haraṇaṃ nimittī,
anya-e0806n:1074_5: Upari tyādikaṇḍe karahasaddo tu cisaddasaṃyuttova dissati karahacīti.
anya-e0806n:1076_3: tattha yadi sopi gayheyya dabba guṇānaṃ liṅgasaṅkhyāhi yogā dhāppaccayanta(mpi tabbisayoyeveti) cettha
anya-e0806n:1076_8: kiriyāvisaye tu tasmiṃ gayhamāne ekadhābhuñjati dvidhābhuñjati dvidhāgacchaticcādo bhojana gamanādikiriyāya
anya-e0806n:1076_9: sabbathā liṅgasaṅkhyāhi yogābhāvā yathāvutta doso na siyāti pāṇinīyavuttikārena jayādiccena kiriyā visayoyevettha
anya-e0806n:1077_1: Rūpa rasa gandha phassa saṅkhyāparimāṇa puthuttasaṃyogavibhāga parattāparattabuddhisukhadukkhecchādosapayatanā ca guṇā,
anya-e0806n:1077_2: casaddena gurutta davattasinehasaṅkhāradhammādhammasaddā ceti catubbīsati bahudhā guṇo.
anya-e0806n:1077_3: Atrāpi yathāvuttakāsikāvuttiyā pañcikākārena jinindabuddhinā navadhā dabbaṃ bahudhā guṇotyatrāpi “kiriyājjhāharitabbā
anya-e0806n:1077_4: navadhā dabbaṃ bahudhā guṇo upadisīyati viññāyati byākhyāyate vijjatevā”ti kiriyāvisayoyeva pakāro paṭipādito,
anya-e0806n:1077_5: payogadassanato byavacchejjabhāvā sabbattha kiriyeveti visesanopādānamayuttanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n:1078_0: Navadhā dabbaṃ bahudhā guṇoti payogadassanato dabbaguṇavisayānampakārānaṃ gayhupagattā byavacchedayitabbānaṃ
anya-e0806n:1078_1: dabbaguṇavisayānampakārānaṃ bhāvā sabbasmiṃ dabbaguṇavisaye jinindabuddhinā vuttanayena kiriyā atthevāti
anya-e0806n:1078_2: kiriyāvisayova pakāro gayhatīti vuttikāra pañjikākārānaṃ visesanopādānamayuttanti attho.
anya-e0806n:1079_0: Tatoyevāti yato visesanopādānamayuttaṃ tatoyeva dvīhiccādikamāheti attho.
anya-e0806n:1079_5: Tatoyeva kiriyāpakāropādāne pakārotisayane (potthake) atra dhāppaccayantappayogo na siyāti viññāpetuṃ ‘dvīhi’ccādikamāhe”ti tenāha‘atre’ccādi.
anya-e0806n:1080_0: Dabbaguṇavisaye pakāre gayhamāne yoyaṃ doso sambhāvito parehi,
anya-e0806n:1080_3: saṅkhyantarāpādane gamyamāne dhāppaccayo vihito pāṇiniyehi, tadāha-
anya-e0806n:1080_4: ‘dabbasse’ccādi saṅkhyāntarāpādanepīti pubbaṃ yā vavatthitā saṅkhyā, tato-
anya-e0806n:1082_1: tasaddena pakārassa parāmaṭṭhattā tabbatītettha pakāravatīti attho vuttoti āha-
anya-e0806n:1084_0: Kiṃ saṅkhyānamparimāṇamesanti atthe “kimhā rati rīvarīvataka rittakā”ti (4-
anya-e0806n:1084_1: 44) suttena ratippaccayaṃ vidhāya katīti siddhattā vuttaṃ-
anya-e0806n:1084_3: kati ca so saṅkhyā parimāṇavisayattā saṅkhyā ceti katisaṅkhyā, tāya.
anya-e0806n:1086_0: Paccāsattīti sambandhimhi ekamhi dassite dviṭṭhattā sambandhassa paro sambandhī viññāyamāno parova viññāyati yuttitoti ‘sambandhatovā’ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n:1090_0: Khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaso, puthu pakāro puthuso.
anya-e0806n:1092_0: Nanu ca abhavanannāma sabbathā anuppattiyā vā avatthantarena vā,
anya-e0806n:1092_5: Kathamavatthāva tasaddena parāmasīyatīti ce abhūtasaddo yadyanuppannavācī siyā,
anya-e0806n:1092_12: Bhavanaṃ bhāvo tāya avatthantare bhāvo tabbhāvo tasmiṃ.
anya-e0806n:1094_0: Dissantīti vutte payoge dissantīti ayamattho viññāyatīti āha ‘disi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n:1094_1: idaṃ suttaṃ vijjhaṅga paribhāsā bhavatīti seso. “Ṇovā-
anya-e0806n:1094_3: 1) suttena vuttesvanekavidhesu atthesu pari samantato bhāsatīti paribhāsā,
anya-e0806n:1096_2: na vijjatentaramesanti antarāḷamattapaṭisedhepayojanaṃ natthīti katvāntarā ḷaṭṭhassābhāvāntarāḷaṃ natthītyupacarīyati,
anya-e0806n:1096_3: evañhi loke payujjate ‘anantarā ime gāmā anantarā ime pāsādā’ti antarāḷagatassa ññassa gāmassaññassa pāsādassa vābhāvā tathā byapadisīyate,
anya-e0806n:1096_7: Antaraṃ karotīti vā khādiippaccayaṃ ṇippaccayaṃ (potthake) vidhāya antarāyati byavadhānaṃ karotīti kattari
anya-e0806n:1096_8: appaccayaṃ vidhāya antaro byavadhāyako natthetesanti anantarā.
anya-e0806n:1097_1: tasmā byañjanāti bahuvacanena saṃyogoti ekavacananiddeso ghaṭate,
anya-e0806n:1097_2: nanu ca vaṇṇānamuccāritappadhaṃsittā yogapajjamaṭṭhitamānānaṃ na sambhavati samudāyattanti samudāyattamayuttanti nāyuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:1097_3: tathāhi uttaruttaraggāhini buddhi pubbaparībhūte byañjanāvayave samudāyarūpena saṅkappentī samudāyavohārampavattayīti.
anya-e0806n:1098_1: uḷumpasaddassa saṃyogavisayattā oḷumpikoti etassa visayoti tattha rāghavo venateyyo meniko decco dosaggānti rūpāni.
anya-e0806n:1100_0: Kosajjanti ettha tassa jattañca nipātanā, ajjavanti etthha “uvaṇṇassā vava sare”ti (4-129).
anya-e0806n:1106_0: Satissāti vutte satisaddo viññāyati satyantepi visesanattena vattumicchitesatyanto kathaṃ viññāyaticcāsaṅkiya “saṅkhyāya saccutīsāse”ccādinā (4-
anya-e0806n:1108_1: Pañcikāyampana pakatipi saddoyevāti dhātutoiccādinā adhātusaddassa atthamattaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n:1109_4: Pubbaggahaṇamantarenātipāṇininā ikārādesavidhāyake imasmiṃyeva suttekakārato pubbassa ikārādesavidhānatthaṃ pubbaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0806n:1109_10: siyā etanti bahuparibbājakāti etaṃ rūpaṃ hoti.
anya-e0806n:1110_0: Nanu ca asyāditoti ettha pasajjappaṭisedho naña kasmā gahito,
anya-e0806n:1110_1: na pariyudosoti āsaṅkiya pariyudāsesmiṃ gahite sati dosaṃ vattumārabhate ‘pariyudāse’iccādinā.
anya-e0806n:1110_6: Asyādismā paroti katvā bahuparibbājakasaddato na syādyuppattīti sambandho.
anya-e0806n:1111_1: Pasajjappaṭisedhena nañasaddena aññapadatthasamāsepi siyāva dosoti dassento āha-
anya-e0806n:1116_13: Titikkhakiriyattāti iminā paresaṃ viya khādyantānaṃ dhātusaññāvidhāna manatthakanti dasseti.
anya-e0806n:1117_5: Niccaṇyantassa curādikassa hi tādise payojane sati bahulaṃ vidhīyamānepi niccattamattano nātivattati.
anya-e0806n:1117_10: Kadāci pana assādinopi dutiyassa gahaṇaṃ siyā atthappakaraṇā dippabhāvato.
anya-e0806n:1118_0: Nanu ca vīmaṃsāyaṃ sappaccayavidhāna manupapannamitaretaranissayadosa duṭṭhattā,
anya-e0806n:1118_2: sati ca tasmiṃ vīmaṃsāti rūpaṃ sampajjatīti itaretaranissayo,
anya-e0806n:1118_3: itaretara nissayāni ca kāriyānī nopakappantīti tenāha-
anya-e0806n:1124_1: Tato ceti yato tuṃsmāti paccayasseva gahaṇaṃ yato ca visesana niddeso,
anya-e0806n:1124_4: “paccayaggahaṇe yasmā so vihito tadādino gahaṇa”nti ñāyato.
anya-e0806n:1124_9: So kiriyattho ādi yassa samudāyassa so tadādi so paccayonte tassa (so tadanto).
anya-e0806n:1124_12: Nanu ca tuṃsmāiti visesanattena vattumicchite bhavatu “vidhibbisesanantasse”ti tadantaggahaṇaṃ paccayaggahaṇe
anya-e0806n:1124_15: Yato vihito tena vinā na bhavati sīleneti tadavinābhāvī tassa bhāvo tasmā.
anya-e0806n:1124_17: yamākhyāyate ‘paccayaggahaṇe yasmā so vihito tadādino gahaṇa’nti.
anya-e0806n:1125_1: Kha cha suppattābhāvāti kha cha sānaṃ uppattiyā abhāvā.
anya-e0806n:1125_2: Vuttappakārasseva tuṃppaccayantassa pakatibhāvena gahaṇā sapādito kha cha sānamanuppattīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n:1125_6: nemittike ekāre nivatte ‘jisa jisa iti dvitte anādibyañjanalopo “jiharānaṃ gī”ti (5- 102) gī.
anya-e0806n:1125_9: “Ā ī ū mhā ssā ssamhānaṃ vā”ti (6-
anya-e0806n:1125_11: Yadi tu sapādito sassa uppatti siyā,
anya-e0806n:1125_12: tadā byajigīsīti ettha dvibbacanaṃ karīyamānaṃ sappaccayantassa paṭhamassekassarassa dvibbacanaṃ bhavatīti “kha cha sāna”miccādinā (5-
anya-e0806n:1125_13: 69) vijiya iti samudāye ādibhūtassa visaddassa siyā īmhi ca vihite sapādino pakatibhāvoti visadda pubbe añāgamo siyā,
anya-e0806n:1126_0: Tuṃsmā icchāyanti ca pakatippaccayatthānamupadiṭṭhattā tena sabhāva liṅgena kha cha sappaccayā tadanto ca anumito na pana tuṃ,
anya-e0806n:1126_4: Jighacchāiccatra dvitte pubbassa ghassa “catuttha dutiyānaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā”ti (5- 78) go.
anya-e0806n:1126_6: Pāṇinināpīha sappaccaya vidhāyake sutte vākyampi yathā siyāti vāvacanaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0806n:1126_13: Idaṃ lakkhaṇanti “tuṃsmā lopo cicchāyaṃ te”iti idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0806n:1127_1: tenāsiddhena vākyenāsiddhānaṃ kha cha sānaṃ sādhanaṃ asiddhenāsiddhasādhanaṃ.
anya-e0806n:1127_3: Icchāyapavattito upaladdhīti icchāya upaladdhi upālambo parijānanaṃ pavattitoti attho.
anya-e0806n:1127_4: Cetanāvaticāti vuttaṃ tasmā cetanāvati pavattito upaladdhiṃ dassetvā tadapadese nācetanepi dassetuṃ ‘yopesā’tiādimāha.
anya-e0806n:1128_1: Sā sunakho mimarisatīti mara=pāṇacāge’icchāyaṃ tumantā so.
anya-e0806n:1128_7: Sā mimarisatīti satipi sacetanatte visattajīvitassa sunakhassa maraṇicchā sambhavatīti paṭipāditaṃ.
anya-e0806n:1130_1: Tañca nāma jāti guṇakiriyādabba sambandhato pañcadhā bhavati.
anya-e0806n:1130_2: Tattha nāmakammaṃ’ ḍittho ḍavitthoti nāmena piṇḍassa sambandhā.
anya-e0806n:1130_4: Guṇakammaṃ sukkonīloti sukkādinā guṇena dabbassa sambandhā.
anya-e0806n:1130_5: Kiriyākammaṃ pācako pāyakoti pācakādikiriyāya dabbassa sambandhā.
anya-e0806n:1130_6: Dabbakammaṃ daṇḍīvisāṇīti daṇḍādinā dabbena piṇḍassa sambandhā.
anya-e0806n:1130_7: Evaṃ kammassa pañcappakārasambhavepicchāyamatthe īyassa vidhānato icchāsambandhiyeva kammaṃ gayhatīti
anya-e0806n:1131_3: ettha tva(tta)ggahaṇamantarenātta sambandhinyeva puttādo kathaṃ viññāyate visesavacanābhāve hi parasambandhinyapi pappotītīmaṃcodyamubbhāvaya māha-
anya-e0806n:1132_5: Yadi attano puttamicchatīti vattumicchāyaṃ sāpekkhettepi siyā,
anya-e0806n:1133_2: Uppajjamānena īyeneva attatthassābhihitattā attasaddassāppayogoti cetampi na saṅgatanti paṭipādayamāha ‘na ca sakkā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n:1133_5: Apūpādikāya pakatiyā samānatthasseva visesanassa vuttipade antobhāva dassanāti attho.
anya-e0806n:1133_10: Natu bhinnatthassāti byatirekaṃ dassetvā taṃ diṭṭhantena sādhetumāha-
anya-e0806n:1133_14: Devadattassa dhuruno kulanti sāmyantarabyavacchedāya devadattasaddasso pādānato gurukulanti vuttipadena devadattatthassānto bhāvoti attho.
anya-e0806n:1133_17: Athāttano puttamicchatītyetasmiṃ vākye padassānvākhyānato attasaddassāpphayogo kinna siyāti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n:1134_8: Atthappakaraṇādyupalakkhaṇantyanena atthato pakaraṇāditopi puttassatta niyatā gamyate,
anya-e0806n:1135_0: Nanu ca sutte kammāti vuttattā kammasamudāyatopīyo siyā tyāsaṅkiyeva (mabhā)vaṃ sādhayamāha-
anya-e0806n:1135_2: Vattuṃ iṭṭhā ekasakhyā yassa kammasāmaññassa taṃ tathāvuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n:1135_5: Kimpanāvayavato na siyā’ mahantamputtamicchatī’ccatra puttamiccatoccāsaṅkiyāha ‘avayavatopi sāpekkhattāyevā’ti.
anya-e0806n:1135_7: Evañcarahi idampi na sijjhatīti codento āha ‘carahi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n:1135_8: Mahā cāyaṃ puttoceti mahāputtamicchatīti yadevaṃ karīyati tadāyampayogoti dassento āha-
anya-e0806n:1137_4: tassa sādhamyā samāna rūpatāya yampasiddhassa gavayādino sādhiyassa sādhanaṃ tamupamānantyattho.
anya-e0806n:1138_0: Puttamivācaratīti ettha ‘āvasathamāvasati’ccādo viya ādhāratthassa viññāyamānattā putte viya māṇavake
anya-e0806n:1138_3: Pasiddhena sādhanabhāvenupamānabhūte putte ācaraṇampi pasiddhanti āha-
anya-e0806n:1138_5: Tadācaraṇena tena ācaraṇena puttamāṇavakavisayamācaraṇaṃ vā puttamāṇavaka saddenupacārato gahetvā visayīvasena visayabhāvavohārotipi yujjati.
anya-e0806n:1138_6: Vākyattho panetasmiṃ pakkhe ‘puttamiva puttavisaya māṇavakamiva ācarati māṇavakavisayamācaraṇaṃ karotī’ti,
anya-e0806n:1139_0: Nanu ca yajjatropamānopameyyabhāvo vuttiyaṃ īyeneva jotitoti ivasaddo nivattate,
anya-e0806n:1139_2: taṃ kathamupameyyavacanassa māṇavakasaddassa vuttatthassa payogo yuttoccāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n:1140_1: Upamānopameyyabhāvassānivattattāti etthāyamadhippāyo ‘upamāna visiṭṭhācaraṇe upamānavacanato īyassa vidhāne
anya-e0806n:1140_3: Aññathāti yadyupamānopameyyabhāvassa īyeneva jotitattā tadantassupameyye vutti siyātyattho.
anya-e0806n:1142_0: Yathānantarasutte upamāne upameyyassa māṇavakassa payogo upapanno,
anya-e0806n:1142_4: Nanu kimatthamidamuccate yavatāyo pāsāde ivācarati so pāsādamivācaratītipi vattuṃ sakkāti nātthabhedo-

anya-e0806n:1146_1: 119) cīssa abhūtatabbhāve karādiyogesati vidhānā ‘abhūtatabbhāvo karādivisiṭṭho’ti āha.
anya-e0806n:1146_2: Abhūta tabbhāvassa karādivisiṭṭhattā karotyatthanivattiyāvassaṃ pāṇiniyā viya bhuviggahaṇaṃ kattabbamaññathā

anya-e0806n:1150_0: Nanu ca asati sutte dutiyāggahaṇe dutiyantehiccāyaṃ viseso kuto labbhate yena ‘saddādīhi dutiyantehī’ti vivaraṇaṃ katanti saccaṃ,
anya-e0806n:1150_1: tathāpi paccayavidhimhi yuttepi pañcamiyā niddese ‘saddādīnī’ti dutiyāyopādānasāmatthiyā tathā vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0806n:1151_5: Yadīpi adhīteccādīsu vattamānakālena kattunā ekavacanena ca niddeso,
anya-e0806n:1151_6: tathāpi tesamappadhānattā aññasmimpi bhūtādike kāle kammādo sādhane bahuvacanena ca paccayo siyā eveti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n:1152_3: tato ca saddādīhi dhātvatthe ippaccayena na bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n:1152_8: tena bhinnavākyabhāvenāyassa ippaccayassa ca samuccayatoti attho.
anya-e0806n:1152_13: saddādīni karoticcasmiṃ atthe āyo bhavatī’ti paccekamākhyātāpekkhāya vākyaparisamattiyā bhinnatā,
anya-e0806n:1152_25: māḍharāya vatthayugalaṃ dīyatū’ti māḍharo brāhmaṇabhāvena bhojīyate vatthayugalañca labhate,
anya-e0806n:1152_26: tenojukaṃ vuttena vatthayugaladānena sāmaññavuttaṃ bhojanaṃ na bādhīyate,
anya-e0806n:1152_27: tathehāpi ujukaṃ vihitenāyena sāmaññavihito ippaccayo na bādhīyate lakkhiyānurodhena satthakārassa vākya bhedābhedoti nānavaṭṭhitidosoti maññate.
anya-e0806n:1153_0: Yappaccayo na vihito pāṇinīādīhi viyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n:1153_8: Jalamānāti aṭṭhakathāvacanatoti iminā kiriyāsamabhihāre yappaccayābhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0806n:1153_9: Iminā ca sakkate viya bhusābhikkhaññepi kiriyāsamabhihāro kiriyāparivattanaṃ,
anya-e0806n:1153_14: dittiya’nti imasmā “māno”ti sāmaññena vihito mānappaccayo bhusatthe ābhikkhaññe ca bhavissati.
anya-e0806n:1155_1: saddaṃ karoti saddamuccāretīticcevamattho (na) gahetabbe anissayanato anabhidhānato vā.

anya-e0806n:1157_5: Tasmā yathā vuttalakkhaṇe dhātvatthe dhātuto vidhīyamāno tyādippaccayo tathābhūtameva vadatīti bhedābhāvā abhedasaṅkhyāyekavacanenoccate,
anya-e0806n:1157_9: Na yatokutocītiādinā yato yattha na dissati,

anya-e0806n:1164_0: Payojako codako byāpārakoti attho nanu ca vuttiyaṃ ‘kattāraṃ payojayatī’ti vuttaṃ kathaṃ payujjamānassa kattuttaṃti āha-
anya-e0806n:1164_2: Nāvassaṃ kiriyāpavattakatteneva yoggatāmattenapi kattuttaṃ siyāti dassento āha-
anya-e0806n:1164_7: Dāsādino hīnassa katthaci atthe niyojanaṃ pesanaṃ.
anya-e0806n:1164_9: Taṃ pesanajjhesanādikaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvo yassa so tathā vutto.
anya-e0806n:1165_3: Bhikkhā hi pacurabyañjanavatī labbhamānā vāsānukūlaṃ tittivisesamupajanayati.
anya-e0806n:1165_4: Kārīsopi nivāte padese suṭṭhu pajjalitojjhayanavirodhi sītakatamupaddavamapanayanto-
anya-e0806n:1166_0: Payojakabyāpāretīdaṃ paccayavisesanaṃ vā siyā pakativisesanaṃ vā.
anya-e0806n:1166_2: tadā payojakabyāpāre vattamānā ṇīṇāpī vidhīyantīti (gamanaṃ) pati yo niyogo tadattho gami,
anya-e0806n:1166_4: tassa cāyaṃ payojjoti ‘gamayati māṇavakaṃ gāma’nti gatyatthassa payojje “gatibodhāhāre”ccādinā (2-
anya-e0806n:1167_2: Kattāraṃ yo payujjati yo ca karaṇādīnaṃ payojako tesaṃ sāmaññena gahaṇe satīti attho.
anya-e0806n:1167_3: Byāpāretvevāti payojakaggahaṇamantarena byāpāreicceva vacanaṃ kattabbaṃ siyāti bhāvo,
anya-e0806n:1167_11: Taṃ visuṃ curādīhi ṇividhānameva vakkhamānappakārena saphalaṃ siyā nāññathāti attho.
anya-e0806n:1169_0: Kattari vihitesupi mānantatyādīsu parabhūtesu kyo bhavatīti viññāyeyyāti ‘bhāvakammesū’ti na kyassa visesananti āha-
anya-e0806n:1170_3: na hi ‘ṭhīyate’ccasmā bhāvo kattā ca patīyate,
anya-e0806n:1171_1: Parasamaññābhi paresaṃ kaccāyanā naṃ parokkhāicceva nāmaṃ.
anya-e0806n:1171_3: Aparokkhesūti ettha parasamaññāvasena parokkhāiccanena saha samāsaṃ dassetvā idāni aññathāpi paṭipādetuṃ ‘athavā’tiādimāha.
anya-e0806n:1171_5: Parokkhevihitā paccayāti iminā upacārena taddhitappaccayavasena vā parokkhāti saddanipphattimāha.
anya-e0806n:1172_0: Nanu pubbapakkhe ‘aparokkhesū’ti ettha ‘parokkhāvajjitesū’ti attha vacanaṃ yujjati,
anya-e0806n:1172_2: tathā sati kathamettha ‘parokkhāvajjitesū’ti atthavacanaṃ yujjatīti āha-
anya-e0806n:1172_6: 6) ‘parokkhe’ti pakativisesananti paccayānaṃ parokkhe vihitatā kathanti manasi nidhāyāha ‘parokkhe’iccādi.
anya-e0806n:1173_1: Pubbaparībhūto padhānakiriyāvayavabhūto kiriyārūpo attho lakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvo yassa dhātvatthassa so tathā vutto.
anya-e0806n:1173_6: tathāpi kriyatthāiccādhikārato mānādīnamaññatthālabbhanato ca kiriyā sambandhova gayhate, su-
anya-e0806n:1174_0: Pāṇiniyehettha “bhindati kusūlaṃ’tyādo yā bhedanādikiriyā kammani dissate,
anya-e0806n:1174_1: sā yadā sukarattamattena sappadhānattavacanicchāyaṃ kattuttepyupalabbhati ‘bhijjate kusulo sayameve’ccādinā,
anya-e0806n:1174_2: tadāssa kattuno suttantarena kammasarikkhabhāvo vidhīyate ‘kammanissayaṃ kāriyaṃ yathā siyā’ti.
anya-e0806n:1175_1: Atthatoti ‘kammeyeva kyo’ti (na sakkhi) tasmā vuttanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n:1175_2: Tathāhi ‘bhijjateti savanā kammatāvagamyate’ti iminā atthato kammeyevakyotipaṭipāditameva.
anya-e0806n:1175_5: Aññathāti yadi kammeyeva tepaccayo na siyā.
anya-e0806n:1175_9: Kiṃ vacanenāti pāṇinīyānamiva kiṃ suttattarenāti attho.
anya-e0806n:1176_0: Vacanābhāvepi kammakattari padasaṅkhārakkamopadassanamukhena vutti ganthaṃ vivaritumāha-
anya-e0806n:1176_2: Vākyato uddharitvā padesaṅkhariyamāneti ‘bhijjate kusūlo sayameve’ti vākyato visuṃ katvā bhijjate’ti pade saṅkhariyamāne nipphādīyamāneti attho.
anya-e0806n:1177_0: Asmiṃ pakkheti asmiṃ kattuttena vivacchite pakkhe.
anya-e0806n:1177_2: Bhāvakammesūtīmassa kattariccassa ca paccayavisesanatthe sati sāmatthiyaladdhampayojanaṃ dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n:1177_9: Yadi bhāvakammesu kattari ca tena tena dhānena suttena mānādayo na siyuṃ,
anya-e0806n:1177_10: kathantaṃ visesitesu mānādīsu paresu kyādayo siyuntīminā sāmatthiyena ( ) (sati) bhāvakammesu kattari
anya-e0806n:1177_12: 1) suttehi yathālābhaṃ bhāvādīsu paccayā hontīti viññāyatīti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n:1178_0: Natadatthaṃ vacanamāraddhanti bhāvakammesu kattari mānantatyādividhānatthaṃ pāṇiniyehi viya suttantaraṃ nāraddhanti attho.
anya-e0806n:1178_1: Atha bhāvakammesu kattari ca mānādividhānatthaṃ vacanaṃ nāraddhaṃ dhātuniyamanaṃ dhātuniyamatthaṃ tvassa
anya-e0806n:1178_4: Akammakā dhātuto bhāve kattari ca sakammakā kamme kattari ceti kiriyatthaniyamo yathāvuttena sāmatthiyā labbhateti sambandho.
anya-e0806n:1178_6: sakammakānañca satopi bhāvassāppadhānattā akammakā kattari bhāve ca bhavanti na kamme,
anya-e0806n:1178_7: sakammakā kammasabbhāvā kattari kamme ca bhavanti na bhāvetīdaṃ sāmatthiyaṃ.
anya-e0806n:1179_0: Kammamapekkhateti pacādito kattari paṭhamapurisekavacane kate pacaticcādīsu pacādino pacanādikiriyā odanādikaṃ kammamapekkhate.

anya-e0806n:1195_6: vuttañhi tena “kimatthaṃ pesādīsu kiccasaññino tabbaanīyaṇyatyappaccayā vidhīyante,

anya-e0806n:1195_14: ato tena visesavihitena kiccā pesādivisaye bādhīyeranti punabbiyate,

anya-e0806n:1195_21: Dhātvadhikārevihito asarūpo apavādappaccayo ussaggassa bādhako bhavati itthi adhikāre vihitappaccayaṃ vajjayitvāti attho.
anya-e0806n:1196_12: Avassakādhamīṇatāvisiṭṭhe tu kattari kiccānaṃ tadaññesañca bhāvāya visuṃ- suttitaṃ, tena,

anya-e0806n:1200_2: Kiriyā visesakattuvisayāti kiriyāvisesassa yo kattā so visayo yassā sā tathā vuttā.

anya-e0806n:1200_6: Jīvatu nandatu bhavatūti āsiṃsāyaṃ payogena jīvaka nandaka bhavakasaddānaṃ taṃsamānatthatā dassitā.
anya-e0806n:1201_0: Akenevāsiṃ sanatthassa gamitattāti āsiṃsanā eva attho,

anya-e0806n:1205_0: Jahanti udakanti vīhīsu hāyanasaddassa pavattinimittaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0806n:1207_0: Nanu ca vitoti pañcamīniddiṭṭhattā ‘vito parasmā ñāiccasmā’ti vattabbaṃ kathaṃ vipubbāti vuttanti āha-
anya-e0806n:1207_3: Visaddato dhātumhi parabhūte sati visaddo pubbo nāma hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n:1211_0: Nāmajātiguṇakiriyā dabbasambandhato pañcavidhattepi kammassa kriyatthassāvadhirayamupādinnoti kriyatthasambandhā kiriyākammasseha gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0806n:1212_2: Nanu ca kvaciggahaṇeneva ‘ādiccaṃ passati’ccādopi (nivatti) vattuṃ sakkā kasmā ‘bahulādhikārā’ti vuttanti āha ‘tene’ccādi.
anya-e0806n:1212_3: Tenāti yena kvaciggahaṇaṃ kutociyevāti dassanatthaṃ kataṃ tenāti attho.
anya-e0806n:1212_5: Atha ādiccaṃ passaticcādo viya kammakarādīsupi nivattimadassetvā ‘kvacīti kiṃ kammakaro’ti kasmā vuttanti āha-
anya-e0806n:1213_3: Atheha kasmā na hoti devadatto sayati dāttena lunāti sunakhānaṃ dadāti nagarā apeti thāliyaṃ pacati mātu saratī”ti,

anya-e0806n:1213_7: aññathā syāditocceva vadeyya kiṃ kammāti vacanenāti.

anya-e0806n:1217_1: Bhedena vivaraṇanti samānādīhīti avatvā bhedena vivaraṇaṃ.

anya-e0806n:1219_6: aññathā kārakasaddena tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ na siyāti.
anya-e0806n:1219_13: Tesu dabbā dīsu tiṭṭhatīti tatraṭṭhā, satti.
anya-e0806n:1219_15: Atha dabbādīnaṃ mukhyato kārakatte sati kimāyātantyāha ‘yadi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n:1220_1: Aññamaññabyāvuttarūpattāti aññamaññato byāvuttaṃ nivattaṃ rūpaṃ karaṇādisabhāvo yesaṃ kattādi kārakānaṃ te tathā vuttā,
anya-e0806n:1220_3: Karaṇa rūpanti karaṇaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo yassa adhikaraṇassa taṃ tathā vuttaṃ.

anya-e0806n:1245_3: Āvassakaggahaṇāyeva siddhoti vuttaṃ kathametthāvassambhāvo patīyati ccāha-
anya-e0806n:1246_7: Vatañca bhojane atthitāyaṃ saddhaassaddhabhojanavisayāyaṃ pavattiyaṃ yadi bhuñjati assaddhameva bhuñjati na saddhanti satthe vuttaniyamo,
anya-e0806n:1246_9: evañhi viññāyamāne yadevāssaddhaṃ na bhuñjati tadeva vatalopo siyāti atthitāya (bhojanākaṅkhitattā) yathecchaṃ
anya-e0806n:1246_10: sāmaññena bhojane pavattiyaṃ mattāyaṃ asaddhabhojanaṃ satthavihitamupalabhamānassa saddhato nivattitvā
anya-e0806n:1246_15: tatrādime niyame yadevā saddhaṃ na bhuñjati tadevavata loposiyā (ra- 3-
anya-e0806n:1248_1: Kammakattarīti ubhayatthāpi kammakattari paccayo bahulādhikārāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n:1248_2: Ettha pana ekopi padattho kammañca hoti kattāca kārakasattibhedato.
anya-e0806n:1248_3: Yathā ‘pīyamānaṃ madhu madayatī’ti ekassāpi sattibhedā kammattaṃ kattuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:1248_5: Yo paraṃ bhañjati tatthapi siyā sāmaññavidhānatoti āha-
anya-e0806n:1251_2: sati ca tte bhūtasaddassa nipphattīti phuṭo yevitaretaranissayadosoti. Nesadoso,
anya-e0806n:1251_6: Ktavantā dayopi carahi saddasattisabhāvato bhūteeva bhavissantīti na vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n:1251_10: Bhūteti cāyaṃ pakativisesanaṃ vā siyā ‘bhūtatthe vattamānā’ti,
anya-e0806n:1251_17: Paccayatthassa kattuno anabhikkantattā ayanti payogo nopapajjateti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n:1255_5: Kiriyārambheti sāmaññena vuttattā kiriyatthavisesanaṃ vā etaṃsiyā paccayatthavisesanaṃ vā ubhayathāpi na dosoti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n:1255_7: Paccayatthavisesanapakkhepi sāmatthiyā ārambhe kiriyatthassāpi pavattī hotīti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n:1255_11: sopi sāmaññena vacanato bhāvakammesu ārambhepi hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0806n:1255_14: Bhāvakammesuceti evaṃ na vuttanti ‘yathāpattañce’ti vadatā vuttikārenevaṃ na vuttanti attho.
anya-e0806n:1256_6: Evaṃ maññate “bhāvakamma gahaṇaṃ cākārenānukaḍḍhiya ‘bhāvakammesu cā’tyanena ktevidhīya māne idamāsaṅkīyate
anya-e0806n:1256_7: ‘pubbeneva sāmaññena siddhe punabbacanā punabbacanaṃ kiriyatthāniyamena ttassuppattī’ti,
anya-e0806n:1256_8: yathāpattañceti hyuccamāne cakārena yathāpattampi kāriyamanuññāyateti pubbeneva vacanena bhāvakammesvārambhepi yathāpatto kto bhavatīti viññāyate”ti.
anya-e0806n:1256_9: Evañcarahi bhāvakammesvārambhepi pubbeneva siddhattā “kattariārambhe”icceva vucceyya kiṃ cakārene ccāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n:1257_1: bahūhi kiriyākkhaṇehi kaṭe parisamatteyeva bhūto kālo ca bhavatīti kiriyāphalassāparinipphannattā vattamānova kāloti tatrakto na pappoticcāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n:1257_3: Kaṭekadesassāpi kaṭattā tassa ca nibbattattā bhūtavacanicchāti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n:1257_6: na ca tadavatthā te eva kaṭoti kathaṃ ‘pakato kaṭo’ti bhūtakālena pakatasaddena kaṭasaddasamānādhikaraṇattamiccāha-
anya-e0806n:1259_3: Sakammakatthanti vatvā sakammattamesaṃ pādiyoge sati hotīti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n:1261_7: Sā ca bhūtā yevātīminā kāraṇasāmaggiyā atītakālikattamāha.
anya-e0806n:1263_0: Ādhāreceti anuvuttiyā ettha cakārato ‘yathāpattañce’ti sambandhā vuttanti seso.
anya-e0806n:1263_1: Evaṃ na kutoci apakassanaṃ siyāti evamādhārādike anuvattamāne sati kutoci ādhārādito apakassanaṃ visuṃ karaṇaṃ na siyāti attho.
anya-e0806n:1263_2: Tathā sati heṭṭhā suttenekayogameva kareyyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n:1264_0: Bahulassa bhāvo kammaṃvāti bahvatthādānamevātra bahulasaddassa pavattinimittaṃ bhāvo kammaṃceti tattha paccayo.
anya-e0806n:1266_1: Kaṭṭhasaddassa phalahetubhūte agyādike vattamāne evaṃ hotu phalevattamāne kathanti āha-
anya-e0806n:1268_0: Nanu ca bhāveiti bhavatināyaṃ ghaṇantena niddeso karīyatīti bhavativisayova paccayatthaniddeso kato bhavati,
anya-e0806n:1268_1: tato ca bhavatino yo bhāvo tasmiṃyeva vācce paccayo siyā,
anya-e0806n:1268_2: so ca bhavatito yevuppajjamānena paccayena sakkābhidhātuṃ tato tasmāva paccayena bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n:1268_3: tasmā kathaṃ pacituṃ pāko cāgo rāgotipacādīhibhavati ccāha-
anya-e0806n:1269_1: tena kiriyāsāmaññavācinātthaniddeso karīyamāno sabbadhātuvisaye kato bhavati tasmā pacādīhipi bhavatītyadhippāyo.
anya-e0806n:1270_0: Nanu cātra tumādayo bhāve bhavantīti vutte na viññāyate kiṃvisesite bhāve tumādayo bhavanticcāha-
anya-e0806n:1270_3: Yo vattabbo bhāvoti yo vācco bhāvo.
anya-e0806n:1270_6: Tumādīnaṃ yā pakati tāya vācceneva bhāvena saha sambandhāti attho.
anya-e0806n:1270_8: Atha kriyāyaṃtyanena tabbādyabhihitassa dabbarūpāpannassa bhāvassa kathaṃ gahaṇaṃtyāha-
anya-e0806n:1270_10: Sakanissayakiriyābyapadesoti dabba rūpassa attano nissayabhūtāya kiriyāya byapadeso daṭṭhuṃ cakkhuccādo
anya-e0806n:1271_0: Nanu ca tumādīnaṃ bhāve vihitattā kiriyāyeva padhānattanti kamma kārakaṃ nappatīyateti kathaṃ ‘kaṭaṃ kātuṃ gacchatī’ti siyāccā saṅkiya paṭipādetumāha-
anya-e0806n:1271_3: Atthīti iminā yattha ‘supyate deva dattene’ccādo natthi,
anya-e0806n:1272_1: 12) kaccānena atadatthāyampikiriyāyaṃ tumādayo yathāsiyunti visuṃ suttitaṃ, tenāha-
anya-e0806n:1272_3: Yathā ‘bhottuṃ pacatī’tyādo bhojanakiriyā payojanā pacanakiriyā hoti,
anya-e0806n:1273_0: Icchatthassa dhātuno payogāti iminā ‘icchanto karotī’ti ettha icchantoti icchatthassa dhātuno payogatthameva,
anya-e0806n:1273_2: Devadattaṃ bhuñjamānamicchatītettha bhottunti na hoti samānakattukesūti vacanato,
anya-e0806n:1273_4: icchatissa aññoyevātipi suttassa visuṃ payojanaṃ na vattabbanti dassento āha-
anya-e0806n:1274_1: Sādhanaṃ ‘devadattaṃ bhuñjamāna’nti vuttakammasaṅkhātaṃ attho payojanaṃ yassa so sādhanattho- icchati.
anya-e0806n:1274_4: Niratthakanti etadatthameva samānakattukaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ tañca yathāvuttena pasaṅgābhāvā niratthakanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n:1275_0: Sakādyatthesu dhātū sūpapadesu dhātu mattā tumādayo suttantarena vihitā pāṇiniyehi, tenāha-
anya-e0806n:1275_3: Bhujikiriyatthāti bhujikiriyā attho yassā sattiyā sā bhujikiriyatthā patīyate.
anya-e0806n:1275_16: Sakkoticcādino upapadassa bhojanādikiriyatthatā na gamyate tasmā akiriyatthesupi sakādīsūpapadesu tumādayo bhavantī”ti.
anya-e0806n:1276_0: Patīyamānesvapyetesvatthantaresu tādatthiyamatthiyevāti pubbena vihitassa tumādinotra na bādheti dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n:1276_2: Tādatthiyamatthiyevāti bhojanakiriyatthatā sakkotiādīnaṃ atthi yevāti attho siddhāyeva “tuṃtāye”ccādinā.
anya-e0806n:1276_3: Alamatthavisiṭṭhesu pariyattivacanesūpapadesu dhātuto tumādayo vihitā parehi,
anya-e0806n:1276_10: Yathā bhottumanotiādinā paresampi ayameva nipphattikkamoti dīpeti.
anya-e0806n:1276_12: bhavati bhojanaṃ bhāvoti bhojanaṃ bhuñjanaṃ bhāvo bhavatīti attho.
anya-e0806n:1276_13: Natugamissakiriyātadatthāti gamanakiriyā bhojanatthā na hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n:1277_4: ‘Kattariltu’ccādinā yoyaṃ ṇako tīsupi kālesu sāmaññena vihito,
anya-e0806n:1277_7: na cāssa visesavihitena tuṃpaccayena bādhā bhinnattā,
anya-e0806n:1277_8: tuṃpaccayassa hi bhāve vidhānaṃ ṇakassa tu kattarīti.
anya-e0806n:1277_14: Hi yasmātyatthe yo eso vajati so kattā,
anya-e0806n:1277_17: na pana tehi tādatthiyaṃ gamyateti attho.
anya-e0806n:1277_18: Codako ltvādīhi sāmyamāpādayituṃ sāmarisaṃ vuttavidhinevāppattiṃ ṇakassāpyāha-
anya-e0806n:1277_20: Agatthaṃ apakatatthaṃ (potthake) yadipi ṇakena tādatthiyaṃ na gamyate pakaraṇato gamyateti ṇako bhavissatītyāsaṅkiya codako āha-
anya-e0806n:1277_26: Tadevaṃltvādīnampipattitoṇakaltvādīhi tādatthiyānavagame vinicchite tādatthiyavisesena tesaṃ sambhavoti
anya-e0806n:1277_33: Bhavissati kāle kriyatthāyaṃ kriyāyamupapade bhāve ca ṇappaccayādayo vihitā, tatrāha-
anya-e0806n:1279_0: Sotunādīsu ‘savanaṃ kātuna’iccādinā viggaho. Suteneti savananti viggaho.
anya-e0806n:1281_7: Yadipi ‘pubbaṃ byāpāra’nti samudāye ekadesabhūto byāpāro niddhāriyamānoti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0806n:1281_8: tathāpi pubbasaddena byāpāravācako kriyattho vuccate upacārā,
anya-e0806n:1281_9: teneva ‘tesu yo pubbo tadatthato kriyatthā’ti vuttiyaṃvuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n:1281_17: Eka kattukānaṃ byāpārānaṃ kamābhidhānāya tunādayo vidhīyamānā bhāveyevuppannā sakkonti kamamabhidhātunti bhāvetyatrābhisambajjhate.
anya-e0806n:1282_4: Byādāyāti dādhātussa viāpubbassa tvāppaccaye “pyo vā tvāssa samāse”ti (5-
anya-e0806n:1283_2: varo visesī yateti appatvā nadimpabbato’ti vutte nadiyā orabhāge pabbatoti attho. Bhavati,
anya-e0806n:1283_4: Avarena pabbatena parā nadī visesīyateti atikkamma pabbataṃ nadīti vutte pāre nadiyā ore pabbatoti attho patīyate,
anya-e0806n:1283_5: tato ca orabhāge pabbatavisiṭṭhā nadī viññāyate.
anya-e0806n:1283_6: Bhavatino sabbattha sambhave sati ekakattukatā pubbakālatā yathā gamya te tathā dasseti ‘paṭhamaṃ na pappoti’ccādi.
anya-e0806n:1284_11: Kiṃ ṇampaccayenāti idaṃ vuttaṃ hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0806n:1284_14: Kiṃ visiṭṭhanti pucchitvā jīvaggāhena visiṭṭhanti dassetuṃ jīvaggāha’nti āha.
anya-e0806n:1285_0: Ākhyātanti agāhayīti ākhyātaṃ kattabbarūpanti imānā gahaṇa kiriyāya kammattaṃ bodheti.
anya-e0806n:1285_3: Tathā ceti kiriyāvisesane dutiyāya ṇamante jāte sati.
anya-e0806n:1285_4: Ṇamanta rūpanti ṇamantassa rūpaṃ yassāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n:1287_0: Yo sādhayitumāraddho naca niṭṭhamupagatoti yo kaṭādisādhayituṃ nibbattayituṃ āraddho niṭṭhaṃ parisamattiṃ na copagato nappatto. Pavatto-
anya-e0806n:1287_2: avirato teneva niṭṭhaṃ nopagatosovattamānoti vuccateti yojanā.
anya-e0806n:1287_4: idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “yathāvuttakaṭādīnaṃ vattamānattā tabbisayā kiriyāpi vattamānā evāti taṃdvārena kriyatthavisesana”nti.
anya-e0806n:1288_0: Bhuñjati devadattoti ettha yajjapi bhuñjamāno hasati khajjati vadati pāniyaṃ pivati,
anya-e0806n:1288_1: tathāpi yuttā vattamānatā kattumicchitassārambho na parisamattoti vuttaṃ-
anya-e0806n:1288_3: Tiṭṭhanti pabbatātiādīsu niccesu pabbatādīsu bhūtānāgatānamasambhavā tannisedhino vattamānassāpyasambhavā yadīpi kālavibhāgo na viññāyate,
anya-e0806n:1288_4: tathāpi āraddhassa ṭhānassāparisamattiyā vattamānā evāti vuttaṃ- ‘pavatto-
anya-e0806n:1289_16: Yathācātiādinā apaṭhamāsamānādhikaraṇādīsu ‘saṃvijjamāno virocamānaṃ jappamāno’ccādīsu māno nto viya daṭṭhabboti vadati.
anya-e0806n:1295_1: Katipayadhātvādipariggahenāti dhātavo pakatibhūtā ādī yeyaṃ kālādīnaṃ te dhā tvādayo tesaṃ pariggahenāti attho.
anya-e0806n:1295_3: kārakaṃ kattādi pakaṃsena niyamena paccayo karīyate etasmāti pakati.
anya-e0806n:1296_2: Tacchakādayo (tacchakakamma) kāratantavāyarajakanahāpitā pañca kāravo cārudāruti vattamāne kālaniyamenāññatrāpi bhavissati.
anya-e0806n:1298_5: evaṃ sati napuṃsakena vivaraṇaṃ kathaṃ yujjatīti āha-
anya-e0806n:1298_7: atha jāgareccādo puthagavayavekassarassa jāgarasaddassa ca paccekaṃ kasmā na dvibhāvoccāha-
anya-e0806n:1299_1: Avayavekassarassāti visesanasamāso ‘avayavo ca so ekassaro ce’ti.
anya-e0806n:1301_0: Nanu ca pacatimhi yenevākārena pacasaddo ekassaro teneva tadavayavāpi acsaddo pasaddo ca ekassaro,
anya-e0806n:1301_3: evañca samudāyassa tadavayavānañcekassarānaṃ visuṃ dvibbacane kate aniṭṭhampappotītīdamapākattumāha-
anya-e0806n:1301_5: Sakiṃ satthappavattiyā ekavāraṃ dvibbacanasuttassa pavattiyā dvibbacanakaraṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0806n:1302_0: Sāvayavassāti yathāvuttāvayavehi saha vattamānassa na vinā tehi.
anya-e0806n:1302_1: Evaṃ maññate “yassa dvibbacane karīyamāne sabbesamavayavānaṃ gahaṇaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0806n:1302_3: tesañhi dvibbacane ekāya dvibbacanassuppattiyā na sabbesaṃ gahaṇaṃ kataṃ hoti nāvayavantassa samudāyassa
anya-e0806n:1302_4: ca katanti puna tesaṃ dvibbacanāya satthappavattiyā bhavitabba”nti.
anya-e0806n:1302_7: Iha ṭhāne dvibbacanaṃ dvippayogo dvibbacananti dve pakkhā.
anya-e0806n:1302_8: Tatra ṭhāne dvibbacanapakkhe dosadassanato dvippayogo dvibbacanantyayameva pakkhobbhupagatoti dassento
anya-e0806n:1303_1: tattha uccāraṇe saṅkhyeyye ṭhāne dvibbacanaṃ na sambhavati…
anya-e0806n:1303_7: Tathā sati nivuttidhamme ṭhānī bhavatīti ṭhānino nivuttiyā bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0806n:1303_10: Tena ppaccaye pare pakatiyā vidhīyamānaṃ kāriyaṃ na siyā,
anya-e0806n:1303_19: Dvippayoge tu dvibbacane nāyaṃ doso samāvisatīti āha-
anya-e0806n:1303_21: Dvidhā bhūtassā tidhinā dhātusseva dvidhābhūtattaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0806n:1305_1: Yadi hyatrāpi chaṭṭhī abhimatā siyā tadā “kha cha sa parokkhānamekassarodidve”ti ekameva yogaṃ kareyya.
anya-e0806n:1305_3: nāññatoti parokkhāvacanasannidhānā casaddena dhātuvihitappaccayāva gayhantīti āha-
anya-e0806n:1305_5: Yadi pana bhusattho ābhikkhaññattho vā vattumiṭṭho siyā,
anya-e0806n:1305_6: tadā bhūsatthādīsu ca daddallaticcādikaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n:1305_7: Caṅkamati momūhacittānīti bhusatthassa yujjamānattā tyādayo bhusatthe bhavanti bahulādhikārāti vattuṃ sakkāti.
anya-e0806n:1307_3: 70) paṭhamassekassa rassa dvibbacanaṃ ‘ādismā sarā”ti tu dutiyassa,
anya-e0806n:1307_4: tasmā kathamaññassuccamāneaññassabādhakaṃsiyā tasmā katepidutiya dvibbacanepaṭhamadvibbacanaṃ sambhavatvevātinapaṭhamadvibbacanāpavādo-
anya-e0806n:1307_7: Kriyatthādhikārā kriyatthānanti chaṭṭhiyā dutiyenekassa renaca sambandhā paṭhamadvibbacanassavidhāya
anya-e0806n:1307_12: “Ādismā sarā”ti saramadvittenupādāya sāmaññena saddarūpassa dvibbacanavidhānato pubbe viya byañjanayuttasseva
anya-e0806n:1307_13: vidhānaṃ tatheviṭṭhatthattāti paṭhamadvibbacana sambandhino byañjanassa dvibbacanabādhātyavagantabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n:1309_0: Paṭinimittanti nimittaṃ nimittaṃ pati paṭinimittaṃ, nimitte satīti attho.
anya-e0806n:1311_3: Paṭhama dutiya tatiya dvibbacananti ettha puiti paṭhamaṃ saddarūpaṃ,
anya-e0806n:1317_2: Kānubandhakaraṇamanatthakaṃ siyāti ghakvikaraṇassa paccayattābhāve (taṃ) nibandhanassa kāriyassābhāvā ‘na te kānubandhanāgamesū”ti (5-
anya-e0806n:1320_1: Yuvaṇṇeccādināpattassāti (tabba) tuṃ paccayesu ca ṇino pattassa.
anya-e0806n:1320_7: Asati nāgame “yuvaṇṇe”ccādinā ettaṃ siyā tampināgame upantattā netyadhippāyenāha-
anya-e0806n:1324_0: Nipajjati nipajjanaṃ. Pamajjate pamajjitabbaṃ. Pamajjanāya pamajjituṃ. Pamajjati pamajjanaṃ.
anya-e0806n:1328_3: 17) antasseva lopo siyāti codanaṃ manasi nidhāya taggahaṇe payojanaṃ dassento āha-
anya-e0806n:1328_13: Idāni chaṭṭhīniddiṭṭhānaṃ visesena vattumicchittaṃ antasseva lopapattidosaṃ dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n:1330_2: Anantarasutte “paripaccasamo hī”ti vuttattā tato parassāti kinnāvasīyatīti codana mubbhāviya tadayuttataṃ dassetumāha-
anya-e0806n:1336_0: “Vaṇṇe yantaṃ tadādo”ti paribhāsāya ayamattho “vaṇṇe pare yaṃ kāriyaṃ taṃ tadādo tasmiṃ vaṇṇe ādibhūte hotī”ti teti takāre pare.
anya-e0806n:1346_0: Vatta=vattanetīmasmā ttippaccaye vā ukāro na vihitoti āsayena ‘katha’miccādi vuttanti dassento āha-
anya-e0806n:1346_4: Ṭhā=gatinivattiyanti ettha ‘gatinivattiya’nti nipātanā pakkhe ukāro na hoti, tenāha-
anya-e0806n:1358_0: Nāññatracayādīsūti nicchayato-ññesu aññasmiṃ cayādīsvatthesu cho na bhavatīti attho.
anya-e0806n:1360_0: Īmhi jasadde akārassa lopo, le tu jīrāpayati. Tassātikyassa.
anya-e0806n:1366_0: Dassātyananuvattamānepi dasseva pappoti vacanabalenāti dassetuṃ pakkhantaramāha-
anya-e0806n:1366_2: Anaghaṇsu paresu āparīhi dassāniyamena ḷoccāsaṅkiya nevaṃ,
anya-e0806n:1368_0: Vuttiyaṃ etasmiṃ visayeti ettha etasminti tyādintavajjitapaccaya visayeti attho.
anya-e0806n:1368_2: Na ñāpakatoti iminā idaṃ dasseti “kiñci vacanānusārato viññāyamānatāmattena ñāpīyate kiñci ñāpakena,
anya-e0806n:1368_3: asmimpakkhe vuttānusārato katthaci kassaci dhātuno appayogo viññāpīyatī”ti.
