anya-e0806n:1431_8: Imināvāti atthivacane upapade kodhā saddhāsu gammamānesva-
anya-e0806n:1431_9: satīpi vacanantare imināva sāmaññavacanena siddhanti attho.
anya-e0806n:1431_12: Atthināma īdisanti atthināmāti (potthake) ābhidosikassa kummāsassa paribhuñjanaṃ vijjate nāmāti attho.
anya-e0806n:1431_13: Vijjamānampi taṃ asaddahanto amarisanto evaṃ vadati.
anya-e0806n:1431_16: Yopīti saddassa sopīti tasaddena sambandho veditabbo.
anya-e0806n:1432_0: Nanu atthināma tātāti ettake vutte paṭhamo atthinukhoccādiko nisīditvāti saddapariyanto ca,

anya-e0806n:1432_2: ca vacanappabandho kathaṃ labbhatīti manasi nidhāyāha-

anya-e0806n:1434_1: evamaññatrāpīti agami agamitthātīmehi aññatra agamuṃ iccādike agamoccādike ca.

anya-e0806n:1445_9: Kārakānaṃ sattisabhāvattā sāpi apaccakkhā vāti codeti nanuceccādinā.
anya-e0806n:1446_0: Attānāma attano paccakkhoti tabbisaye amhakārakassa vidhānamayuttanti manasi nidhāya yaṃ vuttaṃ vuttikārena,

anya-e0806n:1448_0: Eyyādotīminā eyyādyattho gahitoti bodhetuṃ yeneccādikaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0806n:1449_1: pakatakriyattha visesanattāti kriyatthādhikārato adhikatassa dhātussa visesanattā.
anya-e0806n:1449_3: visesanañca hontaṃ nojukaṃ bhavitumarahati kiñcarahi abhidheyyadvārena,
anya-e0806n:1449_6: tasmā atipattiyantivuttekriyātipatti yanti idaṃ kriyatthavisesanaṃ hontaṃ abhidheyyadvārena hotīti kriyātipattiyanti vivaraṇaṃ kata”nti.
anya-e0806n:1450_0: Kāraṇavekallatovāti hetumato phalassa yo hetu tassa vikalattena.
anya-e0806n:1450_4: Gamakena liṅgena gammāyātipattiyā bujjhanakālaṃ vattamāno kālo na tiṭṭhati atikkamatīti āha-
anya-e0806n:1450_8: Vattamānassa kriyātipatyasambhavā tadavasiṭṭhātītānāgatesveyyādīnambhāvo (aññathā) nupapattiyāti vuttaṃ vuttiyaṃ ‘sāmatthiyātiādi.
anya-e0806n:1451_0: Liṅgenāti ettha pubbe dakkhiṇena gamane sati sakaṭissāpariyā bhavanadassanaṃ dakkhiṇena gamanassa sakaṭāpariyābhavanahetutte liṅgaṃ,
anya-e0806n:1451_3: Paṭhamavaye arahattabhavanaṃ taṃhetubhūtañca pabbajjaṃ paresaṃ paṭhamavaye pabbajjānimittārahattappattiliṅgena
anya-e0806n:1451_5: arahattassātipatti ca pabbajjānimittābhāvena bhāvavirahena (potthake) liṅgenāvasīyateti liṅgena bhūta kriyātipatti pana veditabbā,
anya-e0806n:1451_6: yadi panevamabhiññālābhī payuñjati tadā paccakkhañāṇeneva sabbaṃ viññāya payuñjatīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0806n:1453_3: Hetuphalānaṃ sabbhāvatoti vuttattā hetuphalāni dasseti hananamiccādinā.
anya-e0806n:1453_4: Evaṃ hetuphalasabbhāvato sabbakāle ca vidhānato ettha vattamānepi pappotīti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n:1455_0: Pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ padantiādīsu pañhoti purimaṃ padaṃ,
anya-e0806n:1455_5: Pattakālavasena ca visayabhedena bhinnāya pīti yojetvā attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0806n:1455_9: Ettha ca anuññāpattakālesu ca pañcamī vihitā parehi,
anya-e0806n:1455_11: Idha pana te dvepi vidhivisesāyevāti vidhimhi antokaritvā eyyādiṃ vidhātuṃ yaṃ vuttaṃ vuttikārena,

anya-e0806n:1467_9: Nanu tumhāmhasesesūti ettake vuccamāne ‘tumhāmhasaddavacanīyesu tadaññasaddavacanīyesu ca kārakesū’ti ayaṃ viseso kuto gamyate yenevaṃ vivaṭaṃtyāha-
anya-e0806n:1468_5: Tumhāmhasesesu hontā majjhimuttamapaṭhamā kathaṃ bhāvādīsu viññāyanti kathañca tumhāmhādisaddavacanīyassa
anya-e0806n:1468_6: kārakatthassākhyātena tattha vihitena saññāvibhattā tumhāmhādisaddappayogābhāvoccāsaṅkiya yaṃ vuttaṃ
anya-e0806n:1468_7: vuttiyaṃ taṃdāni vivarantena ‘yadi bhāvādīsu mānādayo na vidhīyante tadāmānādīsu paresu bhāvādīsu kyalādīnaṃ
anya-e0806n:1468_8: vidhānameva nopapajjatī’ti iminā sāmatthiyena tumhādīsu kārakesu majjhimādīnaṃ bhāvo viññāyati teneva
anya-e0806n:1468_9: tumhādikārakatthassa tattha vihitenākhyātena saññāpitattā tumhādisaddappayogo nāma na hotīti dassetuṃ
anya-e0806n:1469_5: Tathāhi tayeccetaṃ kattuvācī paccateccetaṃ kammavācī kamme ākhyātappaccaya vidhānato.

anya-e0806n:1470_8: Ehi maññeccādi na kiñci vuttaṃ vuttiyaṃ.

anya-e0806n:1482_1: Atha kathaṃ ossehi saheva vuttā desotiviññāyatīccāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n:1482_3: Saha saddassa sahattha(ssa ca) sossa ssenāti kathanasāmatthiyāti attho.
anya-e0806n:1482_6: ossāna manādesitte iccādinā pāṭhena bhavitabbamiva lakkhīyate…
anya-e0806n:1482_8: Na tu ‘evaṃmaññateossānamantādesatte hāssacāti vacanamanatthakaṃ siyā hā to cetveva vadetya ossānamanādesitte’ccādinā pāṭhena…

anya-e0806n:1563_0: Sāmī me gurupuṅgavo vijayate sārīsuto-yaṃ bhuvi.
anya-e0806n:1565_0: Rājā vikkamabāhu bāhitaripū tātvassa bhātāssa lokissaro,

anya-e0806n:1568_0: Taṃ nissāya phalaṃ cirāya phalatañcetaṃ sataṃ santataṃ.
